S_s: 这些农民不确定自己是否能够在下一季还能控制农场，因此不会进行长期规划。

S_s: 尽管津巴布韦政府当局声称惨案已经终结，但马朗钻石所蕴含的道德问题却引起了人们进一步的质疑。

S_s: 如果他要向欧盟各国领导人保证他们应该重新任命他的话，那么他就需要表明他的第二个任期会给人以希望。

S_s: 总统恩里克·佩尼亚·尼托治下的年经济增长率只有2％，这可是不正常的，如果没法增加外国投资，经济也不能更快地扩张。

S_s: 在俄罗斯法律的表面隐藏的同样专横的暴君统治。

S_s: 在大多数情况下，他们甚至根本就不考虑这一可能性。

S_s: 飓风造成的损失远低于平均情况，几乎在2006年彻底消失。

S_s: 传统看法认为所有的网络供水都是好的投资，就像传统看法可能犯错误一样，认定所有水坝都是不好的投资同样也可能出现偏差。

S_s: 虽然古巴政府已封堵了该博客所在的网站，但它还是以多种语言在全世界广泛传播，在古巴国内也以光盘为传播途径。

S_s: 美国从世界其他地区净赚取360亿美元左右的金融收入，这是由此前投资在国外的资本产生的。

T_s: The U.S. netted around $36 billion in financial income from the rest of the world, generated by capital previously invested abroad.
T_f: Prior to that, in 1982, the United States earned a net financial income of around $36 billion from the rest of the world, generated by capital previously invested abroad.

S_s: 就像查尔斯·达尔文首先描述的，是对那些最适合生存，尤其是，在已有的条件下制造后代的物种的选择。
S_f: 其必然的结果，就像查尔斯·达尔文首先描述的，是对那些最适合生存，尤其是，在已有的条件下制造后代的物种的选择。
T_s: As first described by Charles Darwin, it is the selection of those species which are best suited to survive and, above all, to produce offspring under the given conditions.
T_f: A corollary of this, as first described by Charles Darwin, is the selection of those species which are best suited to survive and, above all, to produce offspring under the given conditions.

S_s: 那时企业被认为是威胁，一个原因就是因为这些公司对资产实行垄断，而这些资产对很多美国大众来说是至关重要的。
S_f: 那时大型企业被认为是威胁，一个原因就是因为这些公司对资产实行垄断，而这些资产对很多美国大众来说是至关重要的。
T_s: One of the reasons corporations were considered a threat at the time was because these companies had a monopoly on assets that were critical to many of the American public.
T_f: One of the reasons large corporations were considered a threat at the time was because these companies had a monopoly on assets that were critical to many of the American public.

S_s: 印度可以在不用承担不必要风险的情况下做很多事情，以拉詹为首的委员会在几年前便给出了详细的计划。
S_f: 尽管如此，印度可以在不用承担不必要风险的情况下做很多事情，以拉詹为首的委员会在几年前便给出了详细的计划。

T_f: Still, India can do a lot without taking unnecessary risks, and the committee headed by Rajan laid out a detailed plan a few years ago.

S_s: 瑞士选民以77％比23％的压倒性多数否决了向每个公民发放无条件基本收入的提案。

T_s: Swiss voters overwhelmingly rejected a proposal to issue an unconditional basic income to every citizen by an overwhelming majority of 77% to 23%.
T_f: On June 5, Swiss voters overwhelmingly rejected a proposal to issue an unconditional basic income to every citizen, 77% to 23%.

S_s: 美国组建了自二战以来最为强大的国际联合部队，并且在一场完全合法的战争中率领这一部队。
S_f: 在1991年，美国组建了自二战以来最为强大的国际联合部队，并且在一场完全合法的战争中率领这一部队。
T_s: The United States has assembled the most powerful international coalition force since World War II and is leading it in a completely legitimate war.
T_f: In 1991, the United States assembled the most powerful international coalition force since World War II and led it in a completely legal war.

S_s: 在1968年5月革命过去39年后，法国人渴望的是工作，这一点萨尔科齐看得比如何人都要清楚。
S_f: 在1968年5月革命过去39年后，法国人渴望的是工作，而不是爱情，这一点萨尔科齐看得比如何人都要清楚。
T_s: Thirty-nine years after the May Revolution of 1968, Sarkozy sees this more clearly than anyone, and what the French crave is work.
T_f: Thirty-nine years after the May 1968 revolution, the French crave work, not love, and Sarkozy sees this more clearly than anyone else.

S_s: 与超级大国结盟永远是不平等的，因此，从长期看，与美国建立紧密关系的努力对于印度的战略自主传统不利。
S_f: 顾名思义，与超级大国结盟永远是不平等的，因此，从长期看，与美国建立紧密关系的努力对于印度的战略自主传统不利。
T_s: Alignment with a superpower is never equal, so efforts to forge a close relationship with the United States are detrimental to India's tradition of strategic autonomy in the long run.
T_f: By definition, alliances with superpowers are always unequal, so efforts to forge a close relationship with the United States are detrimental to India's tradition of strategic autonomy in the long run.

S_s: 随着里约+20签署协议的落实，全球社会应当在今后20年为促进地方、全国的可持续发展采取更大胆的行动。
S_f: 随着里约+20签署协议的落实，全球社会应当在今后20年为促进地方、全国和国际层面的可持续发展采取更大胆的行动。
T_s: With the implementation of the Rio+20 agreement, the global community should take bolder actions to promote sustainable local and national development in the next 20 years.
T_f: With the implementation of the Rio+20 agreement signed, the global community should take bolder actions in the next 20 years to promote sustainable development at the local, national and international levels.

S_s: 重要的政治领袖，特别是两个核大国的政治领袖，对今天已有的风险以及明天即将出现的风险有着清楚的认识。
S_f: 重要的政治领袖，特别是美俄两个核大国的政治领袖，对今天已有的风险以及明天即将出现的风险有着清楚的认识。
T_s: Important political leaders, especially those of the two nuclear powers, have a clear understanding of the risks that exist today and the risks that will arise tomorrow.
T_f: Important political leaders, especially those of the two nuclear powers, the United States and Russia, have a clear understanding of the risks that exist today and the risks that will arise tomorrow.

S_s: 通过理解并从世界各地引进创新，非洲能够在技术上赶超更加发达的国家，构建生产更先进、价值更高的商品的能力。
S_f: 通过理解并从世界各地引进有效的创新，非洲能够在技术上赶超更加发达的国家，构建生产更先进、价值更高的商品的能力。

T_f: By understanding and importing effective innovations from around the world, Africa can technologically catch up with more developed countries and build capabilities to produce more advanced and higher-value goods.

S_s: 这一单位只不过是一个消费者物价指数，名称简单，每天公布，这样人们就可以使用这一单位来以实际价格报价。

S_s: 在朝鲜，许多在别的国家最普通的国是，在朝鲜都不容他人染指，特别是身上没有金饰血统的人染指。
S_f: 换句话说，在朝鲜，许多在别的国家最普通的国是，在朝鲜都不容他人染指，特别是身上没有金饰血统的人染指。

T_f: In other words, in North Korea, many countries that are most common in other countries are not allowed to be touched by others in North Korea, especially those who do not have gold blood.

S_s: 当一个国家专门从事于某一个领域之时，资本就会比其他领域更快地流向这一领域。
S_f: 当一个国家专门从事于某一个领域之时，资本和劳力就会比其他领域更快地流向这一领域。
T_s: When a country specializes in one area, capital flows to that area faster than others.
T_f: When a country specializes in one area, capital and labor flow to that area faster than others.

S_s: 如果，监管只能适用于年景好的时候，而年景糟糕的时候则由各国的纳税人买单，这个系统必定失败。

T_s: If regulation can only be applied in good times and taxpayers in various countries pay for bad times, the system is bound to fail.
T_f: If, at the European level, regulation can only be applied in good times and taxpayers in various countries pay for bad times, the system will surely fail.

S_s: 这是一个生死攸关的问题，在更普遍意义上，它决定了我们是否能实现生活中的成就与满足。

S_s: 在接下来的日子里，成千上万的突尼斯人聚集在市中心，庆祝突尼斯终于摆脱了老态龙钟的布尔吉巴导致的经济停滞。

S_s: 全世界，每四名五岁以下儿童就有一人发育不良，这表明长期营养不良造成了常常是不可逆转的生理伤害。
S_f: 全世界，每四名五岁以下儿童就有一人发育不良，这表明长期营养不良造成了常常是不可逆转的生理和认知伤害。

T_f: Worldwide, one in four children under the age of five is stunted, suggesting that long-term undernutrition causes often irreversible physical and cognitive damage.

S_s: 就至少有40个潜在的苏格兰寻求以某种方式从现在所处的国家独立。

T_f: In Europe alone, there are at least 40 potential Scotlands seeking independence in some way from where they are now.

S_s: 国家利用这一空间来掩埋过去的痛苦，如果不是掩埋过去自身的话。

T_s: Economic growth rates in many African countries typically exceed 5%, and the key to achieving this is stronger African leadership.
T_f: Economic growth rates in many African countries typically exceed 5%, and the key to achieving this is stronger African leadership and more credible governance.

S_s: 自二战以来，拉丁美洲各国似乎成了货币政策的实验室，尝试过汇率制度，其中有些效果尚可，大多非常失败。

S_s: 目前已经流传着多个改革方案，其中包括一项将缓解当前对商业地产税限制的第13号州宪法修正案的投票修改动议。

S_s: 由古希腊悲剧，电视情景喜剧所带来的间接体验他人痛苦的体验，都在扩张道德范围方面扮演着极为重要的角色。

S_s: 由于房地产是消费行为的驱动力，只要房价今后出现进一步大幅下跌的局面就必将削弱消费者的信心，使消费降低。

S_s: 人类本性并不完全在于唯利是图，它同样会从智拿巧取中得到满足，就像别出心裁绕过各种法规一样。

S_s: 我们这个从战争的灰烬中建立起来联盟，在一个日益不安全的世界上是一支维护和平与推进合作的力量。
S_f: 我们这个从战争的灰烬中建立起来联盟，在一个日益不安全和多极化的世界上是一支维护和平与推进合作的力量。
T_s: Forged from the ashes of war, our alliance is a force for peace and cooperation in an increasingly insecure world.
T_f: Forged from the ashes of war, our alliance is a force for peace and cooperation in an increasingly insecure and multipolar world.

S_s: 我们可以从一种保守的方式开始这种改变，即通过对我们所持有的教授头衔的意义进行再思考。
S_f: 我们可以从一种最为保守的方式开始这种改变，即通过对我们所持有的教授头衔的意义进行再思考。
T_s: We can start this change in a conservative way, by rethinking what it means to hold professorships.
T_f: We can start this change in the most conservative way possible, by rethinking what it means to hold professorships.

S_s: 在启蒙运动的曙光出现之前，在拥抱科学和自由之前，收入和生活水平在几百年里一直停滞不前。
S_f: 我们不能忘记，在启蒙运动的曙光出现之前，在拥抱科学和自由之前，收入和生活水平在几百年里一直停滞不前。
T_s: Before the dawn of the Enlightenment, before the embrace of science and freedom, incomes and living standards stagnated for hundreds of years.
T_f: We must not forget that before the dawn of the Enlightenment, before the embrace of science and freedom, incomes and living standards stagnated for hundreds of years.

S_s: 当缅甸在1997年加入东盟时，在整个地区只有21万名缅甸难民。

T_f: When Myanmar joined ASEAN in 1997, there were only 210,000 Burmese refugees and asylum seekers in the entire region.

T_f: Of course, these constraints existed centuries ago, before Malthus and Ricardo hypothesized, but

S_s: 生活在战区和失败国家的数百万绝望的人民别无选择，只能寻求富裕国家的庇护，不管这意味着多大的风险。
S_f: 当然，生活在战区和失败国家的数百万绝望的人民别无选择，只能寻求富裕国家的庇护，不管这意味着多大的风险。
T_s: Millions of desperate people living in war zones and in failed states have no choice but to seek refuge in rich countries, no matter how much risk that means.
T_f: Of course, millions of desperate people living in war zones and in failed states have no choice but to seek refuge in rich countries, no matter how much risk that means.

S_s: 当欧元区通过协调能够达成一致的立场的时候，这会有助于欧盟作为一个整体并在国际范围找到共识。
S_f: 当欧元区通过协调能够迅速地达成一致的立场的时候，这会有助于欧盟作为一个整体并在国际范围找到共识。
T_s: When the eurozone can reach a consistent position through coordination, it will help the EU as a whole and find consensus internationally.
T_f: When the eurozone can quickly reach an agreed position through coordination, it will help the EU as a whole and find consensus internationally.

S_s: 当时总理默克尔拒绝为全欧洲的金融机构担保，声称各国的烂摊子该由各国自己内部处理。
S_f: 当时德国总理默克尔拒绝为全欧洲的金融机构担保，声称各国的烂摊子该由各国自己内部处理。
T_s: At the time, Chancellor Angela Merkel refused to guarantee financial institutions across Europe, claiming that the mess in each country should be dealt with internally by each country.
T_f: At that time, German Chancellor Angela Merkel refused to guarantee financial institutions across Europe, claiming that the mess in each country should be dealt with internally by each country.

S_s: 当巴罗索在2004年上任的时候，人们一再询问他是否对欧洲未来有规划。
S_f: 当巴罗索在2004年上任的时候，人们一再询问他是否对欧洲未来有雄伟规划。
T_s: When Barroso took office in 2004, he was repeatedly asked if he had plans for Europe's future.
T_f: When Barroso took office in 2004, he was repeatedly asked whether he had grand plans for Europe's future.

S_s: 尽管这种观点可能有点夸张，但对于相信经济进步的人来说，它也不无可取之处。
S_f: 尽管这种观点可能有点夸张，但对于相信经济和社会进步的人来说，它也不无可取之处。
T_s: While this view may be exaggerated, it has merit for those who believe in economic progress.
T_f: While this view may be exaggerated, it is not without merit for those who believe in economic and social progress.

S_s: 尽管在这些领域表现出众的企业不少，但大部分仍严重缺乏这方面的能力。
S_f: 尽管在这些领域表现出众的日本企业不少，但大部分仍严重缺乏这方面的能力。
T_s: Although there are many companies that are outstanding in these fields, most of them still seriously lack the ability in this area.
T_f: Although there are many Japanese companies that are outstanding in these fields, most of them still lack the ability in this area.

S_s: 但这7,550亿美元可能仍会有7,350亿美元，也有可能低至7,000亿美元。

T_f: Despite higher rates, that $755 billion could still be $735 billion, or it could go as low as $700 billion.

S_s: 对其他的大国来说，2008年1月份到2009年1月份的年化需求情况有所不同。

T_f: For other major European countries, the annualized demand situation from January 2008 to January 2009 was different.

S_s: 对政治职位上瘾总是令人担忧的，因为当领导人不再认识到限制的时候，民主就会变成专制。
S_f: 对政治职位上瘾总是令人担忧的，因为当领导人不再认识到权力限制的时候，民主就会变成专制。
T_s: Addiction to political office is always a concern, because when leaders no longer recognize limits, democracies can turn authoritarian.
T_f: Addiction to political office is always a concern, because when leaders no longer recognize the limits of power, democracies can turn authoritarian.

S_s: 中情局催生了塔利班，在短短15年内，美国针对塔利班的政策重复了一遍。
S_f: 实际上，中情局催生了塔利班，在短短15年内，美国针对塔利班的政策重复了一遍。
T_s: The CIA gave birth to the Taliban, and in just 15 years, US policy against the Taliban repeated itself.
T_f: In effect, the CIA gave birth to the Taliban, and in just 15 years, US policy against the Taliban repeated itself.

S_s: 实现这一目标需要实施与当前这些改革不一样的做法。
S_f: 实现这一目标需要实施一些与当前这些改革不一样的做法。
T_s: Achieving this goal will require a different approach than these current reforms.
T_f: Achieving this goal will require implementing something different from the current reforms.

S_s: 它由里根在1984年引入，此后便一直是一个政治皮球，民主党总统取消。
S_f: 它由里根在1984年引入，此后便一直是一个政治皮球，民主党总统取消，共和党总统再找回。
T_s: It was introduced by Ronald Reagan in 1984 and has been a political football ever since, canceled by Democratic presidents.
T_f: It was introduced by Ronald Reagan in 1984 and has been a political rubber ball ever since, removed by Democratic presidents and reintroduced by Republicans.

S_s: 它保留了一丝正气，一个希望，那就是一个更美好的、巴勒斯坦人共享的社会是可以实现的
S_f: 它保留了一丝正气，一个希望，那就是一个更美好的、巴勒斯坦人和以色列人共享的社会是可以实现的
T_s: It retains a semblance of righteousness, a hope that a better society shared by Palestinians is achievable
T_f: It retains a semblance of righteousness, a hope that a better society shared by Palestinians and Israelis is achievable

S_s: 它们指责巴基斯坦要为各自首都喀布尔最近发生的骇人听闻的袭击事件负责，袭击目标包括一所大学和一家咖啡馆。
S_f: 它们指责巴基斯坦要为各自首都喀布尔和达卡最近发生的骇人听闻的袭击事件负责，袭击目标包括一所大学和一家咖啡馆。
T_s: They blame Pakistan for recent horrific attacks in their respective capitals, Kabul, which targeted a university and a cafe.
T_f: They blame Pakistan for recent horrific attacks in their respective capitals, Kabul and Dhaka, which targeted a university and a cafe.

S_s: 如果这一趋势持续下去，将构成生存威胁，它将阻挠急需的进一步一体化并摧毁其中所包含的欧洲思想。
S_f: 如果这一趋势持续下去，将构成欧盟的生存威胁，它将阻挠急需的进一步一体化并摧毁其中所包含的欧洲思想。
T_s: If this trend continues, it will pose an existential threat that will thwart much-needed further integration and destroy the European ideas contained within it.
T_f: If this trend continues, it will constitute an existential threat to the EU, preventing much-needed further integration and destroying the European mind contained within it.

S_s: 如果美国不能产生需要的赤字，全球经济将陷入储蓄过剩、需求低迷、资本廉价的局面，直到美国的替代者出现。
S_f: 如果美国不能或不愿产生需要的赤字，全球经济将陷入储蓄过剩、需求低迷、资本廉价的局面，直到美国的替代者出现。
T_s: If the U.S. cannot generate the deficit it needs, the global economy will be stuck in a savings glut, low demand, and cheap capital until a U.S. replacement emerges.
T_f: If the U.S. is unable or unwilling to run the deficits it needs, the global economy will be stuck in a savings glut, low demand, and cheap capital until a U.S. replacement emerges.

S_s: 如果法国能以自身愿意且有能力承担应有的份额来说服德国人，就足以为许多至今看来似乎不可能的妥协争取到空间。
S_f: 如果法国能以自身愿意且有能力承担应有的份额来说服德国人，就足以为许多至今看来似乎不可能的必要妥协争取到空间。
T_s: If France can convince the Germans that it is willing and able to take its fair share, that will be enough to make room for many compromises that have so far seemed impossible.
T_f: If France can convince the Germans that it is willing and able to take its fair share, that will be enough to make room for many of the necessary compromises that have so far seemed impossible.

S_s: 如果欧盟要制定一项针对新兴大国的政策，那么它必须用这些国家能理解的战略性语言进行交流。
S_f: 如果欧盟要制定一项针对新兴大国的成功政策，那么它必须用这些国家能理解的战略性语言进行交流。
T_s: If the EU is to formulate a policy targeting emerging powers, it must communicate in a strategic language that these countries understand.
T_f: If the EU is to develop a successful policy against emerging powers, it must communicate in a strategic language that these countries understand.

S_s: 那么最好的选择莫过于把这笔额外收入积攒起来，或者退而求其次，用它来偿还国家债务。
S_f: 如果是后者，那么最好的选择莫过于把这笔额外收入积攒起来，或者退而求其次，用它来偿还国家债务。

T_f: If it's the latter, then the best option is to save this extra income or, as a second-best option, use it to pay off the national debt.

S_s: 如果他指的是那些生活在现有领土上的人，那么这一数字将会大幅降低。

T_f: The government can also, if necessary, deal with the excessive debt that local governments increased in 2008 and 2009 with the encouragement of the central authorities.

S_s: 拉丁美洲已经有14个民主政体国家允许总统连任，其中7个国家规定总统可以连任，另外7个允许隔届当选。
S_f: 如今，拉丁美洲已经有14个民主政体国家允许总统连任，其中7个国家规定总统可以连任，另外7个允许隔届当选。
T_s: There are already 14 democracies in Latin America that allow the president to be re-elected, 7 of which stipulate that the president can be re-elected, and the other 7 allow alternate terms.
T_f: Today, there are 14 democracies in Latin America that allow the president to be re-elected, 7 of which stipulate that the president can be re-elected, and the other 7 allow alternate terms.

S_s: 我们必须将可持续发展纳入主流经济学，厘清现在和将来作为与不作为的成本，从而将理论付诸实践。
S_f: 如今，我们必须将可持续发展纳入主流经济学，厘清现在和将来作为与不作为的成本，从而将理论付诸实践。
T_s: We must bring sustainable development into mainstream economics and put theory into practice by clarifying the costs of action and inaction now and in the future.
T_f: Today, we must bring sustainable development into mainstream economics and put theory into practice by clarifying the costs of action and inaction now and in the future.

S_s: 国大党本身是连任两届的现任政府，其党员丑闻缠身，给人们的印象是无用、无能、腐败。
S_f: 如今，国大党本身是连任两届的现任政府，其党员丑闻缠身，给人们的印象是无用、无能、腐败。

T_f: Today, the Congress itself is a two-term incumbent government with scandal-ridden members and an impression of uselessness, incompetence, and corruption.

S_s: 因为特朗普的突然翻脸，伊朗和美国发生对抗的可能性死灰复燃，而这必然会加强伊朗代理力量的决心。
S_f: 如今，因为特朗普的突然翻脸，伊朗和美国发生对抗的可能性死灰复燃，而这必然会加强伊朗代理力量的决心。

T_f: Now, because of Trump's sudden turn of events, the possibility of confrontation between Iran and the United States has revived, and this will inevitably strengthen Iran's determination to act as a proxy.

S_s: 天主教会反对伽利略对哥白尼日心说的支持，教皇保罗二世为此在1992年进行了道歉。
S_f: 大部分人都知道，天主教会反对伽利略对哥白尼日心说的支持，教皇保罗二世为此在1992年进行了道歉。

T_f: As most people know, the Catholic Church objected to Galileo's support of Copernican's heliocentric theory, and Pope Paul II apologized for it in 1992.

S_s: 在本地区和外界很多人眼里，正义与发展党都是带有伊斯兰色彩的模范民主政党。
S_f: 多年来，在本地区和外界很多人眼里，正义与发展党都是带有伊斯兰色彩的模范民主政党。

S_s: 基础设施投资是特朗普日程的重要组成部分，放权给州也是美国共和党的流行做法，因此，美国有采取这一方针的空间。
S_f: 基础设施投资是特朗普日程的重要组成部分，放权给州也是美国共和党的流行做法，因此，美国绝对有采取这一方针的空间。

T_f: Infrastructure investment is an important part of Trump's agenda, and delegating power to the states is also a popular practice of the Republican Party in the United States. Therefore, there is definitely room for the United States to adopt this approach.

S_s: 美国不是盛气凌人地面对所有国家独自发号施令，也不是只着眼于谋取狭隘的企业利润。

T_f: In such a world, the United States is not domineering and calling the shots against all countries alone, nor is it focused only on narrow corporate profits.

S_s: 这一概念获得了一些新的标签。
S_f: 在此过程中，这一概念获得了一些新的标签。

S_s: 尽管变化速度不同，各地男孩与女孩间在教育水平上的差异都减少了。

T_f: Over this period, differences in educational attainment between boys and girls have decreased everywhere, albeit at different rates of change.

S_s: 全球气候政策这一概念将价值全无，几十年的气候警告将让位给宿命论。
S_f: 在最坏情形中，全球气候政策这一概念将价值全无，几十年的气候警告将让位给宿命论。
T_s: The notion of global climate policy will be worthless, and decades of climate warnings will give way to fatalism.
T_f: In the worst-case scenario, the concept of global climate policy will be worthless, and decades of climate warnings will give way to fatalism.

S_s: 作为一名教授首先要有对自己具有重要性的东西需要确认，然后就必须去确认它。
S_f: 在我看来，作为一名教授首先要有对自己具有重要性的东西需要确认，然后就必须去确认它。
T_s: As a professor, you must first confirm something that is important to you, and then you must confirm it.

S_f: 在巴勒斯坦，一个由民主选举产生的总统给新的和平机会带来了希望。
T_s: A democratically elected president offers hope for a new chance for peace.
T_f: In Palestine, a democratically elected president offers hope for a new chance for peace.

S_s: 健全资产管理的下一步就是要了解城市从收入和资产价格上涨中获得的收益是什么量级的。
S_f: 在了解市政资产的市场价值后，健全资产管理的下一步就是要了解城市从收入和资产价格上涨中获得的收益是什么量级的。

T_f: After understanding the market value of municipal assets, the next step in sound asset management is to understand the magnitude of the city's gains from revenue and asset price increases.

S_s: 以色列明确表示，若爆发新冲突，将以全面胜利为目标。

T_s: Israel has made it clear that if a new conflict breaks out, it will aim for overall victory.
T_f: After two draws with Hezbollah, Israel has made it clear that if a new conflict breaks out, it will aim for overall victory.

S_s: 在一个增长缓慢，债务高企，分配压力巨大的世界，通货膨胀究竟是死了还是仅仅休眠是一个问题。
S_f: 在一个增长缓慢，债务高企，分配压力巨大的世界，通货膨胀究竟是死了还是仅仅休眠是一个重要问题。

T_f: In a world of sluggish growth, high debt, and intense distributional pressures, whether inflation is dead or merely dormant is an important question.

S_s: 土耳其是受世界金融危机影响最小的几个国家之一，对外贸易持续增长，银行系统稳健，同时拥有兴旺发达的中小企业。
S_f: 土耳其是受世界金融危机影响最小的几个国家之一，对外贸易持续增长，银行系统稳健，同时拥有大量兴旺发达的中小企业。
T_s: Turkey is one of the few countries least affected by the world financial crisis. Its foreign trade continues to grow, its banking system is sound, and it has thriving small and medium-sized enterprises.

S_s: 两者之间区别似乎是因为近来这段高增长时期的城市化的扩张是由国内需求驱动，而非以出口为导向的工业化。

T_f: On November 2, as the world officially recognizes the International Day to End Impunity for Journalists, let us work together to keep these stories in the headlines.

S_s: 穆尔西借着捍卫革命之名，给自己赋予了绝对权力，当然这对于埃及来说并不新鲜。
S_f: 11月22日，穆尔西借着捍卫革命之名，给自己赋予了绝对权力，当然这对于埃及来说并不新鲜。
T_s: In the name of defending the revolution, Morsi has given himself absolute power, which of course is nothing new for Egypt.
T_f: On November 22, Morsi gave himself absolute power in the name of defending the revolution. Of course, this is nothing new for Egypt.

S_s: 它必须在其他关键事务上与欧盟开展强劲的合作，比如安全、外交和气候政策。
S_f: 首先，它必须在其他关键事务上与欧盟开展强劲的合作，比如安全、外交和气候政策。
T_s: It must cooperate strongly with the EU on other key issues, such as security, foreign and climate policy.
T_f: First, it must cooperate strongly with the EU on other key issues, such as security, foreign and climate policy.

S_s: 神枪手瞄准开枪，只是这一次他们的目标不是黑熊，而是齐奥塞斯库本人。
S_f: 隐藏在森林里的神枪手瞄准开枪，只是这一次他们的目标不是黑熊，而是齐奥塞斯库本人。
T_s: The sharpshooters took aim and fired, only this time their target was not the bear, but Ceausescu himself.
T_f: The sharpshooters hidden in the forest took aim and fired, only this time their target was not the bear, but Ceausescu himself.

S_s: 随着信息技术的不断革命，即便发展所需的很多商品成本会不断上涨，但电话和电脑所需的成本却会越来越低。
S_f: 随着信息和通讯技术的不断革命，即便发展所需的很多商品成本会不断上涨，但电话和电脑所需的成本却会越来越低。
T_s: With the continuous revolution of information technology, even though the cost of many goods needed for development will continue to rise, the cost of telephones and computers will continue to decrease.
T_f: As the information and communication technology continues to revolutionize, even though the cost of many goods needed for development will continue to rise, the cost of telephones and computers will continue to decrease.

S_s: 银行面临着资本准备金的要求，这迫使他们根据自身所拥有的资源，而不得不减少对外借贷。
S_f: 银行面临着更高的资本准备金的要求，这迫使他们根据自身所拥有的资源，而不得不减少对外借贷。
T_s: Banks face capital reserve requirements, which force them to reduce external borrowing according to the resources they have.
T_f: Banks face higher capital reserve requirements, which forces them to reduce external borrowing according to their own resources.

S_s: 那种从太空看到的地球图像具有心理影响，并且我们都看到了这种影响。
S_f: 那种从太空看到的地球图像具有深刻的心理影响，并且我们都看到了这种影响。
T_s: That image of Earth seen from space has a psychological effect, and we've all seen it.
T_f: That image of Earth seen from space has a profound psychological impact, and we've all seen it.

S_s: 增长合作战略的各个部分得以被识别、评估和组装。
S_f: 通过这一程序，增长合作战略的各个部分得以被识别、评估和组装。
T_s: The various components of a growth partnership strategy are identified, evaluated and assembled.
T_f: Through this process, the various components of a growth partnership strategy are identified, evaluated and assembled.

S_s: 通过基于技能的研讨班，我们试图用能够辨别俄罗斯伪造的消息的工具来武装人民。
S_f: 通过基于技能的研讨班和假新闻识别运动，我们试图用能够辨别俄罗斯伪造的消息的工具来武装人民。
T_s: Through skills-based workshops, we seek to arm people with the tools to spot Russian disinformation.
T_f: Through skills-based workshops and fake news identification campaigns, we seek to arm people with the tools to spot Russian fake news.

S_s: 这项原则被写入了国际文件，其中最早的是1948年发表的《世界人权宣言》。
S_f: 这项原则被写入了很多国际文件，其中最早的是1948年发表的《世界人权宣言》。
T_s: This principle was enshrined in international documents, the earliest of which was the Universal Declaration of Human Rights published in 1948.
T_f: This principle has been written into many international documents, the earliest of which is the Universal Declaration of Human Rights published in 1948.

S_s: 这里曾经是举世公认的发源地，而如今，这座全球首屈一指的科技枢纽正在日益受到质疑和怨恨。
S_f: 这里曾经是举世公认的创新发源地，而如今，这座全球首屈一指的科技枢纽正在日益受到质疑和怨恨。
T_s: Once a universally recognized birthplace, today the world's premier tech hub is increasingly being met with suspicion and resentment.
T_f: Once a universally recognized birthplace of innovation, the world's premier tech hub is now increasingly questioned and resented.

S_s: 这部法律目前只影响到什叶派少数族裔，不过或许会影响到可能限制非什叶派妇女权利的法案。
S_f: 这部法律目前只影响到什叶派少数族裔，不过或许会影响到可能限制非什叶派妇女权利的即将表决的法案。
T_s: The law currently only affects the Shia minority, though it could affect bills that could limit the rights of non-Shia women.
T_f: The law currently only affects the Shia minority, but could affect upcoming bills that could limit the rights of non-Shia women.

S_s: 这让像萨尔科奇那样的批评者安慰，并且给他们压力，由于欧洲央行通胀的偏向对欧元的影响而放弃之。
S_f: 这让像萨尔科奇那样的欧洲央行的批评者安慰，并且给他们压力，由于欧洲央行通胀的偏向对欧元的影响而放弃之。
T_s: That comforts critics like Sarkozy and puts pressure on them to abandon the ECB because of its inflationary bias on the euro.
T_f: This comforts ECB critics like Sarkozy and puts pressure on them to abandon the ECB due to its inflationary bias on the euro.

S_s: 她在商业和政治这两大职业领域中都有出色的表现，其魅力也不容小觑。
S_f: 这样看来，她在商业和政治这两大职业领域中都有出色的表现，其魅力也不容小觑。
T_s: She has excelled in both career fields, business and politics, and her charisma should not be underestimated.
T_f: In this light, she has excelled in two career fields, business and politics, and her charisma should not be underestimated.

S_s: 这是一种其中通过克隆出原有产品的虚拟单位，从现有的房贷证券中衍生出来的证券产品。
S_f: 这是一种其中通过克隆出原有产品的虚拟单位，从现有的房贷证券中衍生出来的复杂组合证券产品。
T_s: This is a security product in which virtual units are derived from existing mortgage securities by cloning virtual units of the original product.
T_f: This is a complex portfolio security product in which a virtual unit of the original product is cloned from an existing mortgage security.

S_s: 这对于政府官员来说并不总是一件也让人舒服的事情，并且在公开敏感材料的问题上还存在着斗争。
S_f: 这对于政府官员来说并不总是一件也让人舒服的事情，并且在公开敏感材料的问题上还存在着激烈的斗争。
T_s: It's not always a comfortable thing for government officials, and there are struggles over releasing sensitive material.
T_f: It's not always a comfortable thing for government officials, and there are fierce battles over releasing sensitive material.

S_s: 海滩让我们知道，团结就是力量，能够摧毁一切危险，不管它多么大。
S_f: 这些海滩让我们知道，团结就是力量，能够摧毁一切危险，不管它多么大。
T_s: The beach taught us that togetherness is strength and can destroy any danger, no matter how great.
T_f: These beaches let us know that togetherness is strength and can destroy any danger, no matter how big.

S_s: 数字并不能识别最优秀的环境友好型解决方案，只能揭示哪些公司目前排放了最多的温室气体。
S_f: 这些数字并不能识别最优秀的环境友好型解决方案，只能揭示哪些公司目前排放了最多的温室气体。
T_s: Numbers do not identify the best environmentally friendly solutions, only which companies are currently emitting the most greenhouse gases.
T_f: These numbers do not identify the best environmentally friendly solutions, only which companies are currently emitting the most greenhouse gases.

S_s: 国家如今需要痛苦、深远的改革以实现经济繁荣，这既是目标，也是文化变革的先决条件。
S_f: 这些国家如今需要痛苦、深远的改革以实现经济繁荣，这既是目标，也是文化变革的先决条件。
T_s: The country now needs painful, far-reaching reforms to achieve economic prosperity, which is both a goal and a prerequisite for cultural change.
T_f: These countries now require painful, far-reaching reforms to achieve economic prosperity, which is both a goal and a prerequisite for cultural change.

S_s: 这也是为什么欧洲议会在11月全票通过，只有当该行为规范具备法律约束力时才能解除武器禁售。
S_f: 这也是为什么欧洲议会在11月全票通过，只有当该行为规范具备法律约束力时才能解除对华武器禁售。
T_s: That's why the European Parliament voted unanimously in November to lift the arms embargo only if the code of conduct becomes legally binding.
T_f: This is why the European Parliament voted unanimously in November to lift the arms embargo on China only when the code of conduct is legally binding.

S_s: 这两大领域疲软已久，是周期动态中的主要拖累因素，在传统上，周期动态总会将美国带出经济减速。
S_f: 这两大领域疲软已久，是周期动态中的主要拖累因素，在传统上，周期动态总会将美国带出暂时性的经济减速。
T_s: These two areas have been weak for a long time and are the main drags in the cyclical dynamics that have traditionally always carried the US out of economic slowdowns.
T_f: These two areas have been weak for a long time and are major drags in the cyclical dynamics that have traditionally brought the US out of temporary economic slowdowns.

S_s: 这一冲动可以从欧洲议会主席马丁·舒尔茨激烈的评论中一窥端倪。
S_f: 这一自利冲动可以从欧洲议会主席马丁·舒尔茨激烈的评论中一窥端倪。
T_s: This impulse can be seen in the fierce comments of European Parliament President Martin Schulz.
T_f: This self-serving impulse can be seen in the fierce comments of European Parliament President Martin Schulz.

S_s: 这一政治关系也许给这家银行续了几年性命，直到零碎干预导致市场方案已经无从下手。
S_f: 这一政治关系也许给这家银行续了几年性命，直到前后矛盾的零碎干预导致市场方案已经无从下手。
T_s: That political connection may have kept the bank alive for a few years, until piecemeal interventions rendered market programs impossible.
T_f: That political connection may have kept the bank alive for a few years, until inconsistent and piecemeal interventions made it impossible for market programs to be implemented.

S_s: 问题仍不在于谁抛出了更好的政策或是更靠谱的想法，而在于演讲的表现。
S_f: 这一回，问题仍不在于谁抛出了更好的政策或是更靠谱的想法，而在于演讲的表现。
T_s: The question is still not who came up with better policies or more solid ideas, but how the speeches performed.
T_f: This time, again, the question wasn't who came up with better policies or sounder ideas, but how the speeches performed.

S_s: 阿卜杜拉国王十分坚定地认为约旦人民应该在2012年之前获得自由公平选举的权利。
S_f: 过去一年来，阿卜杜拉国王十分坚定地认为约旦人民应该在2012年之前获得自由公平选举的权利。
T_s: King Abdullah firmly believes that the Jordanian people should have the right to free and fair elections by 2012.
T_f: For the past year, King Abdullah has firmly believed that the Jordanian people should have the right to free and fair elections by 2012.

S_s: 2000年的普京承诺要驯服在前任鲍里斯?叶利钦时期恣意妄为的资本主义。
S_f: 跟一个半世纪前的贝隆一样，2000年的普京承诺要驯服在前任鲍里斯?叶利钦时期恣意妄为的资本主义。
T_s: Putin in 2000 promised to tame the unruly capitalism of his predecessor Boris Yeltsin.
T_f: Like Peron a century and a half earlier, Putin in 2000 promised to tame the unruly capitalism of his predecessor Boris Yeltsin.

S_s: 财政政策是显而易见的替代方案，但国会在最糟糕的时候选择了减税，这使得需要的时候不再有刺激空间。
S_f: 财政政策是显而易见的替代方案，但国会在最糟糕的时候选择了减税，这使得真正需要的时候不再有刺激空间。
T_s: Fiscal policy was the obvious alternative, but Congress opted for tax cuts at the worst possible time, leaving no room for stimulus when needed.
T_f: Fiscal policy was the obvious alternative, but Congress opted for tax cuts at the worst possible time, leaving no room for stimulus when it was really needed.

S_s: 该项目于2014年启动，并已经在埃塞俄比亚等两个非洲国家得到成功实施。
S_f: 该项目于2014年启动，并已经在埃塞俄比亚和塞内加尔等两个非洲国家得到成功实施。
T_s: The project was launched in 2014 and has been successfully implemented in two African countries including Ethiopia.
T_f: The project was launched in 2014 and has been successfully implemented in two African countries including Ethiopia and Senegal.

S_s: 该理由的支持者难以解释英国可以与欧盟缔结何种贸易协定，更不用说这些协定如何能够优于当前安排了。
S_f: 该理由的支持者难以解释英国可以与欧盟缔结何种贸易和合作伙伴协定，更不用说这些协定如何能够优于当前安排了。
T_s: Proponents of this rationale struggle to explain what kind of trade agreements Britain could strike with the EU, let alone how they could be superior to current arrangements.
T_f: Proponents of this rationale struggle to explain what kind of trade and partnership agreements the UK could have with the EU, let alone how they could be superior to current arrangements.

S_s: 该提议的逻辑是如果股东买卖自身的股票，企业高管就被迫要在每季度都实现高收益，以确保股价不会下降。
S_f: 该提议的逻辑是如果股东频繁买卖自身的股票，企业高管就被迫要在每季度都实现高收益，以确保股价不会下降。
T_s: The logic of the proposal is that if shareholders buy and sell their own stock, corporate executives are forced to deliver high earnings every quarter to ensure that the stock price does not fall.
T_f: The logic of the proposal is that if shareholders frequently buy and sell their own shares, corporate executives are forced to realize high earnings every quarter to ensure that the stock price does not fall.

S_s: 该合同将以标准普尔及蔡斯席勒住房价格指数进行结算，该指数源于我近20年前开发研究得出的学术成果。
S_f: 该合同将以标准普尔及蔡斯席勒住房价格指数进行结算，该指数源于我和同事蔡斯近20年前开发研究得出的学术成果。
T_s: The contract will be settled against the Standard & Poor's and Chase-Shiller Home Price Index, which is derived from the academic results of research I developed nearly 20 years ago.
T_f: The contract will be settled against the Standard & Poor's and the Chase-Shiller Home Price Index, derived from academic work developed by my colleague Chase nearly 20 years ago.

S_s: 结局肯定不会像电影那样戏剧化，因为美联储不像汉斯那样以接管市场为目标。
S_f: 话虽如此，结局肯定不会像电影那样戏剧化，因为美联储不像汉斯那样以接管市场为目标。
T_s: The ending will certainly not be as dramatic as the movie, because the Fed does not aim to take over the market like Hans.
T_f: That being said, the ending certainly won't be as dramatic as the movie, since the Fed doesn't aim to take over the markets like Hans did.

S_s: 许多非洲国家利用过去十年实行了有效的经济政策，而这些政策带来了强劲的经济增长以及低通货膨胀。
S_f: 许多非洲国家利用过去十年实行了有效和可持续的经济政策，而这些政策带来了强劲的经济增长以及低通货膨胀。
T_s: Many African countries have used the past decade to implement effective economic policies that have resulted in strong economic growth and low inflation.
T_f: Many African countries have used the past decade to implement effective and sustainable economic policies that have resulted in strong economic growth and low inflation.

S_s: 许多国家的银行系统也比以前更加可靠，而它们的公共债务比率尽管有所上升，仍处于较低水平，偿债能力风险很小。
S_f: 许多国家的银行系统也比以前更加可靠，而它们的公共和私人债务比率尽管有所上升，仍处于较低水平，偿债能力风险很小。
T_s: Banking systems in many countries are also more reliable than before, while their public debt ratios, although rising, remain low, with little risk to their solvency.
T_f: Banking systems in many countries are also more reliable than before, while their public and private debt ratios, although rising, remain low, with little risk to their solvency.

S_s: 许多国家仍然需要改善防卫并且落实联合国制定的有关反恐的文书，包括反对资助恐怖份子的公约。
S_f: 许多国家仍然需要改善防卫并且落实联合国制定的16项有关反恐的文书，包括反对资助恐怖份子的公约。
T_s: Many countries still need to improve their defenses and implement United Nations counter-terrorism instruments, including the Convention against Terrorist Financing.
T_f: Many countries still need to improve their defenses and implement 16 United Nations instruments related to counterterrorism, including the Convention against Terrorist Financing.

S_s: 要想解决这个问题，公民不仅需要体制支持，还需要获得更好的工具，来要求各方尊重他们的健康权。
S_f: 要想解决这个问题，全球健康公民不仅需要体制支持，还需要获得更好的工具，来要求各方尊重他们的健康权。
T_s: To tackle this problem, citizens need not only institutional support, but also better tools to demand respect for their right to health.
T_f: To address this issue, global health citizens need not only institutional support, but also better tools to demand respect for their right to health.

S_s: 要想确保美联储的独立性这一全球范围内最重要的公共利益，奥巴马应该解除美联储核心角色之外的权力。
S_f: 要想确保美联储的独立性这一全球范围内最重要的公共利益，奥巴马应该解除美联储核心角色之外的所有权力。
T_s: To ensure the Fed's independence, the most important public interest in the world, Obama should remove powers outside the central bank's central role.
T_f: To ensure the Fed's independence, the most important public interest in the world, Obama should remove all powers outside the central bank's central role.

S_s: 虽然这场丑闻中的许多指控都是站不住脚的，但却已经成功令军方不敢再肆意挑战权威了。
S_f: 虽然这场丑闻中的许多指控都是站不住脚的，但却已经成功令军方不敢再肆意挑战总理的权威了。
T_s: While many of the allegations in the scandal are flimsy, they have succeeded in deterring the military from wantonly challenging authority.
T_f: While many of the allegations in the scandal are flimsy, they have succeeded in deterring the military from wantonly challenging the prime minister's authority.

S_s: 虽然经济起伏令人伤透脑筋，但过去50年为我们带来了全球经济增长红利。
S_f: 虽然经济起伏令人伤透脑筋，但过去50年为我们带来了前所未有的全球经济增长红利。
T_s: While the ups and downs are nerve-wracking, the last 50 years have paid us dividends in global economic growth.
T_f: While the ups and downs have been mind-numbing, the past 50 years have brought us unprecedented dividends in global economic growth.

S_s: 虽然无法证明企实现了减排，但是证明这一点的可实行性。
S_f: 虽然无法证明企业以最小的代价实现了减排，但是证明这一点的可实行性。
T_s: Although it is impossible to prove that the company has achieved emission reductions, it can prove the feasibility of this point.
T_f: Although it is impossible to prove that the company has achieved emission reduction at the least cost, it can prove the feasibility of this point.

S_s: 虽然投资银行家们没有倾家荡产，今年又赚得盆盈钵满，但这只是枝节问题。
S_f: 虽然投资银行家们去年12月没有倾家荡产，今年又赚得盆盈钵满，但这只是枝节问题。
T_s: Although the investment bankers have not lost their fortunes and have made a lot of money this year, this is just a side issue.
T_f: While the investment bankers didn't lose their fortunes last December and are making a lot of money this year, that's a side issue.

S_s: 荷、比、卢经济联盟三国反对由大国派人担任新的欧盟理事会主席。
S_f: 荷、比、卢经济联盟三国和其它几个欧盟小国反对由大国派人担任新的欧盟理事会主席。
T_s: The three countries of the Economic Union of the Netherlands, Belgium, and Luxembourg oppose the appointment of someone from a major country as the new President of the EU Council.
T_f: The Netherlands, Belgium, Luxembourg, and several other small EU countries oppose the appointment of someone from a major country as the new President of the EU Council.

S_s: 历史学家弗里茨·施特恩写过一本有关德国的书，书名是《对文化绝望的政治》。
S_f: 若干年前，历史学家弗里茨·施特恩写过一本有关德国的书，书名是《对文化绝望的政治》。
T_s: The historian Fritz Stern wrote a book on Germany called The Politics of Cultural Despair.
T_f: Some years ago the historian Fritz Stern wrote a book on Germany entitled The Politics of Cultural Despair.

S_s: 自从通过一场政变获得权力后，穆沙拉夫至少已经躲过了三次严重的暗伤图谋。

T_s: Radical Palestinians know that capturing an Israeli soldier or civilian will either lead to conflict or be a valuable bargaining chip in exchange for prisoners.
T_f: Radical Palestinians, as well as Lebanese, know that capturing an Israeli soldier or civilian will either lead to conflict or be a valuable bargaining chip in exchange for prisoners.

S_s: 波兰可能会发现它和其它大小相近的国家在安全及其它方面有着共同的利益。
S_f: 波兰可能会发现它和现欧盟的其它大小相近的国家在安全及其它方面有着共同的利益。
T_s: Poland may find that it shares security and other interests with other countries of similar size.
T_f: Poland may find that it shares security and other interests with other countries of similar size in the current European Union.

S_s: 法国引导利比亚运作，并试图对伊朗实施更严厉的制裁，正如其提供对联合国的支持一样。
S_f: 法国引导利比亚运作，并试图对伊朗实施更严厉的制裁，正如其提供对联合国在科特迪瓦的支持一样。
T_s: France steers Libya and is trying to impose tougher sanctions on Iran, just as it offers support to the United Nations.
T_f: France steers Libya and is trying to impose tougher sanctions on Iran, just as it offers support to the United Nations in C?te d'Ivoire.

S_s: 今天合作的空间更大，这对欧元是有利的。
S_f: 毫无疑问，今天合作的空间更大，这对欧元是有利的。
T_s: There is more room for cooperation today, which is good for the euro.
T_f: There is no doubt that there is more room for cooperation today, which is good for the euro.

S_s: 如果美国经济陷入大麻烦，就会对欧洲、日本和其他许多国家造成负面影响。
S_f: 毕竟，如果美国经济陷入大麻烦，就会对欧洲、日本和其他许多国家造成负面影响。
T_s: If the U.S. economy gets into major trouble, it will have a negative impact on Europe, Japan, and many other countries.
T_f: After all, if the U.S. economy were to get into major trouble, it would have negative repercussions for Europe, Japan, and many other countries.

S_s: 人民力量党是在他信的泰爱泰党的残部上建立的，而泰爱泰党在政变后遭到解散。
S_f: 毕竟，人民力量党是在他信的泰爱泰党的残部上建立的，而泰爱泰党在政变后遭到解散。
T_s: The People's Power Party was founded on the remnants of Thaksin's Thai Rak Thai Party, which was disbanded after the coup.
T_f: After all, the People's Power Party was founded on the remnants of Thaksin's Thai Rak Thai Party, which was disbanded after the coup.

S_s: 每一天我们都会看到新闻日益受到威胁乃至袭击，不管是来自领导人，还是因为不可持续的商业模式所赐。
S_f: 每一天我们都会看到新闻日益受到威胁乃至袭击，不管是来自极权主义领导人，还是因为不可持续的商业模式所赐。
T_s: Every day we see news increasingly threatened and attacked, whether by leaders or by unsustainable business models.
T_f: Every day we see news increasingly threatened and attacked, whether by totalitarian leaders or by unsustainable business models.

S_s: 日渐增多的反抗反映了公众意识到当局已经开始害怕民众的力量，当面对愤怒的抗议者时趋向于对他们的要求让步。
S_f: 此外，日渐增多的反抗反映了公众意识到当局已经开始害怕民众的力量，当面对愤怒的抗议者时趋向于对他们的要求让步。
T_s: The growing resistance reflects a public awareness that authorities have come to fear the power of the people and tend to give in to their demands when faced with angry protesters.
T_f: Moreover, the growing resistance reflects a public awareness that authorities have come to fear popular power and tend to give in to their demands when faced with angry protesters.

S_s: 当有证据确凿、风险近在眼前时，政府必须反击，就像澳大利亚做的那样。
S_f: 此外，当有证据确凿、风险近在眼前时，政府必须反击，就像澳大利亚做的那样。
T_s: When the evidence is overwhelming and the risks are imminent, governments must fight back, as Australia has done.
T_f: Moreover, when the evidence is overwhelming and the risks are imminent, the government must fight back, as Australia has done.

S_s: 即使在这一乐观情景中，意大利、西班牙和其他外围国的经常项目赤字问题仍得不到解决。
S_f: 此外，即使在这一乐观情景中，意大利、西班牙和其他外围国的经常项目赤字问题仍得不到解决。
T_s: Even in this optimistic scenario, the current account deficits of Italy, Spain and other peripheral countries remain unresolved.
T_f: Moreover, even in this optimistic scenario, the current account deficits of Italy, Spain and other peripheral countries remain unresolved.

S_s: 全球经济和气候委员会估计这样的城市可以在今后15年减少对城市基础建设的资金需求超过3万亿。
S_f: 此外，全球经济和气候委员会估计这样的城市可以在今后15年减少对城市基础建设的资金需求超过3万亿。
T_s: The Global Economic and Climate Council estimates that such cities could reduce the need for urban infrastructure by more than $3 trillion over the next 15 years.
T_f: Furthermore, the Global Economic and Climate Council estimates that such cities could reduce the need for urban infrastructure funding by more than $3 trillion over the next 15 years.

S_s: 他们准备在国家层面，而不是在整个欧元区层面做这件事。
S_f: 此外，他们准备在国家层面，而不是在整个欧元区层面做这件事。
T_s: They are prepared to do it at the national level, not at the level of the eurozone as a whole.
T_f: Moreover, they are prepared to do it at the national level, not at the level of the entire eurozone.

S_s: 正如参议院金融委员会的方案草案所指出的，美国应该抛弃其原则，采用领地制度对美国跨国公司海外利润课税。
S_f: 正如参议院金融委员会的方案草案所指出的，美国应该抛弃其全球公司税原则，采用领地制度对美国跨国公司海外利润课税。
T_s: As the Senate Finance Committee draft proposal states, the United States should abandon its principles and adopt a territorial system to tax the foreign profits of US multinationals.
T_f: As pointed out in the Senate Finance Committee's draft plan, the United States should abandon its global corporate tax principles and adopt a territorial system to tax the overseas profits of US multinational corporations.

S_s: 格鲁吉亚不断地向亲西方靠拢，包括和北约的联系，一直是莫斯科的眼睛中的一粒沙子。
S_f: 格鲁吉亚不断地向亲西方靠拢，包括和北约不断加强的联系，一直是莫斯科的眼睛中的一粒沙子。
T_s: Georgia's continued pro-Western moves, including ties to NATO, have been a grain of sand in Moscow's eye.
T_f: Georgia's continued pro-Western moves, including its growing ties with NATO, have been a grain of sand in Moscow's eye.

S_s: 某些主要石油盈余国家，最为主要的是伊朗一直是当今世界秩序的敌人，现在它们的羽翼已经被剪除。
S_f: 某些主要石油盈余国家，最为主要的是伊朗、委内瑞拉以及俄罗斯一直是当今世界秩序的敌人，现在它们的羽翼已经被剪除。
T_s: Certain major oil-surplus countries, most notably Iran, have been enemies of the present world order and have now had their wings clipped.
T_f: Certain major oil-surplus countries, most notably Iran, Venezuela, and Russia, have been enemies of the current world order and have now had their wings clipped.

S_s: 技术可以让劳动者雇佣所需资本，并以前所未有的自主权工作。
S_f: 未来，技术可以让劳动者雇佣所需资本，并以前所未有的自主权工作。
T_s: Technology allows workers to hire the capital they need and work with unprecedented autonomy.
T_f: In the future, technology will allow workers to hire the capital they need and work with unprecedented autonomy.

S_s: 该新兴细分人口群体将成为地区经济政治发展的基石，对世界其他国家也将产生显著的影响。
S_f: 未来几十年，该新兴细分人口群体将成为地区经济政治发展的基石，对世界其他国家也将产生显著的影响。
T_s: This emerging demographic segment will become the cornerstone of the region's economic and political development, and will have a significant impact on the rest of the world.
T_f: In the coming decades, this emerging demographic segment will become the cornerstone of the region's economic and political development, with significant implications for the rest of the world.

S_s: 这些措施有望将土耳其纳入欧洲大家庭，从而阻止它朝远离我们的共同欧洲价值的方向越滑越远。
S_f: 最重要的是，这些措施有望将土耳其纳入欧洲大家庭，从而阻止它朝远离我们的共同欧洲价值的方向越滑越远。
T_s: These measures promise to bring Turkey into the European family and thus stop it from slipping further and further away from our common European values.
T_f: Most importantly, these measures promise to bring Turkey into the European family and thus stop it from slipping further and further away from our common European values.

S_s: 在埃及成为美国盟友并与以色列和解后，美国在该地区的地位提高了。
S_f: 最终，在埃及成为美国盟友并与以色列和解后，美国在该地区的地位提高了。
T_s: After Egypt became a U.S. ally and reconciled with Israel, the U.S. position in the region improved.
T_f: Ultimately, after Egypt became an American ally and reconciled with Israel, the U.S. position in the region improved.

S_s: 在美国，二战的逼近以及伴随而生的军工产品需求使得私人部门雇主开始以可接受的工资水平雇用长期失业者。
S_f: 最后，在美国，二战的逼近以及伴随而生的军工产品需求使得私人部门雇主开始以可接受的工资水平雇用长期失业者。
T_s: In the United States, the looming of World War II and the accompanying demand for military-industrial goods led private-sector employers to hire the long-term unemployed at acceptable wages.
T_f: Finally, in the United States, the approach of World War II and the accompanying demand for military-industrial goods led private sector employers to hire the long-term unemployed at acceptable wages.

S_s: 明天的中东将与短短两个月前大不一样，但未来的局势如何尚不得而知。
S_f: 明天的中东将与短短两个月前大不一样，但该地区未来的局势如何尚不得而知。
T_s: Tomorrow's Middle East will be very different from what it was just two months ago, but what the future holds remains unknown.
T_f: The Middle East of tomorrow will be very different from what it was just two months ago, but what the future holds for the region remains unclear.

S_s: 无法处理这些问题以及领导人就可能有建立从耶路撒冷经过贝鲁特直到德黑兰的更不稳定的弧形的风险。
S_f: 无法处理这些问题以及领导人就可能有建立从耶路撒冷经过贝鲁特、大马士革、巴格达直到德黑兰的更不稳定的弧形的风险。
T_s: Failure to address these issues and leaders risks establishing an even more unstable arc from Jerusalem through Beirut to Tehran.
T_f: Failure to address these issues and leaders risks establishing a more unstable arc stretching from Jerusalem through Beirut, Damascus, Baghdad and on to Tehran.

S_s: 新一代药理学向实现这一目标迈出了一步。
S_f: 新一代药理学向实现这一目标迈出了充满希望的一步。
T_s: A new generation of pharmacology is a step toward achieving this goal.
T_f: A new generation of pharmacology is a promising step toward this goal.

S_s: 数百人在冲突中死亡，许多居民区被毁，约有40万人沦为难民。
S_f: 数百人在冲突中死亡，许多居民区整个被毁，约有40万人沦为难民。
T_s: Hundreds of people died in the conflict, many residential areas were destroyed, and about 400,000 people became refugees.
T_f: Hundreds of people died in the conflict, many residential areas were completely destroyed, and about 400,000 people became refugees.

S_s: 二十年的经济扩张提高了年轻人对好工作的预期，但并没有很大地提升供应这类工作的能力。
S_f: 撒哈拉以南非洲二十年的经济扩张提高了年轻人对好工作的预期，但并没有很大地提升供应这类工作的能力。
T_s: Two decades of economic expansion have raised young people's expectations of good jobs, but have not greatly improved the ability to supply them.
T_f: Two decades of economic expansion in sub-Saharan Africa has raised young people's expectations of good jobs, but has not greatly increased the ability to supply them.

S_s: 搬到其他地方并且购买一套新公寓对大多数工人来说几乎是不可能的，这使他们非常缺乏流动性。
S_f: 搬到其他地方并且购买一套新公寓对大多数俄罗斯工人来说几乎是不可能的，这使他们非常缺乏流动性。
T_s: Moving elsewhere and buying a new apartment is next to impossible for most workers, making them highly illiquid.
T_f: Moving elsewhere and buying a new apartment is next to impossible for most Russian workers, making them highly illiquid.

S_s: 一个弱势美元对贸易平衡的作用以及因此对增长的影响会受到两个因素的限制。
S_f: 或许更重要的是，一个弱势美元对贸易平衡的作用以及因此对增长的影响会受到两个因素的限制。
T_s: The impact of a weak dollar on the trade balance, and thus growth, is limited by two factors.
T_f: Perhaps more importantly, the effect of a weak dollar on the trade balance, and thus growth, is limited by two factors.

S_s: 我花了3年时间才在法庭上胜诉，幸运的是，俄国并没有对审判结果提出上诉。
S_f: 我花了3年时间才在伦敦的法庭上胜诉，幸运的是，俄国并没有对审判结果提出上诉。
T_s: It took me 3 years to win my case in court, luckily Russia did not appeal the outcome of the trial.
T_f: It took me 3 years to win my case in a London court, luckily Russia did not appeal the outcome of the trial.

S_s: 我将把这一举措推向极致，任何一个国家都不会在投资开放程度上超越英国。
S_f: 我将把这一举措推向极致，任何一个西方国家都不会在投资开放程度上超越英国。
T_s: I will take this to the extreme, no country will be more open to investment than the UK.
T_f: I will take this initiative to the extreme, and no western country will surpass the UK in terms of investment openness.

S_s: 我拜访一位朋友，本来只打算待两星期，结果却因为太喜欢那里而待了五年之久。
S_f: 我到马里兰州拜访一位朋友，本来只打算待两星期，结果却因为太喜欢那里而待了五年之久。
T_s: I was visiting a friend who was supposed to stay only two weeks but ended up staying five years because I liked it so much.
T_f: I visited a friend in Maryland for two weeks, but ended up staying five years because I liked it so much.

S_s: 我们这些当时活跃在金融市场上的人还清楚地记得那次事件标志着大萧条后的全球金融危机启动。
S_f: 我们这些当时活跃在金融市场上的人还清楚地记得那次事件标志着大萧条后最严重的全球金融危机启动。
T_s: Those of us who were active in financial markets at the time remember well that event that marked the start of the global financial crisis that followed the Great Depression.
T_f: Those of us who were active in financial markets at the time remember well that event that marked the start of the worst global financial crisis since the Great Depression.

S_s: 我与世界顶尖经济学家一起正在做这个尝试，我们开发了一套150年来记分卡。
S_f: 我与21位世界顶尖经济学家一起正在做这个尝试，我们开发了一套150年来记分卡。
T_s: I'm trying to do this with some of the world's leading economists, and we've developed a 150-year scorecard.
T_f: I'm doing this with 21 of the world's leading economists, and we've developed a 150-year scorecard.

S_s: 用欣欣向荣的波兰来和逐渐崩溃的西班牙对照是不准确的。
S_f: 当然，用欣欣向荣的波兰来和逐渐崩溃的西班牙对照是不准确的。
T_s: It is inaccurate to compare the thriving Poland with the gradually collapsing Spain.
T_f: Of course, it is inaccurate to compare the thriving Poland with the gradually collapsing Spain.

S_s: 希腊的退出之举可能会对西班牙这样的国家起到警示作用，在这些国家，强烈反欧洲反建制的呼声正在上升。
S_f: 希腊的退出之举可能会对西班牙、意大利和法国这样的国家起到警示作用，在这些国家，强烈反欧洲反建制的呼声正在上升。
T_s: Greece's move to withdraw could serve as a warning to countries like Spain where strongly anti-European, anti-establishment voices are on the rise.
T_f: Greece's move to exit could serve as a warning to countries like Spain, Italy and France, where strong anti-European, anti-establishment voices are on the rise.

S_s: 空间不平等造就了大批没有未来的民众，他们普遍的希望只能是将时钟拨回到从前。
S_f: 巨大的空间不平等造就了大批没有未来的民众，他们普遍的希望只能是将时钟拨回到从前。
T_s: Spatial inequality has created a large number of people with no future, and their general hope can only be to turn back the clock to the past.
T_f: Huge spatial inequality has created a large number of people with no future, and their general hope can only be to turn back the clock to the past.

S_s: 尽管电信行业从这个意义上说有其特殊之处，但政府调控同样也阻碍了发展。
S_f: 尽管电信行业从这个意义上说有其特殊之处，但政府调控同样也阻碍了这个行业的发展。
T_s: Although the telecommunications industry is unique in this sense, government regulation also hinders development.
T_f: Although the telecommunications industry is special in this sense, government regulation also hinders the development of this industry.

S_s: 尽管毕业典礼对我来说如此平常，但当我看到学生完成了生命中的一个阶段、开始考虑他们的我来时，我都会感到激动。
S_f: 尽管毕业典礼对我来说如此平常，但当我看到学生完成了生命中的一个阶段、开始考虑他们的我来时，我都会感到十分激动。
T_s: Even though graduation ceremonies are so normal for me, I get emotional when I see students complete a stage in their lives and start thinking about them.
T_f: Even though graduation ceremonies are so normal for me, I'm always thrilled when I see a student complete a phase in their life and start thinking about them.

S_s: 尽管我捍卫个人发表言论的权利，但我自己绝不会发表这样的言论，也不会听发表这一言论的人。
S_f: 尽管我捍卫个人发表种族主义言论的权利，但我自己绝不会发表这样的言论，也不会听发表这一言论的人。
T_s: While I defend an individual's right to speak, I would never make such a statement myself, nor would I listen to the person who made it.
T_f: While I defend the right of individuals to make racist statements, I would never make such statements myself, nor would I listen to the person who made them.

S_s: 尽管空袭已持续了三个多月，某种僵局似乎出现。
S_f: 尽管对穆阿迈尔?卡扎菲军队的空袭已持续了三个多月，某种僵局似乎出现。
T_s: Although the airstrikes have been going on for more than three months, some kind of stalemate appears to be emerging.
T_f: Although the airstrikes against Muammar Gaddafi's forces have been going on for more than three months, some stalemate appears to be emerging.

S_s: 尽管哈马斯对此次大选采取抵制态度，但哈马斯支持者表示还是会支持最能保护巴勒斯坦人民核心利益的候选人。
S_f: 尽管哈马斯对此次大选采取抵制态度，但许多哈马斯支持者表示还是会支持最能保护巴勒斯坦人民核心利益的候选人。
T_s: Although Hamas boycotted the election, Hamas supporters said they would support the candidate who can best protect the core interests of the Palestinian people.
T_f: Although Hamas boycotted the election, many Hamas supporters said they would support the candidate who can best protect the core interests of the Palestinian people.

S_s: 尽管8月份人民币对飙升的美元出现了3%的微小名义贬值，但它仍然高估。
S_f: 尽管8月份人民币对飙升的美元出现了3%的微小名义贬值，但它仍然大幅高估。
T_s: Despite a tiny 3% nominal depreciation against the soaring dollar in August, the renminbi remains overvalued.
T_f: Despite a tiny 3% nominal depreciation against the soaring dollar in August, the renminbi remains substantially overvalued.

S_s: 对欧洲经济监察行为绩效的任何评估都应该质问为何希腊危机会在全球金融危机爆发近两年后的2010年春才爆发。
S_f: 对近几年欧洲经济监察行为绩效的任何评估都应该质问为何希腊危机会在全球金融危机爆发近两年后的2010年春才爆发。
T_s: Any assessment of the performance of European economic surveillance should ask why the Greek crisis erupted in the spring of 2010, nearly two years after the global financial crisis.
T_f: Any assessment of the performance of European economic surveillance in recent years should ask why the Greek crisis did not erupt until the spring of 2010, nearly two years after the global financial crisis.

S_s: 对于生活在西欧这类高速老龄化社会中的我们来说，这些移民是必需的。
S_f: 对于生活在西欧和日本这类高速老龄化社会中的我们来说，这些移民是必需的。
T_s: For those of us who live in rapidly aging societies like Western Europe, these immigrants are necessary.
T_f: These immigrants are necessary for those of us living in rapidly aging societies such as Western Europe and Japan.

S_s: 老人政治的代价是将所谓老年人拥有的平等建立在牺牲年轻人的前提上，即所谓权力自享，债留子孙。
S_f: 实际上，老人政治的代价是将所谓老年人拥有的平等建立在牺牲年轻人的前提上，即所谓权力自享，债留子孙。
T_s: The price of elder politics is to base the so-called equality enjoyed by the elderly on the premise of sacrificing the young, which is the so-called self-entitlement and debts to keep children and grandchildren.
T_f: In fact, the price of elder politics is to base the so-called equality enjoyed by the elderly on the premise of sacrificing the young, that is, the so-called enjoyment of power for oneself and debts to keep children and grandchildren.

S_s: 导致法国反对2003年入侵伊拉克的同样一种法国和联合国关系现在却在促成2011年法国进行利比亚干涉。

S_s: 富人和企业在互相竞争的同时，也在与其它利益集团展开争夺。

S_s: 基地组织通过诗词来规定恐怖运动成员的内涵并且通过赞美所谓烈士的功绩来渲染这一恐怖组织历史上的重大事件。

S_s: 这一阶段正是为大选铺路的时候了。

S_s: 如果欧洲人不携手合作解决问题，无数人还会淹死在地中海，而欧盟也将继续走上瓦解的道路。

T_f: After the Great Depression, when new and stricter regulations were introduced, financial sector salaries returned to normal levels, where they stagnated until around 1990.

S_s: 以色列人也赞同这一观点，甚至连总理本雅明·内塔尼亚胡也不情愿地表达了自己对两国方案的承诺。

S_s: 在这个支付体系中，随着财政货币接近到期，不拥有该年份财政货币的纳税人将会推高它的需求。
S_f: 在这个封闭的支付体系中，随着财政货币接近到期，不拥有该年份财政货币的纳税人将会推高它的需求。

T_f: In this closed payments system, as the fiscal currency approaches maturity, taxpayers who do not own the fiscal currency for that year will drive up demand for it.

S_s: 大多数的发达国家都出现了史无前例的房市繁荣高潮。

S_s: 部分是由于援助国要求使用其自己的国民或者公司，因此经济重建失败。

T_f: In my research, I conducted more than 40 in-depth interviews with government officials and business elites, and supplemented my research with auxiliary data sources.

S_s: 在访日之旅中，美国国防部长查克·哈格尔已经听到了对美国防务承诺信誉的严重官方质疑。

S_s: 随着当局试图在投资者躲避管制之前先发制人，这场猫鼠游戏都不利于稳定和增长。

T_f: More broadly, this cat-and-mouse game is bad for both stability and growth, as authorities try to preempt investors before they evade controls.

S_s: 在当选总统努力让美国人民做好准备，迎接未来困难的时候，这些是我们必须面对的问题。

T_f: These are the main questions we must confront as the President-elect works to prepare the American people for the difficulties ahead.

S_s: 在两岸，许多人都把经济全球化看作是对收入低于平均水平的人的威胁。

S_s: 在一个广告无所不在的世界中，对商品的渴望是没有天然的界限的。

T_f: In a world of ubiquitous advertising, there are no natural boundaries to the desire for goods and services.

T_s: Asia has three-fifths of the world's population and three-fifths of the world's economic output.

S_s: 国际非政府组织在抗击疟疾的斗争中与公共部门合作，宣传这项事业并为其提供资金。

S_s: 所有欧元区国家都应该通过发行由所有成员国共同担保的债券来为财政债务融资。

S_f: 因此，我们需要一个与适应这一现实的全球疾病控制体系。

S_s: 因此该报告质疑布什坚持放弃与伊朗对话，无意建立更稳定的地区秩序的做法是完全正确的。

S_s: 因此设置非战斗性国家服务的选项并不能解决这一争端，除非其中包含研究。

S_s: 因为鱼类的数量在不断地减少，加上全球对于海产品越来越大的需求，水产业迫切需要大量的鱼饲料。

T_f: Due to the declining number of wild fish and the increasing global demand for seafood, the aquaculture industry is in urgent need of large quantities of fish feed.

S_s: 因为看重政治忠诚度高于能力的继任模式，专制制度阻碍了众多才华横溢的人被提拔到高级领导岗位。

T_f: Because of a succession model that values political loyalty over competence, an exclusive and closed autocratic system prevents many talented people from being promoted to senior leadership positions.

S_s: 因为生存农业而大肆砍伐、蚕食森林，过度放牧，以及失去生物多样性给整个大洲带来了巨大的威胁。

T_f: Deforestation, encroachment on forests, overgrazing, and loss of biodiversity and soils for subsistence agriculture pose enormous threats across the continent.

S_s: 因为来自自然资源相关产品的收入在国家财政收入中并未单独归类，我们只能对这笔开支如何分配进行猜测。
S_f: 因为来自自然资源相关产品的收入在国家财政收入中并未单独归类，我们只能对这笔开支如何分配进行合理的猜测。

T_f: Because revenues from natural resource-related products are not classified separately in state revenues, we can only make reasonable guesses as to how this expenditure will be allocated.

S_s: 未来将由科学进步和创新决定，但科学进步和创新是无法预知的。
S_f: 唯一确定的是，未来将由科学进步和创新决定，但科学进步和创新是无法预知的。
T_s: The future will be determined by scientific progress and innovation, but scientific progress and innovation cannot be predicted.
T_f: The only certainty is that the future will be determined by scientific progress and innovation, but scientific progress and innovation cannot be predicted.

S_s: 哈马斯在一月选举中胜出在很大程度上是因为法塔赫在阿拉法特的继任者阿巴斯领导下的四分五裂。

S_s: 和援助亚洲海啸相似的行动能够改变这种灾难性的状况，可以拯救百万以上的生命。

T_f: Actions like the one that aided the Asian tsunami could change this catastrophic situation and save millions of lives each year.

S_s: 这一方针无法刺激竞争，因为各国都利用国家规则阻挠新进入者。

T_f: It turned out that this approach failed to stimulate competition, as countries used national rules to thwart new entrants.

S_s: 名人小组将放宽这一解释，允许在一些情况下动用防卫性武力，但是要得到批准。

S_s: 可反对派还主要作为执政联盟的刺激物，选民们将辩论看作娱乐，而不是有利于政策制定的思想交锋。

T_f: But until now the opposition has primarily served as a stimulant to the ruling coalition, with voters seeing the debate as entertainment rather than a battle of ideas that would benefit policymaking.

S_s: 尽管25年来在结构生物学上投入巨大，但我们仍无法从理解分子进步到理解整个系统。

T_s: Despite enormous investments in structural biology over the past 25 years, we have not progressed from understanding molecules to understanding whole systems.
T_f: However, despite 25 years of enormous investment in structural biology, we have not progressed from understanding molecules to understanding whole systems.

S_s: 对太大而不能倒银行的暗补必须取消。

S_s: 他们的利益与伦敦金融城的利益是一致的，而伦敦金融城颇提供了一些高薪工作。
S_f: 从这个角度讲，他们的利益与伦敦金融城的利益是一致的，而伦敦金融城颇提供了一些高薪工作。
T_s: Their interests align with those of the City of London, which offers some well-paying jobs.
T_f: In this respect, their interests are aligned with those of the City of London, which offers some well-paying jobs.

S_s: 从市场动荡看，现在的问题是下一场危机是不是已经开始了。
S_f: 从最近的市场动荡看，现在的问题是下一场危机是不是已经开始了。
T_s: From the perspective of market turmoil, the question now is whether the next crisis has already begun.
T_f: Judging from the recent market turmoil, the question now is whether the next crisis has already begun.

S_s: 从商品期货对许多市场参与者所扮演的角色来看，管理措施应该着眼于提高对市场运行的信心。
S_f: 从商品期货对许多市场参与者所扮演的重要角色来看，管理措施应该着眼于提高对市场运行的信心。
T_s: Given the role commodity futures play for many market participants, regulatory measures should be aimed at increasing confidence in the functioning of the market.
T_f: Given the important role commodity futures play for many market participants, regulatory measures should be aimed at increasing confidence in the functioning of markets.

S_s: 从亚洲其他国家的以往经验来看，每次制造业转型都难免一场经济的衰退。
S_f: 从亚洲其他国家的以往经验来看，每次制造业转型都难免一场经济的严重衰退。
T_s: Judging from the past experience of other Asian countries, every manufacturing transformation will inevitably lead to an economic recession.
T_f: Judging from the past experience of other Asian countries, every manufacturing transformation will inevitably lead to a severe economic recession.

S_s: 亲现任效应在西班牙出现，而在意大利明显，兰奇的新改革政府让意大利人会掀起又一场大示威选举的预期落了空。
S_f: 亲现任效应在西班牙出现，而在意大利尤其明显，兰奇的新改革政府让意大利人会掀起又一场大示威选举的预期落了空。
T_s: The pro-incumbent effect appeared in Spain, and it was evident in Italy, where Lanci's new reform government made it impossible for Italians to set off another big demonstration election.
T_f: The pro-incumbent effect is evident in Spain, but especially in Italy, where Ranchi's new reform government has deflated Italians' expectations of yet another election rally.

S_s: 人均平均产出曾经有过大幅提升，这是因为更加先进的技术被用于各行各业。
S_f: 二战结束后，人均平均产出曾经有过大幅提升，这是因为更加先进的技术被用于各行各业。
T_s: Average output per worker has risen dramatically as more advanced technology has been used in a variety of industries.
T_f: After World War II, there was a big increase in output per capita as more advanced technology was used in all walks of life.

S_s: 这些王权政府拥有一种传统权威，是该地区的世俗民族主义统治者所没有的。
S_f: 事态表明，这些王权政府拥有一种传统权威，是该地区的世俗民族主义统治者所没有的。
T_s: These royal governments have a traditional authority that the region's secular nationalist rulers do not have.
T_f: Events suggest that these royal governments have a traditional authority that the region's secular nationalist rulers do not have.

S_s: 这种信仰的核心是民族纯洁感，信仰者认为必须不惜一切代价捍卫这种神圣的民族主义不受敌对势力的侵蚀。
S_f: 事实上，这种信仰的核心是民族纯洁感，信仰者认为必须不惜一切代价捍卫这种神圣的民族主义不受敌对势力的侵蚀。
T_s: At the core of this belief is a sense of national purity, and believers believe that this sacred nationalism must be defended at all costs from the erosion of hostile forces.
T_f: In fact, at the heart of this belief is a sense of national purity, and believers believe that this sacred nationalism must be defended at all costs from the erosion of hostile forces.

S_s: 在许多阿拉伯国家现在中学和大学里女孩比男孩更多，这表明他们的父母认为女儿的教育与儿子一样重要。
S_f: 事实上，在许多阿拉伯国家现在中学和大学里女孩比男孩更多，这表明他们的父母认为女儿的教育与儿子一样重要。
T_s: There are now more girls than boys in secondary schools and universities in many Arab countries, suggesting that their parents value the education of their daughters as much as their sons.
T_f: The fact that there are now more girls than boys in secondary schools and universities in many Arab countries suggests that their parents value the education of their daughters as much as their sons.

S_s: 因为集聚带来的广泛的经济效益，北方经济引擎魔咒可以拓展到尤其包括赫尔及东北的整个英格兰北部地区。
S_f: 事实上，因为集聚带来的广泛的经济效益，北方经济引擎魔咒可以拓展到尤其包括赫尔及东北的整个英格兰北部地区。
T_s: Because of the extensive economic benefits brought about by agglomeration, the spell of the northern economic engine can be extended to the entire northern part of England including Hull and the Northeast in particular.
T_f: In fact, because of the extensive economic benefits brought about by agglomeration, the spell of the northern economic engine can be extended to the entire northern part of England, especially including Hull and the Northeast.

S_s: 即使是强健的国内和国际政策反应也未必足以消除需求和增长在相当长的一段时期内萎靡不振的风险。
S_f: 事实上，即使是强健的国内和国际政策反应也未必足以消除需求和增长在相当长的一段时期内萎靡不振的风险。
T_s: Even a robust domestic and international policy response may not be enough to remove the risk that demand and growth will languish for an extended period.
T_f: Indeed, even a robust domestic and international policy response may not be enough to remove the risk that demand and growth will languish for an extended period.

S_s: 不论结果如何，叙利亚惨象所体现的是西方对全球主宰力的不可逆转的进一步削弱。
S_f: 事实上，不论结果如何，叙利亚惨象所体现的是西方对全球主宰力的不可逆转的进一步削弱。
T_s: Regardless of the outcome, the tragedy in Syria reflects the irreversible further weakening of the West's global dominance.
T_f: In fact, regardless of the outcome, the tragedy in Syria reflects the irreversible further weakening of the West's global dominance.

S_s: 之所以从 2006 年开始，原因是金融机构从那时起，出现冒险行为。
S_f: 之所以从 2006 年开始，原因是金融机构从那时起，出现过度的冒险行为。
T_s: The reason why it started in 2006 is that financial institutions have taken risky behavior since then.
T_f: The reason why it started in 2006 is that financial institutions have taken excessive risk-taking behavior since then.

S_s: 审讯必须在美国境外进行，即使是海外的美军基地也行。
S_f: 为了规避法律，审讯必须在美国境外进行，即使是海外的美军基地也行。
T_s: The interrogation must take place outside the United States, even at a US military base overseas.
T_f: To circumvent the law, the interrogation must take place outside the United States, even at a U.S. military base overseas.

S_s: 它们将原油收入投入其他部门，而石油部门只能获得少量投资。
S_f: 为了对抗这种依赖，它们将原油收入投入其他部门，而石油部门只能获得少量投资。
T_s: They invest their crude oil revenues in other sectors, while the oil sector receives only a small amount of investment.
T_f: To combat this dependence, they funnel crude revenues into other sectors, which receive only a small amount of investment in the oil sector.

S_s: 临近的成员国，特别是语言与俄语相近的国家，应该能够快速动员所需要的技术专家。
S_f: 临近的成员国，特别是语言与俄语和乌克兰语相近的国家，应该能够快速动员所需要的技术专家。
T_s: Neighboring member states, especially those whose language is similar to Russian, should be able to quickly mobilize the required technical expertise.
T_f: Neighboring member states, especially those whose languages are similar to Russian and Ukrainian, should be able to quickly mobilize the required technical expertise.

S_s: 两国都保有贸易盈余，历经多年，并且在都经济周期的不同阶段都未改变。
S_f: 两国都保有巨大的贸易盈余，历经多年，并且在都经济周期的不同阶段都未改变。
T_s: Both countries have run trade surpluses that have remained unchanged for many years and at different stages of both economic cycles.
T_f: Both countries have run large trade surpluses that have remained unchanged for many years and at different stages of both economic cycles.

S_s: 不过在我性格形成的那段时期，这一劫难的阴影却萦绕心头。
S_f: 不过在我性格形成的那段时期，这一劫难的阴影却依旧萦绕心头。
T_s: But the shadow of this catastrophe haunted me during my formative period.
T_f: But the shadow of this catastrophe still haunted me during my formative period.

S_s: 对西方而言，艾哈迈迪内贾德的胜利意味着与伊朗相关的一切都会变得更为棘手。
S_f: 不论结果如何，对西方而言，艾哈迈迪内贾德的胜利意味着与伊朗相关的一切都会变得更为棘手。
T_s: For the West, Ahmadinejad's victory means that everything to do with Iran will get trickier.
T_f: Whatever the outcome, for the West, Ahmadinejad's victory means that everything to do with Iran is going to get trickier.

S_s: 不管是为了自我保险，还是为了维持汇率，亚洲金融危机后，东亚再一次开始积累过多的美元债务。
S_f: 不管是为了自我保险，还是为了维持竞争性汇率，亚洲金融危机后，东亚再一次开始积累过多的美元债务。
T_s: Whether for self-insurance or to maintain exchange rates, after the Asian financial crisis, East Asia once again began accumulating excessive dollar debt.
T_f: Whether for self-insurance or to maintain a competitive exchange rate, after the Asian financial crisis, East Asia once again began accumulating excessive dollar debt.

S_s: 身为伊朗派驻奥斯陆的外交人员，穆罕默德·礼扎·埃达里为了抗议政府在 12 月暴动后的报复行为而辞职。
S_f: 不仅如此，身为伊朗派驻奥斯陆的外交人员，穆罕默德·礼扎·埃达里为了抗议政府在 12 月暴动后的报复行为而辞职。
T_s: Mohammad Reza al-Edari, Iran's diplomat in Oslo, resigned in protest of government retaliation following the December uprising.
T_f: Not only that, Mohammad Reza al-Edari, an Iranian diplomat stationed in Oslo, resigned in protest of the government's retaliation following the December riots.

S_s: 上次美国面对巨额预算赤字的时候还是1980年代早期，那时通胀情况在紧缩货币政策的影响下下降。
S_f: 上次美国面对巨额预算赤字的时候还是1980年代早期，那时通胀情况在紧缩货币政策的影响下大幅下降。
T_s: The last time the U.S. faced large budget deficits was in the early 1980s, when inflation fell under the influence of tight monetary policy.
T_f: The last time the U.S. faced large budget deficits was in the early 1980s, when inflation fell sharply under the influence of tight monetary policy.

S_s: 一些部门不愿留下遗留问题，因此他们没有预算，而且各部长也不愿同外国公司签署协议。
S_f: 一些部门不愿留下大量的遗留问题，因此他们没有预算，而且各部长也不愿同外国公司签署协议。
T_s: Some ministries don't want to leave a legacy, so they don't have a budget, and ministers don't want to sign deals with foreign companies.
T_f: Some ministries don't want to leave a huge legacy, so they don't have a budget, and ministers don't want to sign deals with foreign companies.

S_s: 一个约束是为财政挥霍国设立更为严格的纪律机制，并将其作为强化制度框架的一部分。
S_f: 一个更重要的约束是为财政挥霍国设立更为严格的纪律机制，并将其作为强化制度框架的一部分。
T_s: One constraint is the creation of stricter disciplinary mechanisms for profligate states as part of a strengthened institutional framework.
T_f: A more important constraint is the establishment of stricter disciplinary mechanisms for profligate states as part of a strengthened institutional framework.

S_s: 一个对该地区不存在的欧洲政策被在华盛顿的缺位的政策独占者所摆布。
S_f: 一个在很大程度上对该地区不存在的欧洲政策被在华盛顿的缺位的政策独占者所摆布。
T_s: A European policy that does not exist for the region is at the mercy of an absent policy monopoly in Washington.
T_f: A European policy that largely does not exist in the region is at the mercy of an absent policy monopoly in Washington.

S_s: 3月15日的协议在政治上不可行，也被议会以一边倒的优势否决。
S_f: 3月15日的协议在政治上不可行，也被塞浦路斯议会以一边倒的优势否决。
T_s: The March 15 deal was politically unfeasible and was overwhelmingly rejected by parliament.
T_f: The March 15 deal was politically unfeasible and was overwhelmingly rejected by Cyprus' parliament.

S_s: 20世纪60年代南韩经济腾飞不是因为国外援助达到了高潮，相反，那时国外援助正在停止。
S_f: 20世纪60年代南韩经济腾飞不是因为国外援助达到了高潮，相反，那时国外援助正在慢慢停止。
T_s: South Korea's economic boom in the 1960s was not due to a boom in foreign aid; on the contrary, it was stalling.
T_f: South Korea's economic boom in the 1960s was not due to a boom in foreign aid; on the contrary, it was slowing down.

S_s: 爱尔兰央行试图通过限制银行向高风险借款人贷款将金融机构救出又一场灾难性泡沫。
S_f: 2015年1月，爱尔兰央行试图通过限制银行向高风险借款人贷款将金融机构救出又一场灾难性泡沫。
T_s: The Central Bank of Ireland is trying to bail financial institutions out of yet another disastrous bubble by restricting banks from lending to risky borrowers.
T_f: In January 2015, Ireland's central bank attempted to bail out financial institutions from yet another disastrous bubble by restricting banks' lending to risky borrowers.

S_s: 世界各国政府同意将全球气温升高幅度限制在前工业时代水平以上2℃内。
S_f: 2009年和2010年，世界各国政府同意将全球气温升高幅度限制在前工业时代水平以上2℃内。
T_s: Governments around the world have agreed to limit the rise in global temperatures to 2°C above pre-industrial levels.
T_f: In 2009 and 2010, governments around the world agreed to limit the rise in global temperatures to 2°C above pre-industrial levels.

S_s: 100%固然没有达到，但这是个开端，我们期待更多的国家在看到其他国家收获低碳发展的益处后也能加入。
S_f: 100%固然没有达到，但这是个良好的开端，我们期待更多的国家在看到其他国家收获低碳发展的益处后也能加入。
T_s: 100% is not achieved, but it is a start, and we expect more countries to join after seeing other countries reap the benefits of low-carbon development.
T_f: 100% is not yet achieved, but it is a good start, and we expect more countries to join as they see other countries reaping the benefits of low-carbon development.

S_s: 国家也最终形成协议，同意免去重债穷国的债务，减轻它们的还债负担，将更多的钱用于卫生项目。
S_f: 高收入国家也最终形成协议，同意免去重债穷国的债务，减轻它们的还债负担，将更多的钱用于卫生项目。
T_s: Countries have also finalized agreements to cancel the debts of heavily indebted poor countries, ease their debt repayment burdens, and allocate more money to health programs.
T_f: High-income countries have also finally reached an agreement to cancel the debt of heavily indebted poor countries, reduce their debt repayment burden, and allocate more money to health programs.

S_s: 欧盟应该承诺每年至少吸收500,000寻求庇护者，同时努力说服世界其他地区也接收相同数量的难民。
S_f: 首先，欧盟应该承诺每年至少吸收500,000寻求庇护者，同时努力说服世界其他地区也接收相同数量的难民。
T_s: The EU should commit to taking in at least 500,000 asylum seekers a year, while trying to convince the rest of the world to take in the same number.
T_f: First, the EU should commit to taking in at least 500,000 asylum seekers a year, while trying to convince the rest of the world to take in the same number.

S_s: 面对汽车大鳄的危机，许多人都要求作为救援计划的附带条件，国家应该迫使银行开始放贷。
S_f: 面对汽车大鳄和中小供应商共同的危机，许多人都要求作为救援计划的附带条件，国家应该迫使银行开始放贷。
T_s: Faced with the car predators crisis, many are demanding that the state force the banks to start lending as a condition of the bailout.
T_f: Faced with a crisis shared by car predators and small and medium-sized suppliers, many people have demanded that the state should force banks to start lending as a condition of the rescue plan.

S_s: 金融监管可以避免银行向不同的监管机构报告，使得金融法规和监管操作协调化，并消除扭曲竞争的现象。
S_f: 集中化的金融监管可以避免银行向不同的监管机构报告，使得金融法规和监管操作协调化，并消除扭曲竞争的现象。
T_s: Financial regulation can prevent banks from reporting to different supervisory agencies, harmonize financial regulations and supervisory practices, and eliminate distortions of competition.
T_f: Centralizing financial regulation can avoid banks reporting to different regulators, harmonize financial regulations and regulatory practices, and eliminate distortions of competition.

S_s: 随着巴拉克·奥巴马内阁全面接管政府，这位当选总统不得不直接面对危机。
S_f: 随着巴拉克·奥巴马内阁全面接管政府，这位当选总统不得不在许多领域直接面对危机。
T_s: With Barack Obama's cabinet fully taking over the government, the president-elect has had to face the crisis head-on.
T_f: With Barack Obama's cabinet fully taking over the government, the president-elect has had to confront crisis directly in many areas.

S_s: 除了成本因素，到目前为止，电动汽车的舒适性极差。
S_f: 除了成本和补贴因素，到目前为止，电动汽车的舒适性极差。
T_s: Apart from the cost factor, the comfort of electric vehicles has been extremely poor so far.
T_f: Aside from cost and subsidy factors, electric vehicles have so far been extremely poor in comfort.

S_s: 阿桑奇表示他对已公布的文件可能造成的任何伤害深表遗憾。
S_f: 阿桑奇表示他对已公布的文件可能造成的任何伤害深表遗憾，但是他还是为文件的公布辩护。
T_s: Assange said he deeply regretted any harm the published documents might have caused.
T_f: Assange said he deeply regretted any harm the released documents might have caused, but he defended their release.

S_s: 银行必须建立一定的防卫堡垒，以抵御在市场在转向的时候作出的调整。
S_f: 银行必须建立一定的防卫堡垒，以抵御在市场在转向的时候作出必要的调整。
T_s: Banks must build certain fortresses of defense against adjustments made when markets turn.
T_f: Banks must build certain fortresses of defense against necessary adjustments when markets turn.

S_s: 那是一个获得真相的时刻，从内部清洗的残暴。
S_f: 那是一个获得真相的时刻，从内部清洗斯大林主义的残暴。
T_s: It was a moment of truth, a brutality cleansed from within.
T_f: It was a moment of truth, of purging from within the brutality of Stalinism.

S_s: 穆沙拉夫政府没能遏制法律界令人赞叹的旨在迫使政府为乔杜里复职的公民反抗运动。
S_f: 那时，穆沙拉夫政府没能遏制法律界令人赞叹的旨在迫使政府为乔杜里复职的公民反抗运动。
T_s: Musharraf's government has failed to contain the legal profession's admirable civil disobedience campaign aimed at forcing the government to reinstate Choudhury.
T_f: At the time, Musharraf's government had failed to contain the legal profession's admirable civil disobedience campaign aimed at forcing the government to reinstate Choudhury.

S_s: 那些选民直接就认为本次选举根本没有任何议题可言。
S_f: 那些对政治有幻灭感的选民直接就认为本次选举根本没有任何议题可言。
T_s: Those voters simply believe that there is no issue at all in this election.
T_f: Voters who are disillusioned with politics simply believe that there is nothing to discuss in this election.

S_s: 造成差异的不可能是教育质量，因为那些从穷市迁移到富市的劳动力同样赚得更多。
S_f: 造成上述差异的不可能是教育质量，因为那些从穷市迁移到富市的劳动力同样赚得更多。
T_s: It cannot be the quality of education that makes the difference, because those laborers who migrate from poor to rich cities also earn more.
T_f: It cannot be the quality of education that is responsible for the difference, since laborers who migrate from poorer to richer cities also earn more.

S_s: 通过让金融机构以更有利的利率发放更多的贷款，中小企业将获得成长的空间。
S_f: 通过让金融机构以更有利的利率发放更多的贷款，中小企业将获得成长和繁荣的空间。
T_s: By enabling financial institutions to make more loans at more favorable interest rates, SMEs will gain room to grow.
T_f: By enabling financial institutions to make more loans at more favorable interest rates, SMEs will have room to grow and prosper.

S_s: 英国的声音能够左右世界事件，给英国带来英国人常说的超越国家实力的能力。
S_f: 通过欧盟的放大，英国的声音能够左右世界事件，给英国带来英国人常说的超越国家实力的能力。
T_s: Britain's voice can shape world events, giving Britain what the British often say is the ability to transcend national power.

T_f: These six steps require comprehensive and coordinated behavioral change, requiring cooperation at all levels of government, investment at scale, sharing of ideas, scaling up of best practices, and long-term planning.

S_s: 启蒙运动以来，理性分析已经可以很好的引导统治和决策，良好的社会还有法制保障其实施。

S_s: 与超级大国结盟永远是不平等的，因此，从长期看，与美国建立紧密关系的努力对于印度的战略自主传统不利。

S_s: 自二战以来，拉丁美洲各国似乎成了货币政策的实验室，尝试过汇率制度，其中有些效果尚可，大多非常失败。

S_s: 经过13年的谈判、推迟，联合国大会将在本月对一项全面暂停死刑提议进行投票。

T_f: After 13 years of negotiations, delays and hesitation, the UN General Assembly will vote this month on a proposal for a total moratorium on the death penalty.

S_s: 经济实力将成为取胜的关键因素，很多人认为这种变化将会开启由日德两国主导的新世界。
S_f: 经济实力将成为世界政治格局中取胜的关键因素，很多人认为这种变化将会开启由日德两国主导的新世界。

T_f: Economic power will be a key success factor in the world's political landscape, and many believe that this change will open up a new world dominated by Japan and Germany.

S_s: 联合国预测说以一半的代价我们就能为世界上的每一个人支付清洁的饮水、卫生设施、基本医疗保健和教育。

S_s: 参议员还由各州立法机构选定，而不是由选民直接选出。

T_f: Until 1913, senators were selected by state legislatures, not directly by voters.

S_s: 目前已经流传着多个改革方案，其中包括一项将缓解当前对商业地产税限制的第13号州宪法修正案的投票修改动议。
S_f: 目前已经流传着多个改革方案，其中包括一项将极大缓解当前对商业地产税限制的第13号州宪法修正案的投票修改动议。

T_f: Several reforms have been circulated, including a vote to amend the 13th state constitution that would significantly ease current restrictions on commercial property taxes.

S_s: 由古希腊悲剧，电视情景喜剧所带来的间接体验他人痛苦的体验，都在扩张道德范围方面扮演着极为重要的角色。
S_f: 由古希腊悲剧，电视情景喜剧和新闻故事所带来的间接体验他人痛苦的体验，都在扩张道德范围方面扮演着极为重要的角色。
T_s: From ancient Greek tragedies to television sitcoms, the indirect experience of experiencing the pain of others plays an extremely important role in expanding the scope of morality.
T_f: The indirect experience of experiencing the suffering of others, brought about by ancient Greek tragedies, television sitcoms, and news stories, all play an extremely important role in expanding the scope of morality.

S_s: 由于房地产是消费行为的驱动力，只要房价今后出现进一步大幅下跌的局面就必将削弱消费者的信心，使消费降低。
S_f: 由于房地产是消费行为的关键驱动力，只要房价今后出现进一步大幅下跌的局面就必将削弱消费者的信心，使消费降低。
T_s: Since real estate is the driving force of consumer behavior, as long as there is a further sharp decline in housing prices in the future, it will inevitably weaken consumer confidence and reduce consumption.
T_f: Since real estate is a key driver of consumer behavior, any further sharp fall in house prices in the future will inevitably weaken consumer confidence and reduce consumption.

S_s: 由奥斯曼帝国诸部组成的旧中东显然已经分崩离析，其中美国在这个冲突频发地区的行为要占很大原因。
S_f: 由一战后的奥斯曼帝国诸部组成的旧中东显然已经分崩离析，其中美国在这个冲突频发地区的行为要占很大原因。
T_s: The old Middle East, made up of the Ottoman Empire, is clearly falling apart, and the actions of the United States in this conflict-ridden region are largely due.
T_f: The old Middle East, made up of the post-World War I Ottoman empire, is clearly falling apart, and the actions of the United States in this conflict-ridden region are largely responsible.

S_s: 改革所取得的进展并没有像帕乔里和其他一些人所希望的那么大、那么快。

T_s: Progress on reform has not been as great and as fast as Pachauri and others had hoped.
T_f: However, progress on reform has not been as great and as fast as Pachauri and others had hoped.

S_s: 在美国近期选举后，民主党占多数席位使得工会势力占据上风，从而束缚住了亲自由贸易的奥巴马总统的手脚。
S_f: 然而，在美国近期选举后，民主党占多数席位使得工会势力占据上风，从而束缚住了亲自由贸易的奥巴马总统的手脚。

T_f: However, after the recent elections in the United States, the Democratic majority gave the union power the upper hand, thus tying the hands of the pro-trade President Ma of Oba.

S_s: 日本驾校却正受到生源减少的困扰，这种现象并不能单从人口减少的角度得到解释。
S_f: 然而如今，日本驾校却正受到生源减少的困扰，这种现象并不能单从人口减少的角度得到解释。

T_f: Today, however, Japanese driving schools are suffering from a decline in the number of students, a phenomenon that cannot be explained by population decline alone.

S_s: 没有这些改革，这个国家将在泥潭中挣扎，无论人民的盼望多么热切，真正的变化仍将是可望不可及。

T_f: Without these reforms, the country will continue to struggle in a quagmire, and no matter how eager the people's hopes are, real change will remain out of reach.

S_s: 以当前水平，仅仅在各国之间重新分配全球增长是不够的。

T_s: At current levels, it is not enough to simply redistribute global growth among countries.
T_f: After all, at current levels, it is not enough to simply redistribute global growth among countries.

S_s: 人类本性并不完全在于唯利是图，它同样会从智拿巧取中得到满足，就像别出心裁绕过各种法规一样。

T_s: Human nature is not entirely mercenary, it is also satisfied by cleverness, just as it circumvents various regulations.
T_f: After all, human nature is not entirely mercenary, and it is also satisfied by outwit, just as it circumvents regulations.

S_s: 毕竟，不管如何不完美，希腊总归是民主国家，担心陷在中等收入水平上的拉美和东亚国家大部分也是如此。

S_s: 比方说，作为主席，我最近在日内瓦召开的世界卫生大会上与纽约和华盛顿的联合国及美国决策者讨论了我们的建议。

T_f: For example, as Chair of the Review, I recently discussed our recommendations with UN and US policymakers in New York and Washington at the World Health Assembly in Geneva.

S_s: 正是在这一点上，美国与法国有着本质的不同，而英国与美国却非常相似，他们都不信任国家，更不会依靠国家。

S_s: 根据国会预算办公室的预测，这将导致1300万人失去健康保险，未来十年内的保费将上涨10％。

S_s: 来自世界上主要捕鱼国的代表今年秋天聚集在澳大利亚商议限制磷虾的捕捉量以此来帮助那些生物。

T_f: Representatives from the world's leading fishing nations gathered in Australia this fall to discuss limiting krill catches as a way to help those that depend on krill for their livelihoods.

S_s: 有时候，在真正制造以前的大量无形的生产过程构成了附加值的80%。

S_s: 有一项条款让这一现象再清楚不过了，那就是给予最不发达国家几乎免税的发达国家的市场准入。

T_f: This phenomenon could not be clearer by a provision that provides market access to developed countries, which appear to be virtually duty-free.

S_s: 2008年金融危机爆发后，发达国家的停滞不前的增长和高失业助长了采取更多保护主义措施的要求。
