T_f: It helps the EU as a whole and to find consensus internationally, when the euro zone is able to agree quickly on positions through co-ordination.

S_s: 当时总理默克尔拒绝为全欧洲的金融机构担保，声称各国的烂摊子该由各国自己内部处理。
S_f: 当时德国总理默克尔拒绝为全欧洲的金融机构担保，声称各国的烂摊子该由各国自己内部处理。
T_s: Then Chancellor Angela Merkel refused to guarantee financial institutions across Europe, saying it was up to each country to deal with its own mess.
T_f: Then German Chancellor Angela Merkel refused to guarantee financial institutions across Europe, saying it was up to each country to deal with its own mess.

S_s: 当巴罗索在2004年上任的时候，人们一再询问他是否对欧洲未来有规划。

T_s: When Mr Barroso took office in 2004, he was repeatedly asked whether he had a plan for Europe's future.
T_f: When Mr Barroso took office in 2004, he was repeatedly asked whether he had big plans for Europe's future.

S_s: 尽管这种观点可能有点夸张，但对于相信经济进步的人来说，它也不无可取之处。
S_f: 尽管这种观点可能有点夸张，但对于相信经济和社会进步的人来说，它也不无可取之处。
T_s: While this view may be a bit of an exaggeration, it has merit for those who believe in economic progress.
T_f: While this view may be a bit of an exaggeration, it has merit for those who believe in economic and social progress.

S_s: 尽管在这些领域表现出众的企业不少，但大部分仍严重缺乏这方面的能力。

T_f: Although there are many Japanese companies that excel in these areas, most still seriously lack the ability to do so.

S_s: 但这7,550亿美元可能仍会有7,350亿美元，也有可能低至7,000亿美元。
S_f: 尽管利率更高，但这7,550亿美元可能仍会有7,350亿美元，也有可能低至7,000亿美元。

S_s: 对其他的大国来说，2008年1月份到2009年1月份的年化需求情况有所不同。

T_s: For other big countries, the annualised picture of demand from January 2008 to January 2009 was different.
T_f: For the other big European countries, the annualised picture of demand from January 2008 to January 2009 was different.

S_s: 对政治职位上瘾总是令人担忧的，因为当领导人不再认识到限制的时候，民主就会变成专制。
S_f: 对政治职位上瘾总是令人担忧的，因为当领导人不再认识到权力限制的时候，民主就会变成专制。
T_s: Addiction to political office is always a worry, because democracy becomes tyranny when leaders no longer recognise the limits.
T_f: Addiction to political office is always a worry, because democracy becomes tyranny when leaders stop recognizing the limits of power.

S_s: 中情局催生了塔利班，在短短15年内，美国针对塔利班的政策重复了一遍。
S_f: 实际上，中情局催生了塔利班，在短短15年内，美国针对塔利班的政策重复了一遍。
T_s: The CIA gave birth to the Taliban, and in just 15 years, US policy against the Taliban was repeated.
T_f: In effect, the CIA gave birth to the Taliban, and in just 15 years, US policy against the Taliban was repeated.

S_s: 实现这一目标需要实施与当前这些改革不一样的做法。
S_f: 实现这一目标需要实施一些与当前这些改革不一样的做法。
T_s: Achieving this will require a different approach to the current reforms.
T_f: Achieving this will require something different from the current reforms.

S_s: 它由里根在1984年引入，此后便一直是一个政治皮球，民主党总统取消。
S_f: 它由里根在1984年引入，此后便一直是一个政治皮球，民主党总统取消，共和党总统再找回。
T_s: It was introduced by Ronald Reagan in 1984 and has been a political ball ever since, with Democratic presidents eliminating it.
T_f: Introduced by Ronald Reagan in 1984, it has been a political ball ever since, eliminated by Democratic presidents and brought back by Republican ones.

S_s: 它保留了一丝正气，一个希望，那就是一个更美好的、巴勒斯坦人共享的社会是可以实现的
S_f: 它保留了一丝正气，一个希望，那就是一个更美好的、巴勒斯坦人和以色列人共享的社会是可以实现的
T_s: It retains a sense of righteousness, a hope that a better society for Palestinians to share is within reach
T_f: It retains a sense of righteousness, a hope that a better society, shared by Palestinians and Israelis, is within reach

S_s: 它们指责巴基斯坦要为各自首都喀布尔最近发生的骇人听闻的袭击事件负责，袭击目标包括一所大学和一家咖啡馆。
S_f: 它们指责巴基斯坦要为各自首都喀布尔和达卡最近发生的骇人听闻的袭击事件负责，袭击目标包括一所大学和一家咖啡馆。
T_s: They blame Pakistan for recent horrific attacks in their respective capitals, including on a university and a cafe.
T_f: They blame Pakistan for recent horrific attacks in their respective capitals, Kabul and Dhaka, including on a university and a cafe.

S_s: 如果这一趋势持续下去，将构成生存威胁，它将阻挠急需的进一步一体化并摧毁其中所包含的欧洲思想。
S_f: 如果这一趋势持续下去，将构成欧盟的生存威胁，它将阻挠急需的进一步一体化并摧毁其中所包含的欧洲思想。
T_s: If this trend continues, it will pose an existential threat that will thwart much-needed further integration and destroy the European idea contained therein.
T_f: If this trend continues, it will pose an existential threat to the EU, blocking much-needed further integration and destroying the European idea within it.

S_s: 如果美国不能产生需要的赤字，全球经济将陷入储蓄过剩、需求低迷、资本廉价的局面，直到美国的替代者出现。
S_f: 如果美国不能或不愿产生需要的赤字，全球经济将陷入储蓄过剩、需求低迷、资本廉价的局面，直到美国的替代者出现。
T_s: If the US cannot run the deficit it needs, the global economy will be stuck with excess savings, low demand and cheap capital until an alternative emerges.
T_f: If the US cannot or will not run the deficit it needs, the global economy will be stuck with excess savings, low demand and cheap capital until an American replacement emerges.

S_s: 如果法国能以自身愿意且有能力承担应有的份额来说服德国人，就足以为许多至今看来似乎不可能的妥协争取到空间。
S_f: 如果法国能以自身愿意且有能力承担应有的份额来说服德国人，就足以为许多至今看来似乎不可能的必要妥协争取到空间。
T_s: If France can convince the Germans that it is willing and able to pay its fair share, it will be enough to buy room for many compromises that have hitherto seemed impossible.
T_f: If France can convince the Germans that it is willing and able to pay its fair share, it will be enough to buy room for many necessary compromises that have hitherto seemed impossible.

S_s: 如果欧盟要制定一项针对新兴大国的政策，那么它必须用这些国家能理解的战略性语言进行交流。
S_f: 如果欧盟要制定一项针对新兴大国的成功政策，那么它必须用这些国家能理解的战略性语言进行交流。
T_s: If the EU is to develop a policy towards the emerging powers, it must communicate in a strategic language they understand.
T_f: If the EU is to develop a successful policy towards the emerging powers, it must communicate in a strategic language that these countries understand.

S_s: 那么最好的选择莫过于把这笔额外收入积攒起来，或者退而求其次，用它来偿还国家债务。
S_f: 如果是后者，那么最好的选择莫过于把这笔额外收入积攒起来，或者退而求其次，用它来偿还国家债务。
T_s: The best option would be to save the extra income or, at best, use it to pay down the national debt.
T_f: If it is the latter, then the best option is to save the extra income or, at best, use it to pay down the national debt.

S_s: 如果他指的是那些生活在现有领土上的人，那么这一数字将会大幅降低。

T_s: If he was referring to those living in the existing territories, that number would be significantly lower.
T_f: If he was referring to those living on existing Russian territory, that number would be significantly lower.

S_s: 政府还能处理地方政府在中央当局的鼓励下在2008和2009年增加的过多债务。
S_f: 如有必要，政府还能处理地方政府在中央当局的鼓励下在2008和2009年增加的过多债务。
T_s: The government can also deal with the excessive debt that local governments, encouraged by central authorities, ran up in 2008 and 2009.
T_f: If necessary, the government can also deal with the excessive debt that local governments, encouraged by central authorities, ran up in 2008 and 2009.

S_s: 拉丁美洲已经有14个民主政体国家允许总统连任，其中7个国家规定总统可以连任，另外7个允许隔届当选。
S_f: 如今，拉丁美洲已经有14个民主政体国家允许总统连任，其中7个国家规定总统可以连任，另外7个允许隔届当选。
T_s: Fourteen democracies in Latin America already allow the president to serve a second term, seven of which mandate a second term and seven of which allow alternate terms.
T_f: Today, there are 14 democracies in Latin America that allow presidents to serve consecutive terms, seven of which allow presidents to serve consecutive terms and seven of which allow alternate terms.

S_s: 我们必须将可持续发展纳入主流经济学，厘清现在和将来作为与不作为的成本，从而将理论付诸实践。
S_f: 如今，我们必须将可持续发展纳入主流经济学，厘清现在和将来作为与不作为的成本，从而将理论付诸实践。
T_s: We must put theory into practice by integrating sustainable development into mainstream economics and clarifying the costs of action and inaction now and in the future.
T_f: Now we must put theory into practice by integrating sustainable development into mainstream economics and clarifying the costs of action and inaction now and in the future.

S_s: 国大党本身是连任两届的现任政府，其党员丑闻缠身，给人们的印象是无用、无能、腐败。
S_f: 如今，国大党本身是连任两届的现任政府，其党员丑闻缠身，给人们的印象是无用、无能、腐败。
T_s: The Congress party itself is the current two-term government, whose members have been tainted by scandal and are perceived as useless, incompetent and corrupt.
T_f: Today, the Congress party itself is the current two-term government, tainted by scandals among its members and perceived as useless, incompetent and corrupt.

S_s: 因为特朗普的突然翻脸，伊朗和美国发生对抗的可能性死灰复燃，而这必然会加强伊朗代理力量的决心。
S_f: 如今，因为特朗普的突然翻脸，伊朗和美国发生对抗的可能性死灰复燃，而这必然会加强伊朗代理力量的决心。
T_s: With Trump's sudden reversal, the possibility of a confrontation between Iran and the United States has been revived, which will surely strengthen the resolve of Iran's proxy forces.
T_f: Now, because of Mr. Trump's abrupt reversal, the possibility of a confrontation between Iran and the United States has resurfaced, and that must strengthen the resolve of Iran's proxy forces.

S_s: 天主教会反对伽利略对哥白尼日心说的支持，教皇保罗二世为此在1992年进行了道歉。
S_f: 大部分人都知道，天主教会反对伽利略对哥白尼日心说的支持，教皇保罗二世为此在1992年进行了道歉。
T_s: The Catholic Church objected to Galileo's support for the Copernican heliocentric theory, for which Pope Paul II apologized in 1992.
T_f: As most people know, the Catholic Church objected to Galileo's support for Copernican heliocentrism, for which Pope Paul II apologized in 1992.

S_s: 在本地区和外界很多人眼里，正义与发展党都是带有伊斯兰色彩的模范民主政党。

S_s: 基础设施投资是特朗普日程的重要组成部分，放权给州也是美国共和党的流行做法，因此，美国有采取这一方针的空间。
S_f: 基础设施投资是特朗普日程的重要组成部分，放权给州也是美国共和党的流行做法，因此，美国绝对有采取这一方针的空间。
T_s: Infrastructure investment is a big part of Mr Trump's agenda, and delegating power to the states is also a popular approach for US Republicans, so there is room for this approach.
T_f: Infrastructure investment is a big part of Mr Trump's agenda, and delegating power to the states is also a popular Republican approach, so there is definitely room for this approach.

S_s: 美国不是盛气凌人地面对所有国家独自发号施令，也不是只着眼于谋取狭隘的企业利润。
S_f: 在那样一个世界里，美国不是盛气凌人地面对所有国家独自发号施令，也不是只着眼于谋取狭隘的企业利润。
T_s: The United States is not bossy and dictating to all countries on its own, nor is it focused on narrow corporate profits.
T_f: In such a world, the United States would not be bossy and dictate to all nations alone, nor would it be focused on narrow corporate profits.

S_s: 这一概念获得了一些新的标签。
S_f: 在此过程中，这一概念获得了一些新的标签。
T_s: The concept has gained some new labels.
T_f: Along the way, the concept gained some new labels.

S_s: 尽管变化速度不同，各地男孩与女孩间在教育水平上的差异都减少了。
S_f: 在此期间，尽管变化速度不同，各地男孩与女孩间在教育水平上的差异都减少了。
T_s: The difference in educational attainment between boys and girls has decreased everywhere, though at different rates.
T_f: During that time, the gap in educational attainment between boys and girls has decreased everywhere, albeit at different rates of change.

S_s: 全球气候政策这一概念将价值全无，几十年的气候警告将让位给宿命论。
S_f: 在最坏情形中，全球气候政策这一概念将价值全无，几十年的气候警告将让位给宿命论。
T_s: The very concept of a global climate policy would be worthless, and decades of climate warnings would give way to fatalism.
T_f: In the worst case, the very concept of global climate policy will be worthless and decades of climate warnings will give way to fatalism.

S_s: 作为一名教授首先要有对自己具有重要性的东西需要确认，然后就必须去确认它。
S_f: 在我看来，作为一名教授首先要有对自己具有重要性的东西需要确认，然后就必须去确认它。
T_s: As a professor, you first have to confirm something important to yourself, and then you have to confirm it.
T_f: In my opinion, as a professor, you must first have something important for yourself to confirm, and then you must confirm it.

S_s: 一个由民主选举产生的总统给新的和平机会带来了希望。
S_f: 在巴勒斯坦，一个由民主选举产生的总统给新的和平机会带来了希望。
T_s: A democratically elected president offers hope for a new chance for peace.
T_f: In Palestine, a democratically elected president offers hope for a new chance for peace.

S_s: 健全资产管理的下一步就是要了解城市从收入和资产价格上涨中获得的收益是什么量级的。
S_f: 在了解市政资产的市场价值后，健全资产管理的下一步就是要了解城市从收入和资产价格上涨中获得的收益是什么量级的。
T_s: The next step in sound asset management is to understand the magnitude at which cities benefit from rising incomes and asset prices.
T_f: Having understood the market value of municipal assets, the next step in sound asset management is to understand the magnitude of the benefits the city receives from rising revenues and asset prices.

S_s: 以色列明确表示，若爆发新冲突，将以全面胜利为目标。
S_f: 在两次与真主党交战打和之后，以色列明确表示，若爆发新冲突，将以全面胜利为目标。
T_s: Israel has made it clear that it will aim for total victory in the event of a new conflict.
T_f: After two wars with Hizbullah, Israel has made it clear that it will aim for total victory in any new conflict.

S_s: 在一个增长缓慢，债务高企，分配压力巨大的世界，通货膨胀究竟是死了还是仅仅休眠是一个问题。
S_f: 在一个增长缓慢，债务高企，分配压力巨大的世界，通货膨胀究竟是死了还是仅仅休眠是一个重要问题。
T_s: In a world of slow growth, high debt and high distributional pressures, it is a question whether inflation is dead or merely dormant.
T_f: In a world of slow growth, high debt and high distributional pressures, whether inflation is dead or merely dormant is an important question.

S_s: 土耳其是受世界金融危机影响最小的几个国家之一，对外贸易持续增长，银行系统稳健，同时拥有兴旺发达的中小企业。
S_f: 土耳其是受世界金融危机影响最小的几个国家之一，对外贸易持续增长，银行系统稳健，同时拥有大量兴旺发达的中小企业。
T_s: Turkey, one of the few countries least affected by the world financial crisis, has growing foreign trade, a robust banking system and a thriving small and medium-sized enterprise sector.
T_f: Turkey, one of the few countries least affected by the world financial crisis, has growing foreign trade, a robust banking system and a thriving number of small and medium-sized enterprises.

S_s: 土耳其当局挫败了另一起袭击，这起袭击本来是计划与袭击同一天发生的。
S_f: 土耳其当局挫败了另一起袭击，这起袭击本来是计划与巴黎袭击同一天发生的。
T_s: Turkish authorities foiled another attack that had been planned for the same day as the attack.
T_f: Turkish authorities foiled another attack that had been planned for the same day as the Paris attacks.

S_s: 还需要欧洲诸国共同承担一些责任，并采取措施大幅延缓难民流，同时保护这些逃离冲突和死亡的人的人权。
S_f: 因此，还需要欧洲诸国共同承担一些责任，并采取措施大幅延缓难民流，同时保护这些逃离冲突和死亡的人的人权。
T_s: There also needs to be some shared responsibility across Europe and measures to significantly slow the flow of refugees while protecting the human rights of those fleeing conflict and death.
T_f: So there is also a need for Europe to share some responsibility and take steps to significantly slow the flow of refugees while protecting the human rights of those fleeing conflict and death.

S_s: 塞尔维亚今天迈向与欧洲并轨的进程需要与前南斯拉夫国际刑事法庭的通力合作。
S_f: 同过去一样，塞尔维亚今天迈向与欧洲并轨的进程需要与前南斯拉夫国际刑事法庭的通力合作。
T_s: Serbia's progress towards European integration today requires close cooperation with the International Criminal Tribunal for the former Yugoslavia.
T_f: Today, as in the past, Serbia's progress towards European integration requires full cooperation with the International Criminal Tribunal for the former Yugoslavia.

S_s: 另一个经常被提到的战略则是公私伙伴关系，但这可能也不会像标榜的那样有益。
S_f: 同样，另一个经常被提到的战略则是公私伙伴关系，但这可能也不会像标榜的那样有益。
T_s: Public-private partnerships, another oft-mentioned strategy, may not be as beneficial as advertised.
T_f: Similarly, public-private partnerships, another oft-mentioned strategy, may not be as beneficial as advertised.

S_s: 作为邻国，伊朗是土耳其的传统贸易伙伴，每年贸易往来超过150亿美元。
S_f: 同样重要的是，作为邻国，伊朗是土耳其的传统贸易伙伴，每年贸易往来超过150亿美元。
T_s: As a neighbor, Iran is Turkey's traditional trading partner, with more than $15 billion in annual trade.
T_f: Just as important, as a neighbor, Iran is Turkey's traditional trading partner, with more than $15 billion in annual trade.

S_s: 新的一代政治领导人的涌现，让被认为是对政治玩世不恭的法国人看起来重新获得了对政治独特的热情。
S_f: 同时，新的一代政治领导人的涌现，让被认为是对政治玩世不恭的法国人看起来重新获得了对政治独特的热情。
T_s: The emergence of a new generation of political leaders has made the supposedly cynical French seem to have regained their unique passion for politics.
T_f: At the same time, a new generation of political leaders has made the supposedly cynical French seem to have regained their unique enthusiasm for politics.

S_s: 各国可以共富贵，为了保存自己，只能不惜牺牲邻居了。
S_f: 各国可以共富贵，但在患难面前，为了保存自己，只能不惜牺牲邻居了。
T_s: Countries can be rich together, in order to preserve themselves, can only at the expense of their neighbors.
T_f: Countries may share wealth and prosperity, but in the face of adversity, in order to preserve themselves, can only sacrifice their neighbors.

S_s: 另一个存在的额外论据则在当今贫穷国家尤为吃香，认为无条件基本收入有助于妇女解放。
S_f: 另一个一直存在的额外论据则在当今贫穷国家尤为吃香，认为无条件基本收入有助于妇女解放。
T_s: An additional argument that exists, especially in poor countries today, is that an unconditional basic income helps liberate women.
T_f: An additional argument that persists, especially in poor countries today, is that an unconditional basic income helps to liberate women.

S_s: 即使那些没有陷于危机的国家也会发现，由于税收所得的下降，外汇储备正在崩溃，财政赤字激增。

S_s: 他会做出有利于美国的事情，不会陷入棘手的道德困境，或因为要为世界其他国家负责的大责任而分心。

S_s: 抛弃欧元重新引入本国货币至少需要几周时间，而1931年英国利用周末市场不开盘的时间就能让英镑脱离黄金。

S_s: 这里曾经是举世公认的发源地，而如今，这座全球首屈一指的科技枢纽正在日益受到质疑和怨恨。

T_s: Once recognised as the world's birthplace, the world's premier technology hub is now increasingly being questioned and resented.
T_f: Once recognised as the birthplace of innovation, the world's premier technology hub is now increasingly being questioned and resented.

S_s: 这部法律目前只影响到什叶派少数族裔，不过或许会影响到可能限制非什叶派妇女权利的法案。
S_f: 这部法律目前只影响到什叶派少数族裔，不过或许会影响到可能限制非什叶派妇女权利的即将表决的法案。
T_s: The law currently affects only the Shiite minority, though it could affect bills that could restrict the rights of non-Shiite women.
T_f: The law currently affects only the Shiite minority, though it may affect upcoming bills that could limit the rights of non-Shiite women.

S_s: 这让像萨尔科奇那样的批评者安慰，并且给他们压力，由于欧洲央行通胀的偏向对欧元的影响而放弃之。
S_f: 这让像萨尔科奇那样的欧洲央行的批评者安慰，并且给他们压力，由于欧洲央行通胀的偏向对欧元的影响而放弃之。
T_s: That comforts critics such as Mr Sarkozy, and puts pressure on them to abandon the ECB's inflation bias because of its impact on the euro.
T_f: That comforts critics of the ECB, such as Mr Sarkozy, and puts pressure on them to abandon the ECB's inflation bias because of its impact on the euro.

S_s: 她在商业和政治这两大职业领域中都有出色的表现，其魅力也不容小觑。
S_f: 这样看来，她在商业和政治这两大职业领域中都有出色的表现，其魅力也不容小觑。
T_s: She has excelled in two professions, business and politics, and her charisma is not to be underestimated.
T_f: In this way, she has excelled in two professions, business and politics, and her charisma is not to be underestimated.

S_s: 这是一种其中通过克隆出原有产品的虚拟单位，从现有的房贷证券中衍生出来的证券产品。
S_f: 这是一种其中通过克隆出原有产品的虚拟单位，从现有的房贷证券中衍生出来的复杂组合证券产品。
T_s: This is a security product derived from existing mortgage securities by cloning virtual units of the original product.
T_f: It is a complex portfolio of securities derived from existing mortgage securities by cloning virtual units of the original product.

S_s: 这对于政府官员来说并不总是一件也让人舒服的事情，并且在公开敏感材料的问题上还存在着斗争。
S_f: 这对于政府官员来说并不总是一件也让人舒服的事情，并且在公开敏感材料的问题上还存在着激烈的斗争。
T_s: This is not always a comfortable thing for government officials to do, and there are battles over the release of sensitive material.
T_f: This is not always a comfortable experience for government officials, and there are fierce battles over the release of sensitive material.

S_s: 海滩让我们知道，团结就是力量，能够摧毁一切危险，不管它多么大。
S_f: 这些海滩让我们知道，团结就是力量，能够摧毁一切危险，不管它多么大。
T_s: The beach lets us know that unity is strength and can destroy all dangers, no matter how great.
T_f: These beaches let us know that unity is strength and can destroy all dangers, no matter how great.

S_s: 数字并不能识别最优秀的环境友好型解决方案，只能揭示哪些公司目前排放了最多的温室气体。
S_f: 这些数字并不能识别最优秀的环境友好型解决方案，只能揭示哪些公司目前排放了最多的温室气体。
T_s: Numbers do not identify the best environmentally friendly solutions, only reveal which companies currently emit the most greenhouse gases.
T_f: These numbers do not identify the best environmentally friendly solutions, only reveal which companies currently emit the most greenhouse gases.

S_s: 国家如今需要痛苦、深远的改革以实现经济繁荣，这既是目标，也是文化变革的先决条件。
S_f: 这些国家如今需要痛苦、深远的改革以实现经济繁荣，这既是目标，也是文化变革的先决条件。
T_s: The country now needs painful, far-reaching reforms to achieve economic prosperity, both as a goal and as a prerequisite for cultural change.
T_f: These countries now need painful, far-reaching reforms to achieve economic prosperity, which is both a goal and a prerequisite for cultural change.

S_s: 这也是为什么欧洲议会在11月全票通过，只有当该行为规范具备法律约束力时才能解除武器禁售。
S_f: 这也是为什么欧洲议会在11月全票通过，只有当该行为规范具备法律约束力时才能解除对华武器禁售。
T_s: That is why the European Parliament voted unanimously in November to lift the arms ban only when the code of conduct becomes legally binding.
T_f: That is why the European Parliament voted unanimously in November to lift arms sales to China only when the code of conduct becomes legally binding.

S_s: 这两大领域疲软已久，是周期动态中的主要拖累因素，在传统上，周期动态总会将美国带出经济减速。
S_f: 这两大领域疲软已久，是周期动态中的主要拖累因素，在传统上，周期动态总会将美国带出暂时性的经济减速。
T_s: These two areas have been weak for a long time and are major drags on the cyclical dynamics that have traditionally pulled the US out of an economic slowdown.
T_f: These two areas have been weak for a long time and are the main drag on the cyclical dynamics that have traditionally pulled the US out of temporary slowdowns.

S_s: 这一冲动可以从欧洲议会主席马丁·舒尔茨激烈的评论中一窥端倪。
S_f: 这一自利冲动可以从欧洲议会主席马丁·舒尔茨激烈的评论中一窥端倪。
T_s: A glimpse of this impulse can be found in the fiery comments of Martin Schulz, the president of the European Parliament.
T_f: A glimpse of this self-interested impulse can be found in the fiery comments of Martin Schulz, the president of the European Parliament.

S_s: 这一政治关系也许给这家银行续了几年性命，直到零碎干预导致市场方案已经无从下手。
S_f: 这一政治关系也许给这家银行续了几年性命，直到前后矛盾的零碎干预导致市场方案已经无从下手。
T_s: This political connection may have kept the bank alive for a few years, until piecemeal interventions rendered the market solution unworkable.
T_f: This political connection may have kept the bank alive for a few years, until inconsistent and piecemeal interventions rendered the market plan unworkable.

S_s: 问题仍不在于谁抛出了更好的政策或是更靠谱的想法，而在于演讲的表现。
S_f: 这一回，问题仍不在于谁抛出了更好的政策或是更靠谱的想法，而在于演讲的表现。
T_s: The question remains not who has the better policy or the sounder idea, but the presentation.
T_f: This time, again, it's not about who has the better policies or the sounder ideas, it's about the presentation.

S_s: 阿卜杜拉国王十分坚定地认为约旦人民应该在2012年之前获得自由公平选举的权利。
S_f: 过去一年来，阿卜杜拉国王十分坚定地认为约旦人民应该在2012年之前获得自由公平选举的权利。
T_s: King Abdullah is adamant that Jordanians should be given the right to free and fair elections by 2012.
T_f: Over the past year, King Abdullah has been very firm in his belief that the Jordanian people should have the right to free and fair elections by 2012.

S_s: 2000年的普京承诺要驯服在前任鲍里斯•叶利钦时期恣意妄为的资本主义。
S_f: 跟一个半世纪前的贝隆一样，2000年的普京承诺要驯服在前任鲍里斯•叶利钦时期恣意妄为的资本主义。
T_s: In 2000 Mr Putin promised to tame the capitalism that had run amokay under his predecessor, Boris Yeltsin.
T_f: Like Mr Peron a century and a half earlier, Mr Putin in 2000 promised to tame the capitalism that had run amokay under his predecessor, Boris Yeltsin.

S_s: 财政政策是显而易见的替代方案，但国会在最糟糕的时候选择了减税，这使得需要的时候不再有刺激空间。
S_f: 财政政策是显而易见的替代方案，但国会在最糟糕的时候选择了减税，这使得真正需要的时候不再有刺激空间。
T_s: Fiscal policy is the obvious alternative, but Congress opted for tax cuts at the worst possible time, leaving no room for stimulus when it was needed.
T_f: Fiscal policy is the obvious alternative, but Congress opted for tax cuts at the worst possible time, leaving no room for stimulus when it was really needed.

S_s: 该项目于2014年启动，并已经在埃塞俄比亚等两个非洲国家得到成功实施。
S_f: 该项目于2014年启动，并已经在埃塞俄比亚和塞内加尔等两个非洲国家得到成功实施。
T_s: The program was launched in 2014 and has already been successfully implemented in two African countries, including Ethiopia.
T_f: The program was launched in 2014 and has already been successfully implemented in two African countries, Ethiopia and Senegal.

S_s: 该理由的支持者难以解释英国可以与欧盟缔结何种贸易协定，更不用说这些协定如何能够优于当前安排了。
S_f: 该理由的支持者难以解释英国可以与欧盟缔结何种贸易和合作伙伴协定，更不用说这些协定如何能够优于当前安排了。
T_s: Supporters of this argument struggle to explain what trade deals the UK could strike with the EU, let alone how they could be superior to current arrangements.
T_f: Supporters of this argument struggle to explain what trade and partnership agreements the UK could enter into with the EU, let alone how they could be superior to current arrangements.

S_s: 该提议的逻辑是如果股东买卖自身的股票，企业高管就被迫要在每季度都实现高收益，以确保股价不会下降。
S_f: 该提议的逻辑是如果股东频繁买卖自身的股票，企业高管就被迫要在每季度都实现高收益，以确保股价不会下降。
T_s: The logic of the proposal is that if shareholders buy or sell their own stock, executives will be forced to deliver high returns every quarter to ensure that the share price does not fall.
T_f: The logic of the proposal is that if shareholders frequently buy and sell their own stock, executives will be forced to deliver high returns every quarter to ensure that the share price does not fall.

S_s: 该合同将以标准普尔及蔡斯席勒住房价格指数进行结算，该指数源于我近20年前开发研究得出的学术成果。
S_f: 该合同将以标准普尔及蔡斯席勒住房价格指数进行结算，该指数源于我和同事蔡斯近20年前开发研究得出的学术成果。
T_s: The contract will be based on the Standard & Poor's and the Zeiss Shiller Home Price Index, which I developed and researched nearly 20 years ago.
T_f: The contract will be settled with the Standard & Poor's and Chase Shiller Home Price Index, which is based on research that my colleague Chase and I developed nearly 20 years ago.

S_s: 结局肯定不会像电影那样戏剧化，因为美联储不像汉斯那样以接管市场为目标。
S_f: 话虽如此，结局肯定不会像电影那样戏剧化，因为美联储不像汉斯那样以接管市场为目标。
T_s: The ending will certainly not be as dramatic as the movie, because the Fed does not aim to take over the market, as Hans did.
T_f: That said, the ending will certainly not be movie-like, because the Fed doesn't aim to take over the market, as Hans did.

S_s: 许多非洲国家利用过去十年实行了有效的经济政策，而这些政策带来了强劲的经济增长以及低通货膨胀。
S_f: 许多非洲国家利用过去十年实行了有效和可持续的经济政策，而这些政策带来了强劲的经济增长以及低通货膨胀。
T_s: Many African countries have used the past decade to implement effective economic policies that have resulted in strong economic growth and low inflation.
T_f: Many African countries have used the past decade to implement effective and sustainable economic policies, which have resulted in strong economic growth and low inflation.

S_s: 许多国家的银行系统也比以前更加可靠，而它们的公共债务比率尽管有所上升，仍处于较低水平，偿债能力风险很小。
S_f: 许多国家的银行系统也比以前更加可靠，而它们的公共和私人债务比率尽管有所上升，仍处于较低水平，偿债能力风险很小。
T_s: The banking systems of many countries are also more reliable than before, while their public debt ratios, despite their rise, remain low and pose little risk to solvency.
T_f: The banking systems of many countries are also more reliable than before, while their public-private debt ratios, despite increases, remain low and pose little risk to solvency.

S_s: 许多国家仍然需要改善防卫并且落实联合国制定的有关反恐的文书，包括反对资助恐怖份子的公约。
S_f: 许多国家仍然需要改善防卫并且落实联合国制定的16项有关反恐的文书，包括反对资助恐怖份子的公约。
T_s: Many countries still need to improve their defences and implement UN counter-terrorism instruments, including the convention against the financing of terrorists.
T_f: Many countries still need to improve their defences and implement 16 UN counter-terrorism instruments, including the convention against the financing of terrorists.

S_s: 要想解决这个问题，公民不仅需要体制支持，还需要获得更好的工具，来要求各方尊重他们的健康权。
S_f: 要想解决这个问题，全球健康公民不仅需要体制支持，还需要获得更好的工具，来要求各方尊重他们的健康权。
T_s: To solve this problem, citizens need not only institutional support, but also better tools to demand respect for their right to health.
T_f: To solve this problem, global health citizens need not only institutional support, but also better tools to demand respect for their right to health.

S_s: 要想确保美联储的独立性这一全球范围内最重要的公共利益，奥巴马应该解除美联储核心角色之外的权力。
S_f: 要想确保美联储的独立性这一全球范围内最重要的公共利益，奥巴马应该解除美联储核心角色之外的所有权力。
T_s: To ensure the Fed's independence, which is the most important public good on a global scale, Mr Obama should disarm the central bank from its central role.
T_f: To ensure the Fed's independence, which is the most important public good in the world, Mr Obama should remove all powers outside the central Fed's role.

S_s: 虽然这场丑闻中的许多指控都是站不住脚的，但却已经成功令军方不敢再肆意挑战权威了。
S_f: 虽然这场丑闻中的许多指控都是站不住脚的，但却已经成功令军方不敢再肆意挑战总理的权威了。
T_s: Although many of the allegations in the scandal are flimsy, it has succeeded in discouraging the military from challenging authority.
T_f: Although many of the allegations in the scandal are flimsy, it has succeeded in deterring the military from challenging the prime minister's authority.

S_s: 虽然经济起伏令人伤透脑筋，但过去50年为我们带来了全球经济增长红利。
S_f: 虽然经济起伏令人伤透脑筋，但过去50年为我们带来了前所未有的全球经济增长红利。
T_s: As painful as economic ups and downs are, the past 50 years have brought dividends in global economic growth.
T_f: While economic ups and downs have been nerve-wracking, the past 50 years have delivered unprecedented dividends of global economic growth.

S_s: 虽然无法证明企实现了减排，但是证明这一点的可实行性。
S_f: 虽然无法证明企业以最小的代价实现了减排，但是证明这一点的可实行性。
T_s: Although it cannot prove that the enterprise has achieved emission reduction, it can prove that it is feasible.
T_f: Although it is not possible to prove that the enterprise has achieved emission reduction at the minimum cost, it is feasible to prove this.

S_s: 虽然投资银行家们没有倾家荡产，今年又赚得盆盈钵满，但这只是枝节问题。
S_f: 虽然投资银行家们去年12月没有倾家荡产，今年又赚得盆盈钵满，但这只是枝节问题。
T_s: While investment bankers have not broken the bank and are doing well again this year, that is a side issue.
T_f: While investment bankers did not break the bank in December and are doing well again this year, that is a side issue.

S_s: 荷、比、卢经济联盟三国反对由大国派人担任新的欧盟理事会主席。
S_f: 荷、比、卢经济联盟三国和其它几个欧盟小国反对由大国派人担任新的欧盟理事会主席。
T_s: The Netherlands, Belgium and Belgium are opposed to the idea of a big country as the new president of the European Council.
T_f: The Netherlands, Belgium and several other small EU countries oppose the idea of a big country as the new council president.

S_s: 历史学家弗里茨·施特恩写过一本有关德国的书，书名是《对文化绝望的政治》。
S_f: 若干年前，历史学家弗里茨·施特恩写过一本有关德国的书，书名是《对文化绝望的政治》。
T_s: Fritz Stern, a historian, wrote a book about Germany called "The Politics of Cultural Despair".
T_f: Some years ago, the historian Fritz Stern wrote a book about Germany called "The Politics of Cultural Despair."

S_s: 自从通过一场政变获得权力后，穆沙拉夫至少已经躲过了三次严重的暗伤图谋。
S_f: 自从在1999年通过一场政变获得权力后，穆沙拉夫至少已经躲过了三次严重的暗伤图谋。
T_s: Since coming to power in a coup, Mr. Musharraf has survived at least three serious attempts at backstabbing.
T_f: Since taking power in a coup in 1999, Mr. Musharraf has survived at least three serious attempts to sabotage him.

S_s: 联合利华从小农处收购原材料的比例较大，并承诺实现主要原材料100%来自可持续供应源。
S_f: 联合利华从小农处收购原材料的比例较大，并承诺在2020年实现主要原材料100%来自可持续供应源。
T_s: Unilever buys a large proportion of its raw materials from smallholder farmers and has committed to sourcing 100 per cent of its primary materials from sustainable sources.
T_f: Unilever buys a larger proportion of its raw materials from smallholder farmers and has committed to sourcing 100% of its primary raw materials from sustainable sources by 2020.

S_s: 因为布鲁塞尔峰会已经为在欧盟17+基础上建立财政联盟的打开了缺口。
S_f: 而这一切也逐渐成为现实，因为布鲁塞尔峰会已经为在欧盟17+基础上建立财政联盟的打开了缺口。
T_s: The Brussels summit has opened the door to a fiscal union based on the Euro 17 plus.
T_f: This is becoming a reality, as the Brussels summit has opened the door to a fiscal union based on the Euro 17 Plus.

S_s: 而欧洲，在美国的大力支持下，制止了二十世纪九十年代的大屠杀并且随后帮助这些巴尔干国家进行了重建。
S_f: 而欧洲，在美国的大力支持下，努力地制止了二十世纪九十年代的大屠杀并且随后帮助这些巴尔干国家进行了重建。
T_s: Europe, with strong support from the United States, stopped the carnage in the 1990s and subsequently helped the Balkan countries rebuild.
T_f: Europe, with strong support from the United States, worked hard to stop the massacres of the 1990s and subsequently helped the Balkan countries rebuild.

S_s: 而更大的市场为投资者提供了更大的进入激励，也给政府提供了更大的公共品供给激励。
S_f: 而更大的市场为投资者和交易者提供了更大的进入激励，也给政府提供了更大的公共品供给激励。
T_s: And a larger market provides greater incentives for investors to enter and for the government to provide greater incentives for public goods.
T_f: And a larger market provides greater incentives for investors and traders to enter, as well as greater incentives for the government to supply public goods.

S_s: 而当年他描述的这一响应机制基本上就是经济危机时美联储实施政策的预览。
S_f: 而当年他描述的这一响应机制基本上就是2008年经济危机时美联储实施政策的预览。
T_s: The response he described was essentially a preview of what the Fed would do during the crisis.
T_f: The response he described was essentially a preview of what the Fed did during the 2008 financial crisis.

S_s: 而如果这一措施成为欧洲自身也非常需要的政策的开始，那么欧洲还可以通过拯救乌克兰拯救它自己。
S_f: 而如果这一措施成为欧洲自身也非常需要的增长政策的开始，那么欧洲还可以通过拯救乌克兰拯救它自己。
T_s: And if this is the start of a policy that Europe itself badly needs, it can also save itself by saving Ukraine.
T_f: And if this is the start of a growth policy that Europe itself badly needs, it can also save itself by saving Ukraine.

S_s: 而如今的游行只不过让人们隐约想起了过去那些时代，各地的政党也在大批量地流失党员。
S_f: 而如今的游行和示威只不过让人们隐约想起了过去那些时代，各地的政党也在大批量地流失党员。
T_s: Today's demonstrations are only a faint reminder of those days, when political parties everywhere are losing members en masse.
T_f: Today's marches and demonstrations are only a faint reminder of those days, and political parties everywhere are losing members en masse.

S_s: 而在当下违约风险被消除之后，资金又大量从风险资产中流出，以等待利空出尽。
S_f: 而在当下违约风险被消除之后，资金又大量从风险资产中流出，流入美国国债，以等待利空出尽。
T_s: Now that the risk of default has been removed, there has been a flood of money out of risky assets, waiting for profits to clear.
T_f: Now that the risk of default has been removed, money has flowed out of risky assets and into US Treasuries, waiting for the market to empty.

S_s: 全球经济和气候委员会估计这样的城市可以在今后15年减少对城市基础建设的资金需求超过3万亿。

T_f: Moreover, the Global Commission on the Economy and Climate estimates that such cities could reduce the financial need for urban infrastructure by more than $3 trillion over the next 15 years.

S_s: 他们准备在国家层面，而不是在整个欧元区层面做这件事。
S_f: 此外，他们准备在国家层面，而不是在整个欧元区层面做这件事。
T_s: They are prepared to do this at the national level, not at the eurozone level.
T_f: Moreover, they are prepared to do this at the national level, not at the eurozone level.

S_s: 正如参议院金融委员会的方案草案所指出的，美国应该抛弃其原则，采用领地制度对美国跨国公司海外利润课税。
S_f: 正如参议院金融委员会的方案草案所指出的，美国应该抛弃其全球公司税原则，采用领地制度对美国跨国公司海外利润课税。
T_s: As the Senate Finance Committee's draft plan suggests, America should ditch its principles and adopt a territorial system for taxing the foreign profits of American multinationals.
T_f: As the Senate Finance Committee's draft plan suggests, America should ditch its global corporate-tax principle and adopt a territorial system for taxing the foreign profits of American multinationals.

S_s: 格鲁吉亚不断地向亲西方靠拢，包括和北约的联系，一直是莫斯科的眼睛中的一粒沙子。
S_f: 格鲁吉亚不断地向亲西方靠拢，包括和北约不断加强的联系，一直是莫斯科的眼睛中的一粒沙子。
T_s: Georgia's continued drift towards the West, including its ties to NATO, has been a grain of sand in Moscow's eye.
T_f: Georgia's growing pro-Western tilt, including its growing ties with NATO, has been a grain of sand in Moscow's eye.

S_s: 某些主要石油盈余国家，最为主要的是伊朗一直是当今世界秩序的敌人，现在它们的羽翼已经被剪除。
S_f: 某些主要石油盈余国家，最为主要的是伊朗、委内瑞拉以及俄罗斯一直是当今世界秩序的敌人，现在它们的羽翼已经被剪除。
T_s: Some of the major oil surplus countries, most notably Iran, have been enemies of the current world order and now their wings have been clipped.
T_f: Some of the major oil surplus countries, most notably Iran, Venezuela and Russia, have been enemies of the current world order, and now their wings have been clipped.

S_s: 技术可以让劳动者雇佣所需资本，并以前所未有的自主权工作。
S_f: 未来，技术可以让劳动者雇佣所需资本，并以前所未有的自主权工作。
T_s: Technology allows workers to hire the capital they need and work with unprecedented autonomy.
T_f: In the future, technology will allow workers to hire the capital they need and work with unprecedented autonomy.

S_s: 该新兴细分人口群体将成为地区经济政治发展的基石，对世界其他国家也将产生显著的影响。
S_f: 未来几十年，该新兴细分人口群体将成为地区经济政治发展的基石，对世界其他国家也将产生显著的影响。
T_s: This new demographic segment will become the cornerstone of the region's economic and political development, and will have a significant impact on the rest of the world.
T_f: In the coming decades, this emerging demographic segment will become the cornerstone of the region's economic and political development, with significant implications for the rest of the world.

S_s: 这些措施有望将土耳其纳入欧洲大家庭，从而阻止它朝远离我们的共同欧洲价值的方向越滑越远。
S_f: 最重要的是，这些措施有望将土耳其纳入欧洲大家庭，从而阻止它朝远离我们的共同欧洲价值的方向越滑越远。
T_s: These measures will hopefully bring Turkey into the European family, thereby preventing it from slipping further and further away from our common European values.
T_f: Above all, they promise to bring Turkey into the European family, thereby stopping it slipping further and further away from our common European values.

S_s: 在埃及成为美国盟友并与以色列和解后，美国在该地区的地位提高了。
S_f: 最终，在埃及成为美国盟友并与以色列和解后，美国在该地区的地位提高了。
T_s: America's standing in the region improved after Egypt became an ally and made peace with Israel.
T_f: Ultimately, America's standing in the region improved after Egypt became an ally and made peace with Israel.

S_s: 在美国，二战的逼近以及伴随而生的军工产品需求使得私人部门雇主开始以可接受的工资水平雇用长期失业者。
S_f: 最后，在美国，二战的逼近以及伴随而生的军工产品需求使得私人部门雇主开始以可接受的工资水平雇用长期失业者。
T_s: In the US, the approach of the second world war and the attendant demand for military goods caused private employers to start hiring the long-term unemployed at acceptable wages.
T_f: Finally, in the US, the approach of the second world war and the attendant demand for military goods caused private employers to start hiring the long-term unemployed at acceptable wages.

S_s: 明天的中东将与短短两个月前大不一样，但未来的局势如何尚不得而知。
S_f: 明天的中东将与短短两个月前大不一样，但该地区未来的局势如何尚不得而知。
T_s: The Middle East tomorrow will be very different from what it was just two months ago, but it is unclear what the future holds.
T_f: The Middle East tomorrow will be very different from what it was just two months ago, but what the future holds for the region is unclear.

S_s: 无法处理这些问题以及领导人就可能有建立从耶路撒冷经过贝鲁特直到德黑兰的更不稳定的弧形的风险。
S_f: 无法处理这些问题以及领导人就可能有建立从耶路撒冷经过贝鲁特、大马士革、巴格达直到德黑兰的更不稳定的弧形的风险。
T_s: Failure to deal with these issues and the leadership risks creating a more unstable arc from Jerusalem through Beirut to Tehran.
T_f: Failure to deal with these problems and the risk that the leadership will establish a more unstable arc from Jerusalem through Beirut, Damascus, Baghdad and on to Tehran.

S_s: 新一代药理学向实现这一目标迈出了一步。
S_f: 新一代药理学向实现这一目标迈出了充满希望的一步。
T_s: A new generation of pharmacology has taken a step towards achieving this goal.
T_f: The new generation of pharmacology has taken a promising step towards achieving this goal.

S_s: 数百人在冲突中死亡，许多居民区被毁，约有40万人沦为难民。
S_f: 数百人在冲突中死亡，许多居民区整个被毁，约有40万人沦为难民。
T_s: Hundreds of people have died in the conflict, many residential areas have been destroyed and some 400,000 people have become refugees.
T_f: Hundreds of people have died in the conflict, entire neighbourhoods have been destroyed and some 400,000 people have become refugees.

S_s: 二十年的经济扩张提高了年轻人对好工作的预期，但并没有很大地提升供应这类工作的能力。
S_f: 撒哈拉以南非洲二十年的经济扩张提高了年轻人对好工作的预期，但并没有很大地提升供应这类工作的能力。
T_s: Two decades of economic expansion have raised young people's expectations of good jobs, but not much of the capacity to supply them.
T_f: Two decades of economic expansion in sub-Saharan Africa has raised young people's expectations of good jobs, but not much of the capacity to supply them.

S_s: 搬到其他地方并且购买一套新公寓对大多数工人来说几乎是不可能的，这使他们非常缺乏流动性。
S_f: 搬到其他地方并且购买一套新公寓对大多数俄罗斯工人来说几乎是不可能的，这使他们非常缺乏流动性。
T_s: Moving elsewhere and buying a new apartment is almost impossible for most workers, making them very immobile.
T_f: Moving elsewhere and buying a new apartment is almost impossible for most Russian workers, making them highly immobile.

S_s: 一个弱势美元对贸易平衡的作用以及因此对增长的影响会受到两个因素的限制。
S_f: 或许更重要的是，一个弱势美元对贸易平衡的作用以及因此对增长的影响会受到两个因素的限制。
T_s: The effect of a weak dollar on the trade balance, and hence on growth, is limited by two factors.
T_f: Perhaps more importantly, the effect of a weak dollar on the trade balance, and hence on growth, is limited by two factors.

S_s: 我花了3年时间才在法庭上胜诉，幸运的是，俄国并没有对审判结果提出上诉。
S_f: 我花了3年时间才在伦敦的法庭上胜诉，幸运的是，俄国并没有对审判结果提出上诉。
T_s: It took me three years to win my case in court. Fortunately, Russia did not appeal the verdict.
T_f: It took me three years to win my case in a London court. Fortunately, Russia did not appeal against the verdict.

S_s: 我将把这一举措推向极致，任何一个国家都不会在投资开放程度上超越英国。
S_f: 我将把这一举措推向极致，任何一个西方国家都不会在投资开放程度上超越英国。
T_s: I will take this to the extreme, and no country will surpass the UK in openness to investment.
T_f: I will take this to the extreme and no western country will surpass the UK in openness to investment.

S_s: 我拜访一位朋友，本来只打算待两星期，结果却因为太喜欢那里而待了五年之久。
S_f: 我到马里兰州拜访一位朋友，本来只打算待两星期，结果却因为太喜欢那里而待了五年之久。
T_s: I visited a friend for two weeks but loved it so much that I stayed for five years.
T_f: I visited a friend in Maryland for two weeks, but loved it so much that I stayed for five years.

S_s: 我们这些当时活跃在金融市场上的人还清楚地记得那次事件标志着大萧条后的全球金融危机启动。
S_f: 我们这些当时活跃在金融市场上的人还清楚地记得那次事件标志着大萧条后最严重的全球金融危机启动。
T_s: Those of us who were active in the financial markets at the time remember well that this event marked the beginning of the global financial crisis that followed the Great Depression.
T_f: Those of us who were active in the financial markets at the time remember well that this event marked the start of the worst global financial crisis since the Great Depression.

S_s: 我与世界顶尖经济学家一起正在做这个尝试，我们开发了一套150年来记分卡。
S_f: 我与21位世界顶尖经济学家一起正在做这个尝试，我们开发了一套150年来记分卡。
T_s: I've been trying to do this with some of the world's leading economists, and we've developed a 150-year scorecard.
T_f: I'm trying to do this with 21 of the world's leading economists, and we've developed a 150-year scorecard.

S_s: 用欣欣向荣的波兰来和逐渐崩溃的西班牙对照是不准确的。
S_f: 当然，用欣欣向荣的波兰来和逐渐崩溃的西班牙对照是不准确的。
T_s: It is not accurate to compare a thriving Poland with a crumbling Spain.
T_f: Of course, it is not accurate to compare a booming Poland with a crumbling Spain.

S_s: 希腊的退出之举可能会对西班牙这样的国家起到警示作用，在这些国家，强烈反欧洲反建制的呼声正在上升。
S_f: 希腊的退出之举可能会对西班牙、意大利和法国这样的国家起到警示作用，在这些国家，强烈反欧洲反建制的呼声正在上升。
T_s: A Greek exit could serve as a warning to countries like Spain, where strong anti-European, anti-establishment voices are on the rise.
T_f: A Greek exit could serve as a warning to countries like Spain, Italy and France, where strong anti-European, anti-establishment voices are on the rise.

S_s: 空间不平等造就了大批没有未来的民众，他们普遍的希望只能是将时钟拨回到从前。
S_f: 巨大的空间不平等造就了大批没有未来的民众，他们普遍的希望只能是将时钟拨回到从前。
T_s: Spatial inequality has created masses of people with no future, whose common hope is to turn back the clock.
T_f: Great spatial inequality has created a mass of people with no future, whose common hope is to turn back the clock.

S_s: 尽管电信行业从这个意义上说有其特殊之处，但政府调控同样也阻碍了发展。
S_f: 尽管电信行业从这个意义上说有其特殊之处，但政府调控同样也阻碍了这个行业的发展。
T_s: Although the telecoms industry is special in this sense, government regulation is also holding back development.
T_f: Although the telecoms industry is special in this sense, it is also hampered by government regulation.

S_s: 尽管毕业典礼对我来说如此平常，但当我看到学生完成了生命中的一个阶段、开始考虑他们的我来时，我都会感到激动。
S_f: 尽管毕业典礼对我来说如此平常，但当我看到学生完成了生命中的一个阶段、开始考虑他们的我来时，我都会感到十分激动。
T_s: As normal as graduation is for me, I get a thrill when I see students complete a stage in their lives and begin to think about themselves.
T_f: As normal as graduation is for me, I get a thrill when I see students complete a stage in their lives and begin to think about themselves.

S_s: 尽管我捍卫个人发表言论的权利，但我自己绝不会发表这样的言论，也不会听发表这一言论的人。
S_f: 尽管我捍卫个人发表种族主义言论的权利，但我自己绝不会发表这样的言论，也不会听发表这一言论的人。
T_s: While I defend the right of individuals to say what they say, I would never say it myself or listen to the person who said it.
T_f: While I defend an individual's right to make a racist statement, I would never make such a statement myself or listen to the person who made it.

S_s: 尽管空袭已持续了三个多月，某种僵局似乎出现。
S_f: 尽管对穆阿迈尔•卡扎菲军队的空袭已持续了三个多月，某种僵局似乎出现。
T_s: Despite more than three months of air strikes, something of a stalemate seems to be emerging.
T_f: Despite more than three months of air strikes against Muammer Gaddafi's forces, something of a stalemate seems to be emerging.

S_s: 尽管哈马斯对此次大选采取抵制态度，但哈马斯支持者表示还是会支持最能保护巴勒斯坦人民核心利益的候选人。
S_f: 尽管哈马斯对此次大选采取抵制态度，但许多哈马斯支持者表示还是会支持最能保护巴勒斯坦人民核心利益的候选人。
T_s: Although Hamas boycotted the election, its supporters say they will support the candidate who best protects the core interests of the Palestinian people.
T_f: Although Hamas boycotted the election, many Hamas supporters say they will support the candidate who best protects the core interests of the Palestinian people.

S_s: 尽管8月份人民币对飙升的美元出现了3%的微小名义贬值，但它仍然高估。
S_f: 尽管8月份人民币对飙升的美元出现了3%的微小名义贬值，但它仍然大幅高估。
T_s: Despite a tiny nominal depreciation of 3% against the surging dollar in August, the renminbi remains overvalued.
T_f: Despite a tiny nominal depreciation of 3 per cent against the surging dollar in August, the renminbi remains hugely overvalued.

S_s: 对欧洲经济监察行为绩效的任何评估都应该质问为何希腊危机会在全球金融危机爆发近两年后的2010年春才爆发。
S_f: 对近几年欧洲经济监察行为绩效的任何评估都应该质问为何希腊危机会在全球金融危机爆发近两年后的2010年春才爆发。
T_s: Any assessment of the performance of European economic surveillance should ask why the Greek crisis took until the spring of 2010, nearly two years after the global financial crisis.
T_f: Any assessment of the performance of European economic surveillance in recent years should ask why the Greek crisis took until the spring of 2010, nearly two years after the global financial crisis.

S_s: 对于生活在西欧这类高速老龄化社会中的我们来说，这些移民是必需的。
S_f: 对于生活在西欧和日本这类高速老龄化社会中的我们来说，这些移民是必需的。
T_s: These immigrants are necessary for us to live in rapidly aging societies like those in Western Europe.
T_f: These immigrants are necessary for those of us who live in rapidly aging societies like Western Europe and Japan.

S_s: 老人政治的代价是将所谓老年人拥有的平等建立在牺牲年轻人的前提上，即所谓权力自享，债留子孙。
S_f: 实际上，老人政治的代价是将所谓老年人拥有的平等建立在牺牲年轻人的前提上，即所谓权力自享，债留子孙。
T_s: The price of gerontocracy is the assumption that the equality of the old is at the expense of the young: power to itself, debt to posterity.
T_f: In fact, gerontocracy comes at the expense of the young at the expense of the so-called equality of the old: power for itself, debt for posterity.

S_s: 导致法国反对2003年入侵伊拉克的同样一种法国和联合国关系现在却在促成2011年法国进行利比亚干涉。
S_f: 实际上，导致法国反对2003年入侵伊拉克的同样一种法国和联合国关系现在却在促成2011年法国进行利比亚干涉。
T_s: The same ties with the UN that led France to oppose the invasion of Iraq in 2003 are now driving the French intervention in Libya in 2011.
T_f: Indeed, the same relationship between France and the United Nations that led France to oppose the invasion of Iraq in 2003 is now driving France's intervention in Libya in 2011.

S_s: 富人和企业在互相竞争的同时，也在与其它利益集团展开争夺。
S_f: 实际上，富人和企业在互相竞争的同时，也在与其它利益集团展开争夺。
T_s: As well as competing with each other, the wealthy and corporations compete with other interest groups.
T_f: In effect, the rich and corporations are competing with other interest groups as well as with each other.

S_s: 基地组织通过诗词来规定恐怖运动成员的内涵并且通过赞美所谓烈士的功绩来渲染这一恐怖组织历史上的重大事件。
S_f: 实际上，基地组织通过诗词来规定恐怖运动成员的内涵并且通过赞美所谓烈士的功绩来渲染这一恐怖组织历史上的重大事件。
T_s: Al-qaeda uses poetry to define what constitutes a member of the terrorist movement and plays up major events in the terrorist group's history by celebrating the exploits of so-called martyrs.
T_f: In fact, al Qaeda uses poetry to define what it means to be a member of the terrorist movement and plays up major events in the terrorist group's history by celebrating the exploits of so-called martyrs.

S_s: 和美国相比，从很多方面来说，英国的银行救助和劳动力市场政策都更好一些。
S_f: 实际上，和美国相比，从很多方面来说，英国的银行救助和劳动力市场政策都更好一些。
T_s: In many ways Britain's bank bailouts and labour-market policies are better than America's.
T_f: In fact, in many ways Britain's bank bailouts and labour-market policies were better than America's.

S_s: 这一阶段正是为大选铺路的时候了。
S_f: 如此看来，这一阶段正是为大选铺路的时候了。
T_s: This phase is the time to pave the way for the general election.
T_f: So the stage is set to pave the way for an election.

S_s: 如果欧洲人不携手合作解决问题，无数人还会淹死在地中海，而欧盟也将继续走上瓦解的道路。
S_f: 如果欧洲人不携手合作解决移民问题，无数人还会淹死在地中海，而欧盟也将继续走上瓦解的道路。
T_s: If Europeans do not work together to solve the problem, countless people will drown in the Mediterranean and the EU will continue on the path to disintegration.
T_f: If Europeans do not work together to solve the migration problem, countless people will continue to drown in the Mediterranean and the EU will continue on the path to disintegration.

S_s: 如果政治事实是正确的，那么政客在撒谎的问题上并不那么相似。
S_f: 如果政治事实和其他类似组织是正确的，那么政客在撒谎的问题上并不那么相似。
T_s: If political facts are correct, politicians aren't all that similar when it comes to lying.
T_f: If political facts and other similar organizations are correct, politicians aren't all that similar when it comes to lying.

S_s: 很难想象有人还会持有1979年撒切尔在英国以及1981年里根在美国上台时的思想。
S_f: 如今，很难想象有人还会持有1979年撒切尔在英国以及1981年里根在美国上台时的思想。
T_s: It is hard to imagine anyone holding the same ideas as Margaret Thatcher in Britain in 1979 and Ronald Reagan in America in 1981.
T_f: It is hard to imagine anyone today holding the ideas that prevailed when Margaret Thatcher came to power in Britain in 1979 and Ronald Reagan in the US in 1981.

S_s: 不少国家，特别是欧元区国家，似乎已无多少政策选择。
S_f: 如今，不少国家，特别是欧元区国家，似乎已无多少政策选择。
T_s: Many countries, particularly in the eurozone, seem to have few policy options left.
T_f: Now, many countries, particularly in the eurozone, seem to have few policy options left.

S_s: 她曾担任卢拉的幕僚长，也是2007年出台的旨在加快发展的投资计划的制定者。
S_f: 她曾担任卢拉的幕僚长，也是2007年出台的旨在加快发展的投资计划的主要制定者。
T_s: She served as Lula's chief of staff and was the architect of an investment plan introduced in 2007 to speed up development.
T_f: She served as Lula's chief of staff and was a key architect of an investment plan introduced in 2007 to speed up development.

S_s: 更为严格的新规章引入，金融部门的薪金就恢复了正常水准，到1990年前后都一直不见长进。
S_f: 大萧条过后，更为严格的新规章引入，金融部门的薪金就恢复了正常水准，到1990年前后都一直不见长进。
T_s: Stricter new regulations were introduced, and salaries in the financial sector returned to normal levels, where they did not rise until around 1990.
T_f: After the Great Depression, stricter new regulations were introduced, and salaries in the financial sector returned to normal, stagnating until about 1990.

S_s: 以色列人也赞同这一观点，甚至连总理本雅明·内塔尼亚胡也不情愿地表达了自己对两国方案的承诺。
S_f: 大多数以色列人也赞同这一观点，甚至连总理本雅明·内塔尼亚胡也不情愿地表达了自己对两国方案的承诺。

T_f: Most Israelis share this view, and even the prime minister, Binyamin Netanyahu, has begrudgingly expressed his commitment to a two-state solution.

S_s: 在经历了15年的通缩性衰退后，日本经济的复苏仍有很长的路要走。

T_s: After 15 years of deflationary decline, Japan's economic recovery still has a long way to go.
T_f: Frankly, after 15 years of deflationary decline, Japan's economic recovery still has a long way to go.

S_s: 在这个问题上，美国，欧盟都在努力和伊朗接触，但至今都无功而返。

T_s: Both the United States and the European Union have tried to engage Iran on this issue, so far to no avail.
T_f: The United States, the European Union and Russia have all tried to engage Iran on this issue, so far to no avail.

S_s: 在这个支付体系中，随着财政货币接近到期，不拥有该年份财政货币的纳税人将会推高它的需求。
S_f: 在这个封闭的支付体系中，随着财政货币接近到期，不拥有该年份财政货币的纳税人将会推高它的需求。
T_s: In this payment system, as the fiscal money nears maturity, taxpayers who do not own the fiscal money in that year will push up demand for it.
T_f: In this closed payment system, as the fiscal money nears maturity, taxpayers who do not own the fiscal money in that year will push up demand for it.

S_s: 大多数的发达国家都出现了史无前例的房市繁荣高潮。
S_f: 在过去的十年中，大多数的发达国家都出现了史无前例的房市繁荣高潮。
T_s: Most of the rich world has seen an unprecedented housing boom.
T_f: The past decade has seen an unprecedented housing boom in much of the rich world.

S_s: 部分是由于援助国要求使用其自己的国民或者公司，因此经济重建失败。
S_f: 在许多情况下，部分是由于援助国要求使用其自己的国民或者公司，因此经济重建失败。
T_s: Reconstruction has failed, partly because donor countries have demanded the use of their own nationals or firms.
T_f: In many cases, economic reconstruction fails, partly because donor countries require the use of their own nationals or companies.

S_s: 超过25%的劳动力没有工作，意大利的年轻人失业率高达42%。

T_s: More than 25 percent of the workforce is out of work, and youth unemployment in Italy stands at 42 percent.
T_f: In Spain, more than 25 percent of the workforce is out of work, and in Italy youth unemployment stands at 42 percent.

S_s: 该比例上升70%，法国则是60%。
S_f: 在西班牙，该比例上升70%，法国则是60%。
T_s: The proportion rose by 70%, compared with 60% in France.
T_f: In Spain it rose by 70 per cent and in France by 60 per cent.

S_s: 我与政府官员和商界精英进行了40多次深度访谈，并以辅助数据资源来充实我的研究成果。

T_s: I conducted more than 40 in-depth interviews with government officials and business elites, and supplemented my research with supporting data resources.
T_f: In the research, I conducted more than 40 in-depth interviews with government officials and business elites, and supplemented my research results with auxiliary data resources.

S_s: 在访日之旅中，美国国防部长查克·哈格尔已经听到了对美国防务承诺信誉的严重官方质疑。
S_f: 在最近的访日之旅中，美国国防部长查克·哈格尔已经听到了对美国防务承诺信誉的严重官方质疑。
T_s: On his trip to Japan, the US defence Secretary Chuck Hagel has already heard serious official doubts about the credibility of America's defence commitment.
T_f: On his recent trip to Japan, US Defence Secretary Chuck Hagel has heard serious official doubts about the credibility of America's defence commitment.

S_s: 随着当局试图在投资者躲避管制之前先发制人，这场猫鼠游戏都不利于稳定和增长。
S_f: 在更大范围内，随着当局试图在投资者躲避管制之前先发制人，这场猫鼠游戏都不利于稳定和增长。
T_s: This cat-and-mouse game is bad for stability and growth, as authorities try to pre-empt investors before they evade controls.
T_f: More broadly, the cat-and-mouse game is bad for stability and growth, as the authorities try to pre-empt investors before they evade controls.

S_s: 在当选总统努力让美国人民做好准备，迎接未来困难的时候，这些是我们必须面对的问题。
S_f: 在当选总统努力让美国人民做好准备，迎接未来困难的时候，这些是我们必须面对的主要问题。
T_s: These are the questions we must confront as the president-elect tries to prepare the American people for the tough times ahead.
T_f: These are the major questions that we must confront as the president-elect tries to prepare the American people for the difficult days ahead.

S_s: 在两岸，许多人都把经济全球化看作是对收入低于平均水平的人的威胁。
S_f: 在大西洋的两岸，许多人都把经济全球化看作是对收入低于平均水平的人的威胁。
T_s: On both coasts, many people see economic globalization as a threat to people with below-average incomes.
T_f: On both sides of the Atlantic, many people see economic globalization as a threat to people with below-average incomes.

S_s: 在发达国家造成不平等加剧的同一套机制为数十亿人创造了公平竞技场。
S_f: 在发达国家造成不平等加剧的同一套机制为全球数十亿人创造了公平竞技场。
T_s: The same mechanisms that have contributed to rising inequality in the developed world have levelled the playing field for billions of people.
T_f: The same mechanisms that have contributed to rising inequality in the developed world have levelled the playing field for billions of people around the world.

S_s: 在政权的通知下，过去孟加拉国一直是在印度为非作歹的恐怖和军事组织的避风港。
S_f: 在不太友好的政权的通知下，过去孟加拉国一直是在印度为非作歹的恐怖和军事组织的避风港。
T_s: Bangladesh has in the past been a haven for terrorist and militant groups operating in India at the notice of the regime.
T_f: Bangladesh has in the past been a haven for terrorist and militant groups operating in India at the notice of less friendly regimes.

S_s: 在一个广告无所不在的世界中，对商品的渴望是没有天然的界限的。
S_f: 在一个广告无所不在的世界中，对商品和服务的渴望是没有天然的界限的。
T_s: In a world of ubiquitous advertising, there is no natural limit to the desire for goods.
T_f: In a world of ubiquitous advertising, there is no natural limit to the desire for goods and services.

S_s: 亚洲拥有世界五分之三的人口，经济产量占世界的五分之三。
S_f: 在1750年，亚洲拥有世界五分之三的人口，经济产量占世界的五分之三。
T_s: Asia is home to three-fifths of the world's population and three-fifths of its economic output.
T_f: In 1750, Asia was home to three-fifths of the world's population and three-fifths of its economic output.

S_s: 国际非政府组织在抗击疟疾的斗争中与公共部门合作，宣传这项事业并为其提供资金。
S_f: 国际非政府组织和私人基金在抗击疟疾的斗争中与公共部门合作，宣传这项事业并为其提供资金。
T_s: International ngos work with the public sector in the fight against malaria, publicizing the cause and providing funding for it.
T_f: International non-governmental organizations and private funds work with the public sector in the fight against malaria, publicizing and financing the cause.

S_s: 新药比目前市场上同类药品的实际效果更差的风险也是存在的。
S_f: 因此，新药比目前市场上同类药品的实际效果更差的风险也是存在的。
T_s: There is also the risk that a new drug will be worse than its current counterpart on the market.
T_f: As a result, there is also a risk that the new drug will be less effective than similar drugs currently on the market.

S_s: 所有欧元区国家都应该通过发行由所有成员国共同担保的债券来为财政债务融资。
S_f: 因此，所有欧元区国家都应该通过发行由所有成员国共同担保的债券来为财政债务融资。
T_s: All euro-zone countries are supposed to finance fiscal debt by issuing bonds jointly guaranteed by all members.
T_f: So all eurozone countries should finance fiscal debt by issuing bonds jointly guaranteed by all members.

S_s: 我们需要一个与适应这一现实的全球疾病控制体系。
S_f: 因此，我们需要一个与适应这一现实的全球疾病控制体系。
T_s: We need a global disease control system adapted to this reality.
T_f: We therefore need a global disease control system that is adapted to this reality.

S_s: 因此该报告质疑布什坚持放弃与伊朗对话，无意建立更稳定的地区秩序的做法是完全正确的。
S_f: 因此该报告质疑布什坚持放弃与伊朗和叙利亚对话，无意建立更稳定的地区秩序的做法是完全正确的。
T_s: So the report is quite right to question Mr Bush's insistence that he has abandoned talks with Iran in favour of a more stable regional order.
T_f: So the report is quite right to question Mr Bush's insistence that he has abandoned talks with Iran and Syria in favour of a more stable regional order.

S_s: 因此设置非战斗性国家服务的选项并不能解决这一争端，除非其中包含研究。
S_f: 因此设置非战斗性国家服务的选项并不能解决这一争端，除非其中包含对律法的研究。

T_f: Therefore, the option of non-combat national service would not resolve the dispute unless it included a study of the law.

S_s: 因为鱼类的数量在不断地减少，加上全球对于海产品越来越大的需求，水产业迫切需要大量的鱼饲料。

T_s: As fish populations continue to decline and the global demand for seafood increases, the aquaculture industry is in desperate need of large quantities of fish feed.
T_f: As wild fish populations continue to decline and the global demand for seafood increases, the aquaculture industry is in desperate need of large quantities of fish feed.

S_s: 因为看重政治忠诚度高于能力的继任模式，专制制度阻碍了众多才华横溢的人被提拔到高级领导岗位。
S_f: 因为看重政治忠诚度高于能力的继任模式，排外封闭的专制制度阻碍了众多才华横溢的人被提拔到高级领导岗位。
T_s: Autocratic systems prevent many talented people from being promoted to senior leadership positions because of a succession model that values political loyalty over ability.
T_f: Because of the succession model, which values political loyalty over ability, an exclusive and closed autocracy prevents many talented people from being promoted to senior leadership positions.

S_s: 因为生存农业而大肆砍伐、蚕食森林，过度放牧，以及失去生物多样性给整个大洲带来了巨大的威胁。
S_f: 因为生存农业而大肆砍伐、蚕食森林，过度放牧，以及失去生物多样性和土壤给整个大洲带来了巨大的威胁。
T_s: Deforestation, encroachment, overgrazing and loss of biodiversity for subsistence agriculture pose a huge threat to the entire continent.
T_f: Deforestation, deforestation, overgrazing, and loss of biodiversity and soil for subsistence agriculture pose a huge threat to the entire continent.

S_s: 因为来自自然资源相关产品的收入在国家财政收入中并未单独归类，我们只能对这笔开支如何分配进行猜测。
S_f: 因为来自自然资源相关产品的收入在国家财政收入中并未单独归类，我们只能对这笔开支如何分配进行合理的猜测。
T_s: Because revenue from natural resource-related products is not classified separately in state revenues, we can only guess at how this spending is distributed.
T_f: Because revenues from natural resource-related products are not classified separately from state revenues, we can only make reasonable guesses about how this expenditure is allocated.

S_s: 未来将由科学进步和创新决定，但科学进步和创新是无法预知的。
S_f: 唯一确定的是，未来将由科学进步和创新决定，但科学进步和创新是无法预知的。
T_s: The future will be determined by scientific progress and innovation, but scientific progress and innovation are unpredictable.
T_f: The only certainty is that the future will be determined by scientific progress and innovation, but scientific progress and innovation are unpredictable.

S_s: 哈马斯在一月选举中胜出在很大程度上是因为法塔赫在阿拉法特的继任者阿巴斯领导下的四分五裂。
S_f: 哈马斯在2006年一月选举中胜出在很大程度上是因为法塔赫在阿拉法特的继任者阿巴斯领导下的四分五裂。
T_s: Hamas's victory in January's election was due in large part to the fragmentation of Fatah under Arafat's successor, Mahmoud Abbas.
T_f: Hamas won elections in January 2006 in large part because Fatah had splintered under Arafat's successor, Mahmoud Abbas.

S_s: 和援助亚洲海啸相似的行动能够改变这种灾难性的状况，可以拯救百万以上的生命。
S_f: 和援助亚洲海啸相似的行动能够改变这种灾难性的状况，每年可以拯救百万以上的生命。
T_s: Actions similar to those taken to aid the Asian tsunami could change this catastrophic situation and save more than a million lives.
T_f: Actions similar to those that helped with the Asian tsunami could change this catastrophic situation and save more than a million lives each year.

S_s: 这一方针无法刺激竞争，因为各国都利用国家规则阻挠新进入者。
S_f: 后来发现，这一方针无法刺激竞争，因为各国都利用国家规则阻挠新进入者。
T_s: This approach fails to stimulate competition, as countries use national rules to discourage new entrants.
T_f: This approach was found to have failed to stimulate competition, as countries used national rules to discourage new entrants.

S_s: 名人小组将放宽这一解释，允许在一些情况下动用防卫性武力，但是要得到批准。
S_f: 名人小组将放宽这一解释，允许在一些情况下动用防卫性武力，但是要得到安理会的批准。

T_f: The Eminent Persons panel would relax that interpretation to allow the use of defensive force in some circumstances, subject to Security Council approval.

S_s: 可反对派还主要作为执政联盟的刺激物，选民们将辩论看作娱乐，而不是有利于政策制定的思想交锋。
S_f: 可直到现在反对派还主要作为执政联盟的刺激物，选民们将辩论看作娱乐，而不是有利于政策制定的思想交锋。

T_f: But until now the opposition has served mainly as an irritant to the governing coalition, with voters seeing debates as entertainment rather than a clash of ideas conducive to policymaking.

S_s: 尽管25年来在结构生物学上投入巨大，但我们仍无法从理解分子进步到理解整个系统。
S_f: 可是，尽管25年来在结构生物学上投入巨大，但我们仍无法从理解分子进步到理解整个系统。
T_s: Despite 25 years of enormous investment in structural biology, we have not progressed from understanding molecules to understanding entire systems.
T_f: But despite 25 years of enormous investment in structural biology, we haven't progressed from understanding molecules to understanding entire systems.

S_s: 对太大而不能倒银行的暗补必须取消。
S_f: 另一方面，对太大而不能倒银行的暗补必须取消。
T_s: The dark cover for too-big-to-fail banks must go.
T_f: On the other hand, the dark cover for too-big-to-fail banks must go.

S_s: 另一个成功是削弱了左翼反对派，使他能在在街上以及议会里没有重大对抗的情况下管理国家。
S_f: 另一个成功是削弱和压制了左翼反对派，使他能在在街上以及议会里没有重大对抗的情况下管理国家。
T_s: Another success has been weakening the left-wing opposition, allowing him to run the country without major confrontation on the streets or in parliament.
T_f: Another success has been to weaken and neutralise the left-wing opposition, allowing him to run the country without major confrontation on the streets or in parliament.

S_s: 印度的火车开行不能靠热空气，但它们现在除了这些却貌似一无所有。
S_f: 印度不堪重负的火车开行不能靠热空气，但它们现在除了这些却貌似一无所有。
T_s: India's trains cannot run on hot air, but they now seem to have nothing else.
T_f: India's overburdened trains cannot run on hot air, but they now seem to have little else.

S_s: 农民可以借助手机迅速找到从种子价格到天气模式等各项信息，并能申请到他们完成交易所需的资金帮助。
S_f: 农民可以借助手机迅速找到从种子价格到天气模式等各项信息，并能立即申请到他们完成交易所需的资金帮助。
T_s: Farmers can use mobile phones to quickly find information on everything from seed prices to weather patterns and apply for the financial help they need to complete their transactions.
T_f: Farmers can use mobile phones to quickly find information on everything from seed prices to weather patterns and immediately apply for the financial help they need to complete their transactions.

S_s: 军方的攻击行动也证实了这一点，他们更多的依赖威胁平民安全的空袭，而不是能够精确实现军事目标的地面进攻。
S_f: 军方不久前的攻击行动也证实了这一点，他们更多的依赖威胁平民安全的空袭，而不是能够精确实现军事目标的地面进攻。

T_f: The military's recent offensive confirms this, relying more on air strikes that threaten civilian safety than on ground offensives that can precisely achieve military objectives.

S_s: 她很年轻，而且可以在下一次的选举中成为一名杰出的候选人。

T_s: She is young and could be an outstanding candidate in the next election.
T_f: Moreover, she is young and could be an outstanding candidate in the next election.

S_s: 主要的新兴市场国家，成功地避开了2008年和2009年的金融风暴，也同样可能不会插手解决即将来临的问题。
S_f: 再者，主要的新兴市场国家，成功地避开了2008年和2009年的金融风暴，也同样可能不会插手解决即将来临的问题。
T_s: The major emerging markets, which successfully avoided the financial turmoil of 2008 and 2009, are equally likely to stay out of the way.
T_f: Moreover, the major emerging markets, which successfully avoided the financial crisis of 2008 and 2009, are equally likely to stay out of the way.

S_s: 因选举而引发的暴力仍然让肯尼亚伤痕累累，宪政审查程序还有可能导致更多的人员伤亡。
S_f: 再往南去，因选举而引发的暴力仍然让肯尼亚伤痕累累，宪政审查程序还有可能导致更多的人员伤亡。
T_s: Kenya is still scarred by election-related violence, and the constitutional review process could yet claim more lives.
T_f: Further south, Kenya is still scarred by election-related violence, and the constitutional review process could yet claim more lives.

S_s: 国际货币基金组织第一个促进资本市场长期自由化的企图仓促而就，其记忆还是今天的一个障碍。
S_f: 具有讽刺意味的是，国际货币基金组织第一个促进资本市场长期自由化的企图仓促而就，其记忆还是今天的一个障碍。
T_s: The memory of the IMF's first hasty attempt to promote long-term liberalisation of capital markets remains an obstacle today.
T_f: Ironically, the memory of the IMF's first attempt to promote long-term liberalisation of capital markets was rushed and is still a hindrance today.

S_s: 这对于所有相信依旧有可能每天改良世界以及最终改良人类境况的人而言都是一个成功。
S_f: 其意义不止如此，这对于所有相信依旧有可能每天改良世界以及最终改良人类境况的人而言都是一个成功。
T_s: This is a success for all who believe that it is still possible to improve the world every day and ultimately the human condition.
T_f: More than that, it is a success for all who believe that it is still possible to improve the world every day and ultimately the human condition.

S_s: 其中一种预测这些能量与某种粒子破裂方式相结合的时候，可以把我们从地球上消灭。
S_f: 其中一种预测这些新产生的强大能量与某种粒子破裂方式相结合的时候，可以把我们从地球上消灭。
T_s: One predicts that these energies, when combined with some form of particle breakage, could wipe us off the planet.
