S_s: 即使是强健的国内和国际政策反应也未必足以消除需求和增长在相当长的一段时期内萎靡不振的风险。
S_f: 事实上，即使是强健的国内和国际政策反应也未必足以消除需求和增长在相当长的一段时期内萎靡不振的风险。
T_s: Even a robust domestic and international policy response would not necessarily be sufficient to eliminate the risk of sluggish demand and growth for an extended period.
T_f: Indeed, even a robust domestic and international policy response would not necessarily be sufficient to eliminate the risk of sluggish demand and growth for an extended period.

S_s: 不论结果如何，叙利亚惨象所体现的是西方对全球主宰力的不可逆转的进一步削弱。
S_f: 事实上，不论结果如何，叙利亚惨象所体现的是西方对全球主宰力的不可逆转的进一步削弱。
T_s: Whatever the outcome, what the Syrian tragedy represents is an irreversible further erosion of western global dominance.
T_f: In fact, whatever the outcome, what Syria represents is an irreversible further erosion of the West's global dominance.

S_s: 之所以从 2006 年开始，原因是金融机构从那时起，出现冒险行为。
S_f: 之所以从 2006 年开始，原因是金融机构从那时起，出现过度的冒险行为。
T_s: The reason why it started in 2006 is because that's when financial institutions started taking risks.
T_f: The reason it started in 2006 is because financial institutions started taking excessive risks.

S_s: 审讯必须在美国境外进行，即使是海外的美军基地也行。
S_f: 为了规避法律，审讯必须在美国境外进行，即使是海外的美军基地也行。
T_s: The trial must take place outside the United States, even at an American base overseas.
T_f: To circumvent the law, the trial must take place outside the United States, even at an American military base overseas.

S_s: 它们将原油收入投入其他部门，而石油部门只能获得少量投资。
S_f: 为了对抗这种依赖，它们将原油收入投入其他部门，而石油部门只能获得少量投资。
T_s: They pour crude revenues into other sectors, which receive only a small amount of investment.
T_f: To counter this dependence, they have ploughed oil revenues into other sectors, which receive only modest investment.

S_s: 临近的成员国，特别是语言与俄语相近的国家，应该能够快速动员所需要的技术专家。
S_f: 临近的成员国，特别是语言与俄语和乌克兰语相近的国家，应该能够快速动员所需要的技术专家。
T_s: Neighbouring member states, especially those with languages close to Russian, should be able to quickly mobilise needed technical expertise.
T_f: Neighbouring member States, especially those with languages close to Russian and Ukrainian, should be able to quickly mobilize the technical expertise needed.

S_s: 两国都保有贸易盈余，历经多年，并且在都经济周期的不同阶段都未改变。
S_f: 两国都保有巨大的贸易盈余，历经多年，并且在都经济周期的不同阶段都未改变。
T_s: Both countries have run trade surpluses for many years and at different stages of the economic cycle.
T_f: Both countries have run huge trade surpluses for many years and at different stages of the economic cycle.

S_s: 不过在我性格形成的那段时期，这一劫难的阴影却萦绕心头。
S_f: 不过在我性格形成的那段时期，这一劫难的阴影却依旧萦绕心头。
T_s: But in my formative years, the shadow of this calamity haunted me.
T_f: But in my formative years, the shadow of this calamity still haunts me.

S_s: 对西方而言，艾哈迈迪内贾德的胜利意味着与伊朗相关的一切都会变得更为棘手。
S_f: 不论结果如何，对西方而言，艾哈迈迪内贾德的胜利意味着与伊朗相关的一切都会变得更为棘手。
T_s: For the west, Mr Ahmadinejad's victory means that everything to do with Iran becomes trickier.
T_f: Whatever the outcome, Mr Ahmedinejad's victory means that everything to do with Iran will be trickier for the West.

S_s: 不管是为了自我保险，还是为了维持汇率，亚洲金融危机后，东亚再一次开始积累过多的美元债务。
S_f: 不管是为了自我保险，还是为了维持竞争性汇率，亚洲金融危机后，东亚再一次开始积累过多的美元债务。
T_s: After the Asian financial crisis, East Asia once again began accumulating excessive dollar debt, whether to self-insure or maintain exchange rates.
T_f: Whether to self-insure or maintain competitive exchange rates, after the Asian financial crisis, East Asia once again began to accumulate excessive dollar debt.

S_s: 身为伊朗派驻奥斯陆的外交人员，穆罕默德·礼扎·埃达里为了抗议政府在 12 月暴动后的报复行为而辞职。
S_f: 不仅如此，身为伊朗派驻奥斯陆的外交人员，穆罕默德·礼扎·埃达里为了抗议政府在 12 月暴动后的报复行为而辞职。
T_s: Mohammad Reza Edari, Iran's diplomat in Oslo, resigned in protest at government reprisals after the December uprising.
T_f: Not only that, but Mohammad Reza Edari, Iran's diplomat in Oslo, resigned in protest at the government's reprisals after the December uprising.

S_s: 上次美国面对巨额预算赤字的时候还是1980年代早期，那时通胀情况在紧缩货币政策的影响下下降。
S_f: 上次美国面对巨额预算赤字的时候还是1980年代早期，那时通胀情况在紧缩货币政策的影响下大幅下降。
T_s: The last time America ran a big budget deficit, in the early 1980s, inflation fell as monetary policy tightened.
T_f: The last time the United States faced a large budget deficit, in the early 1980s, inflation fell sharply as monetary policy tightened.

S_s: 一些部门不愿留下遗留问题，因此他们没有预算，而且各部长也不愿同外国公司签署协议。
S_f: 一些部门不愿留下大量的遗留问题，因此他们没有预算，而且各部长也不愿同外国公司签署协议。
T_s: Some ministries do not want to leave a legacy, so they do not have budgets, and ministers are reluctant to sign deals with foreign companies.
T_f: Some ministries do not want to leave a large legacy, so they do not have budgets, and ministers are reluctant to sign deals with foreign companies.

S_s: 一个约束是为财政挥霍国设立更为严格的纪律机制，并将其作为强化制度框架的一部分。
S_f: 一个更重要的约束是为财政挥霍国设立更为严格的纪律机制，并将其作为强化制度框架的一部分。
T_s: One constraint would be to impose stricter discipline on fiscally profligate countries as part of a stronger institutional framework.
T_f: A more important constraint would be to establish stricter discipline for fiscally profligate countries as part of a stronger institutional framework.

S_s: 一个对该地区不存在的欧洲政策被在华盛顿的缺位的政策独占者所摆布。
S_f: 一个在很大程度上对该地区不存在的欧洲政策被在华盛顿的缺位的政策独占者所摆布。
T_s: A non-existent European policy towards the region is at the mercy of an absent policy monopolist in Washington.
T_f: A largely non-existent European policy towards the region is at the mercy of an absent policy monopolist in Washington.

S_s: 3月15日的协议在政治上不可行，也被议会以一边倒的优势否决。
S_f: 3月15日的协议在政治上不可行，也被塞浦路斯议会以一边倒的优势否决。
T_s: The March 15 deal was politically unfeasible and was rejected by Parliament by a lopsided margin.
T_f: The March 15 deal was not politically viable and was rejected by the Cypriot parliament by a lopsided margin.

S_s: 20世纪60年代南韩经济腾飞不是因为国外援助达到了高潮，相反，那时国外援助正在停止。
S_f: 20世纪60年代南韩经济腾飞不是因为国外援助达到了高潮，相反，那时国外援助正在慢慢停止。
T_s: South Korea's economy soared in the 1960s not because foreign aid had peaked, but because it was shutting down.
T_f: South Korea's economy soared in the 1960s not because foreign aid was at its peak, but because it was slowly winding down.

S_s: 爱尔兰央行试图通过限制银行向高风险借款人贷款将金融机构救出又一场灾难性泡沫。
S_f: 2015年1月，爱尔兰央行试图通过限制银行向高风险借款人贷款将金融机构救出又一场灾难性泡沫。
T_s: Ireland's central bank tried to save its financial institutions from another disastrous bubble by restricting banks' lending to risky borrowers.
T_f: In January 2015, Ireland's central bank tried to rescue financial institutions from another disastrous bubble by restricting banks' lending to risky borrowers.

S_s: 世界各国政府同意将全球气温升高幅度限制在前工业时代水平以上2℃内。
S_f: 2009年和2010年，世界各国政府同意将全球气温升高幅度限制在前工业时代水平以上2℃内。
T_s: The world's governments have agreed to limit the rise in global temperatures to 2 ° C above pre-industrial levels.
T_f: In 2009 and 2010, the world's governments agreed to limit the rise in global temperatures to 2 ° C above pre-industrial levels.

S_s: 100%固然没有达到，但这是个开端，我们期待更多的国家在看到其他国家收获低碳发展的益处后也能加入。
S_f: 100%固然没有达到，但这是个良好的开端，我们期待更多的国家在看到其他国家收获低碳发展的益处后也能加入。
T_s: While 100% is not achieved, it is a start, and we look forward to more countries joining in as they see other countries reap the benefits of low-carbon development.
T_f: While 100% is not achieved, it is a good start, and we look forward to more countries joining in as they see other countries reap the benefits of low-carbon development.

S_s: 国家也最终形成协议，同意免去重债穷国的债务，减轻它们的还债负担，将更多的钱用于卫生项目。
S_f: 高收入国家也最终形成协议，同意免去重债穷国的债务，减轻它们的还债负担，将更多的钱用于卫生项目。
T_s: Countries have also finally reached an agreement to write off the debts of heavily indebted poor countries, reducing their debt-servicing burdens and spending more on health projects.
T_f: High-income countries have also finally reached an agreement to write off the debts of heavily indebted poor countries, reducing their debt-servicing burdens and spending more on health programs.

S_s: 欧盟应该承诺每年至少吸收500,000寻求庇护者，同时努力说服世界其他地区也接收相同数量的难民。
S_f: 首先，欧盟应该承诺每年至少吸收500,000寻求庇护者，同时努力说服世界其他地区也接收相同数量的难民。
T_s: The EU should commit to taking in at least 500,000 asylum seekers a year, while trying to persuade the rest of the world to take in the same number.
T_f: First, the EU should commit to taking in at least 500,000 asylum seekers a year, while trying to persuade the rest of the world to take in the same number.

S_s: 面对汽车大鳄的危机，许多人都要求作为救援计划的附带条件，国家应该迫使银行开始放贷。
S_f: 面对汽车大鳄和中小供应商共同的危机，许多人都要求作为救援计划的附带条件，国家应该迫使银行开始放贷。
T_s: Faced with the auto crisis, many are demanding that the state force the banks to start lending as a condition of the bailout.
T_f: Faced with a crisis involving both big carmakers and smaller suppliers, many are demanding that the state force banks to start lending as a condition of the bail-out.

S_s: 金融监管可以避免银行向不同的监管机构报告，使得金融法规和监管操作协调化，并消除扭曲竞争的现象。
S_f: 集中化的金融监管可以避免银行向不同的监管机构报告，使得金融法规和监管操作协调化，并消除扭曲竞争的现象。
T_s: Financial regulation can prevent banks from reporting to different regulators, harmonize financial regulations and regulatory practices, and eliminate distortions of competition.
T_f: Centralised financial regulation would prevent banks from reporting to different regulators, harmonise financial rules and regulatory practices, and eliminate distortions of competition.

S_s: 随着巴拉克·奥巴马内阁全面接管政府，这位当选总统不得不直接面对危机。
S_f: 随着巴拉克·奥巴马内阁全面接管政府，这位当选总统不得不在许多领域直接面对危机。
T_s: With Barack Obama's cabinet in full control of the government, the president-elect has been forced to confront the crisis directly.
T_f: As Barack Obama's cabinet takes full control of the government, the president-elect has to confront the crisis directly in many areas.

S_s: 除了成本因素，到目前为止，电动汽车的舒适性极差。
S_f: 除了成本和补贴因素，到目前为止，电动汽车的舒适性极差。
T_s: Cost aside, electric cars have so far been extremely uncomfortable.
T_f: Cost and subsidies aside, electric cars have so far been extremely uncomfortable.

S_s: 阿桑奇表示他对已公布的文件可能造成的任何伤害深表遗憾。
S_f: 阿桑奇表示他对已公布的文件可能造成的任何伤害深表遗憾，但是他还是为文件的公布辩护。
T_s: Assange said he deeply regretted any harm the published documents may have caused.
T_f: Assange said he deeply regretted any harm the documents may have caused, but defended their publication.

S_s: 银行必须建立一定的防卫堡垒，以抵御在市场在转向的时候作出的调整。
S_f: 银行必须建立一定的防卫堡垒，以抵御在市场在转向的时候作出必要的调整。
T_s: Banks must build a bulwark against adjustments when markets turn.
T_f: Banks must build a bulwark against making the necessary adjustments when markets turn.

S_s: 那是一个获得真相的时刻，从内部清洗的残暴。
S_f: 那是一个获得真相的时刻，从内部清洗斯大林主义的残暴。
T_s: It was a moment of truth, of brutality purged from within.
T_f: It was a moment of truth, of cleansing Stalinist brutality from within.

S_s: 穆沙拉夫政府没能遏制法律界令人赞叹的旨在迫使政府为乔杜里复职的公民反抗运动。
S_f: 那时，穆沙拉夫政府没能遏制法律界令人赞叹的旨在迫使政府为乔杜里复职的公民反抗运动。
T_s: Musharraf's government has failed to contain a remarkable civil disobedience movement in the legal profession that sought to force the government to reinstate Mr Chaudhry.
T_f: At the time, Musharraf's government failed to contain the legal profession's impressive civil disobedience movement aimed at forcing the government to reinstate Chaudhry.

S_s: 那些选民直接就认为本次选举根本没有任何议题可言。
S_f: 那些对政治有幻灭感的选民直接就认为本次选举根本没有任何议题可言。
T_s: Those voters simply didn't think there were any issues at all.
T_f: Voters who are disillusioned with politics simply think there are no issues at all.

S_s: 造成差异的不可能是教育质量，因为那些从穷市迁移到富市的劳动力同样赚得更多。
S_f: 造成上述差异的不可能是教育质量，因为那些从穷市迁移到富市的劳动力同样赚得更多。
T_s: It cannot be the quality of education that makes the difference, since those who migrate from poor to rich cities also earn more.
T_f: It cannot be the quality of education that makes this difference, since those who migrate from poor to rich cities also earn more.

S_s: 通过让金融机构以更有利的利率发放更多的贷款，中小企业将获得成长的空间。
S_f: 通过让金融机构以更有利的利率发放更多的贷款，中小企业将获得成长和繁荣的空间。
T_s: By allowing financial institutions to lend more at more favorable rates, small and medium-sized enterprises will be given room to grow.
T_f: By allowing financial institutions to lend more at more favorable rates, smes will be given room to grow and thrive.

S_s: 英国的声音能够左右世界事件，给英国带来英国人常说的超越国家实力的能力。
S_f: 通过欧盟的放大，英国的声音能够左右世界事件，给英国带来英国人常说的超越国家实力的能力。
T_s: Britain's voice can shape world events and give it what Britons often say is a capacity to rise above the weight of the nation.
T_f: Amplified by the EU, Britain's voice can shape world events, giving the country what Britons often say is an ability to punch above its weight.

S_s: 低利率促使公司扩大贷款、增加投资，使它们在增加负债的同时也拥有了更多的生产性资产。
S_f: 通常情况下，低利率促使公司扩大贷款、增加投资，使它们在增加负债的同时也拥有了更多的生产性资产。
T_s: Low interest rates encourage companies to borrow more and invest more, giving them more productive assets as well as more debt.
T_f: Typically, low interest rates encourage companies to borrow more and invest more, leaving them with more productive assets as well as more debt.

S_s: 至少在今年的选举中，种族和教育比收入更有预测意义。
S_f: 这表明，至少在今年的选举中，种族和教育比收入更有预测意义。
T_s: In this year's election, at least, race and education are more predictive than income.
T_f: This suggests that, at least in this year's election, race and education are more predictive than income.

S_s: 这给兴业银行带来的损失就将会大于据报导导致的50亿欧元了。
S_f: 这给兴业银行带来的损失就将会远远大于据报导导致的50亿欧元了。
T_s: Socgen's losses will be bigger than the 5 billion euros reported.
T_f: The cost to SocGen would be far greater than the 5 billion euros reported.

S_s: 这类威胁以前会带来政治冲击，不过现在已经不管用了。
S_f: 这类威胁以前会带来严重的政治冲击，不过现在已经不管用了。
T_s: Such threats used to have a political impact, but they no longer do.
T_f: Such threats used to have serious political repercussions, but they no longer work.

S_s: 这种联合会议是一个因美苏关系解冻而产生的一个环节。
S_f: 这种联合会议是一个因美苏关系解冻而产生的历史性突破的一个环节。
T_s: The joint meetings were part of a thaw in relations between the United States and the Soviet Union.
T_f: The joint meeting was part of a historic breakthrough that resulted from the thaw in relations between the United States and the Soviet Union.

S_s: 这种源于手机的信息提高了决策能力，为农民节约了资金并增强了他们对极端天气模式的适应度。
S_f: 这种源于手机的信息提高了决策能力，为农民节约了资金并增强了他们对极端天气模式和干旱的适应度。
T_s: This information from mobile phones improves decision-making, saves farmers money and increases their resilience to extreme weather patterns.
T_f: This information from mobile phones improves decision-making, saves farmers money and increases their resilience to extreme weather patterns and droughts.

S_s: 这种方式不仅对定居者，就是对普通的以色列人也都是一种创痛。
S_f: 这种强制的方式不仅对定居者，就是对普通的以色列人也都是一种创痛。
T_s: This approach is painful not only for the settlers but also for ordinary Israelis.
T_f: This coercive approach is painful not only for the settlers but also for ordinary Israelis.

S_s: 这种做法在实践中往往导致他们的观点被对立面利益群体，也就是企图操纵贸易规则为自己牟利的企业所利用。
S_f: 这种做法在实践中往往导致他们的观点被对立面利益群体，也就是企图操纵贸易规则为自己牟利的全球企业所利用。
T_s: In practice, this often results in their views being used by opposing interests, namely companies that seek to manipulate trade rules for their own benefit.
T_f: In practice, this often results in their views being exploited by opposing interests: global corporations that seek to manipulate trade rules for their own benefit.

S_s: 这意味着到了某些时候就需要达成政府间协议，而欧元区将朝着跨政府联邦制度的方向发展。
S_f: 这意味着到了某些时候就需要达成一些政府间协议，而欧元区将朝着跨政府联邦制度的方向发展。
T_s: This means that at some point there will need to be an intergovernmental agreement, and that the eurozone will move towards a cross-governmental federal system.
T_f: This means that at some point some intergovernmental agreement will have to be reached, and that the eurozone will move towards a cross-governmental federal system.

S_s: 这对利差、新兴市场股市的影响是一个争论激烈的话题。
S_f: 这对利差、新兴市场股市、住房需求和其他许多方面的影响是一个争论激烈的话题。
T_s: The impact on interest rate spreads and emerging market equities is a hotly debated topic.
T_f: The impact on interest rate differentials, emerging market equities, housing demand and much else is a hotly debated topic.

S_s: 这场人民运动一方面将世俗政权打倒在地，一方面则把一系列鼓吹伊斯兰主义的政党送上了权力宝座。
S_f: 这场人民运动一方面将世俗政权打倒在地，一方面则把一系列公开鼓吹伊斯兰主义的政党送上了权力宝座。
T_s: The popular movement brought secular regimes to power while bringing an array of Islamist-promoting parties to power.
T_f: The popular movement brought secular regimes to power while bringing to power an array of overtly Islamist parties.

S_s: 这则广告不仅富于幽默，而且根据我在中东地区的观察，它还对现实给予了准确的反映。
S_f: 这则广告不仅富于幽默、制作上乘，而且根据我在中东地区的观察，它还对现实给予了准确的反映。
T_s: The AD is not only humorous, but also, based on my observations in the Middle East, an accurate reflection of reality.
T_f: Not only is the AD humorous and well produced, it is also, based on my observations in the Middle East, an accurate reflection of reality.

S_s: 这六步需要全面协调的行为变化，需要各级政府合作、规模投资、分享创意、推广最佳做法。
S_f: 这六步需要全面协调的行为变化，需要各级政府合作、规模投资、分享创意、推广最佳做法和制定长远规划。
T_s: These six steps require comprehensive and coordinated behavior change, collaboration, scale investment, sharing of ideas, and spreading best practices across all levels of government.
T_f: These six steps require comprehensive and coordinated behaviour change, and require collaboration, scale investment, sharing of ideas, spreading best practices and long-term planning across all levels of government.

S_s: 这使得许多分析家预计欧盟也将会采取某种形式的绿色关税制度。
S_f: 这使得许多分析家预计欧盟也将会在未来几年里采取某种形式的绿色关税制度。
T_s: This has led many analysts to expect the European Union to adopt some form of green tariff.
T_f: This has led many analysts to expect the European Union to adopt some form of green tariff system in the coming years.

S_s: 这会导致与另一方的国际地位下降，并形成明确的等级链。
S_f: 这会导致与另一方的国际地位下降、地位要求不予承认，并形成明确的等级链。
T_s: This leads to a decline in international standing with the other party and a clear hierarchy.
T_f: This leads to a decline in international status with the other party, unrecognition of status claims and the formation of a clear hierarchy chain.

S_s: 这些防治手段极为低廉有效, 而且，把这些手段组合在一起并把它们同其他保健措施结合起来可以降低成本。
S_f: 这些防治手段极为低廉有效, 而且，把这些手段组合在一起并把它们同其他保健措施结合起来可以进一步降低成本。
T_s: These interventions are extremely inexpensive and effective, and combining them and other health interventions can reduce costs.
T_f: These interventions are extremely inexpensive and effective, and combining them and other health interventions can further reduce costs.

S_s: 这些数据在凸显人们为消除极端贫困所付出努力的同时，也旨在转移人们的注意力。
S_f: 这些数据在凸显人们为消除极端贫困和减少过早死亡所付出努力的同时，也旨在转移人们的注意力。
T_s: While highlighting the efforts being made to end extreme poverty, these figures are also designed to divert attention.
T_f: While highlighting efforts to end extreme poverty and reduce premature deaths, the figures are also designed to divert attention.

S_s: 这些措施与欧元区所将实施的措施并没有什么不同。
S_f: 这些措施与欧元区在希腊退出时所将实施的措施并没有什么不同。
T_s: These measures are not dissimilar to those that will be implemented in the eurozone.
T_f: These measures are not dissimilar to those the eurozone would impose in the event of a Greek exit.

S_s: 这些国家可以积累外汇准备来顶住升值压力，如同它们在全球金融危机之前所做的那样。
S_f: 这些国家当然可以积累外汇准备来顶住升值压力，如同它们在全球金融危机之前所做的那样。
T_s: These countries can build up reserves to withstand upward pressure, as they did before the global financial crisis.
T_f: These countries can certainly build up reserves to withstand upward pressure, as they did before the global financial crisis.

S_s: 这两座城市居民人数相近，但亚特兰大的二氧化碳排放量超过了巴塞罗那的六倍。
S_f: 这两座城市居民人数相近，但亚特兰大与交通运输相关的二氧化碳排放量超过了巴塞罗那的六倍。
T_s: The two cities have similar numbers of residents, but Atlanta emits more than six times more carbon dioxide than Barcelona.
T_f: The two cities have similar numbers of residents, but Atlanta's transportation-related carbon dioxide emissions are more than six times those of Barcelona.

S_s: 这一现象的根本性后果是工资不再扮演过去几十年中所起到的再分配角色。
S_f: 这一现象的根本性后果是工资不再扮演过去几十年中所起到的核心再分配角色。
T_s: The fundamental consequence of this phenomenon is that wages no longer play the redistributive role they have played in the past few decades.
T_f: The fundamental consequence of this phenomenon is that wages no longer play the central redistributive role they have played in the past few decades.

S_s: 这一时期也建立了新的经济政策稳定的传统，继续并且强化了先前保守党政府致力于财政纪律的努力。
S_f: 这一时期也建立了新的经济政策稳定的传统，继续并且强化了先前保守党政府致力于财政纪律以及低通货膨胀的努力。
T_s: This period also established a new tradition of economic policy stability, continuing and reinforcing the previous Conservative government's commitment to fiscal discipline.
T_f: This period also established a new tradition of economic policy stability, continuing and reinforcing the previous Conservative government's commitment to fiscal discipline and low inflation.

S_s: 这一政策大大有助于农民工，因为它保障了孩子接受教育的机会。
S_f: 这一政策大大有助于农民工，因为它保障了孩子平等接受教育的机会。
T_s: This policy greatly helps migrant workers, because it guarantees their children the chance to receive education.
T_f: This policy greatly helps migrant workers because it guarantees equal access to education for children.

S_s: 这一折衷的法学家团体将会在七月份的第一个星期开始进行国际司法中的一项实验。
S_f: 这一折衷的法学家团体将会在七月份的第一个星期开始进行国际司法中的一项非同寻常的实验。
T_s: This eclectic group of jurists will begin an experiment in international justice in the first week of July.
T_f: This eclectic group of jurists will begin an extraordinary experiment in international justice in the first week of July.

S_s: 这一差距可以通过采纳而带来的高生产率，以及高投资回报下的实物资本积累来迅速缩小。
S_f: 这一差距可以通过采纳和模仿现有技术而带来的高生产率，以及高投资回报下的实物资本积累来迅速缩小。
T_s: This gap can be closed quickly through the high productivity that comes with adoption and the accumulation of physical capital with high investment returns.
T_f: This gap can be closed quickly through the high productivity that comes from adopting and mimicking existing technologies, and the accumulation of physical capital with high returns on investment.

S_s: 这一减税是否足以补偿房主们由于房价下降而带来的财富损失并且防止衰退还有待观察。
S_f: 这一减税是否足以补偿房主们由于房价下降而带来的财富损失并且防止山雨欲来的衰退还有待观察。
T_s: It remains to be seen whether the tax cut will be enough to compensate homeowners for the loss of wealth caused by falling home prices and prevent a recession.
T_f: It remains to be seen whether the tax cut will be enough to compensate homeowners for the loss of wealth from falling home prices and prevent a looming recession.

S_s: 发达经济体生产率年增长率接近1%，而此前为2%。
S_f: 近十年来，发达经济体生产率年增长率接近1%，而此前为2%。
T_s: Productivity growth in advanced economies is close to 1 per cent a year, compared with 2 per cent previously.
T_f: Productivity growth in advanced economies has been close to 1 per cent a year for nearly a decade, compared with 2 per cent previously.

S_s: 他试图回避这股浪潮，向法国非洲殖民地的领袖们提议通过谈判的方式实现他们的独立之梦。
S_f: 身为法国总统的他试图回避这股浪潮，向法国非洲殖民地的领袖们提议通过谈判的方式实现他们的独立之梦。
T_s: He tried to beat the tide by proposing to the leaders of France's African colonies that their dreams of independence be achieved through negotiations.
T_f: As French president, he tried to fend off the tide, proposing to the leaders of France's African colonies that their dreams of independence be achieved through negotiations.

S_s: 证据表明，青春期教育计划或能有效降低亲密伴侣暴力问题，该方法和其他方法需要在不同的环境中接受考验。
S_f: 越来越多的证据表明，青春期教育计划或能有效降低亲密伴侣暴力问题，该方法和其他方法需要在不同的环境中接受考验。
T_s: Evidence suggests that adolescent education programs may be effective in reducing intimate partner violence, and this and other approaches need to be tested in different Settings.
T_f: This and other approaches need to be tested in different Settings, as growing evidence suggests that adolescent education programs may be effective in reducing intimate partner violence.

S_s: 起初看似不过又一场国内变革的叙利亚危机已经演化为一场扩散到边境以外的内战，进而影响到邻国的安全。
S_f: 起初看似不过又一场国内变革的叙利亚危机已经演化为一场扩散到边境以外的内战，进而影响到所有邻国的安全。
T_s: What at first seemed like just another domestic revolution in Syria has evolved into a civil war that has spilled across its borders, affecting the security of neighboring countries.
T_f: What at first seemed like just another domestic revolution in Syria has morphed into a civil war that has spilled across its borders, affecting the security of all its neighbors.

S_s: 非洲金融共同体法郎区各成员国废除了在法统期将他们合为一体的联邦制，转而设立了贸易壁垒。
S_f: 货币市场领域，非洲金融共同体法郎区各成员国废除了在法统期将他们合为一体的联邦制，转而设立了贸易壁垒。
T_s: The members of the African Financial Community's franc Zone abandoned the federalism that had bound them together during the legal era and erected trade barriers instead.
T_f: In the area of money markets, the members of the African Financial Community Franc Zone abolished the federalism that had bound them together during the legal era and instead erected trade barriers.

S_s: 政府最近通过了一项旨在增加税收并在2013年达到收支平衡的预算法案。
S_f: 贝卢斯科尼政府最近通过了一项旨在增加税收并在2013年达到收支平衡的预算法案。
T_s: The government recently passed a budget bill aimed at raising taxes and balancing the books by 2013.
T_f: Mr Berlusconi's government recently passed a budget law aimed at raising taxes and balancing the books by 2013.

S_s: 该列车往返于台北和高雄，单程345公里。
S_f: 该列车往返于台北和高雄，单程345公里，耗时90分钟。
T_s: The train runs 345 kilometers each way between Taipei and Kaohsiung.
T_f: The 345km one-way trip between Taipei and Kaohsiung takes 90 minutes.

S_s: 王岐山在金融部门有着宝贵的经验，理应在新领导集体中承担类似的职责。
S_f: 诚然，王岐山在金融部门有着宝贵的经验，理应在新领导集体中承担类似的职责。
T_s: Mr Wang has valuable experience in the financial sector and deserves a similar role in the new leadership.
T_f: To be sure, Mr Wang has valuable experience in the financial sector and deserves a similar role in the new leadership.

S_s: 许多非经合组织成员国，还可以从废除燃油津贴政策中受益。
S_f: 许多非经合组织成员国，除了需要财政上的支持，还可以从废除燃油津贴政策中受益。
T_s: Many non-OECD countries would also benefit from scrapping fuel subsidies.
T_f: Many non-OECD countries, in addition to needing financial support, would benefit from scrapping fuel subsidies.

S_s: 启蒙运动以来，理性分析已经可以很好的引导统治和决策，良好的社会还有法制保障其实施。
S_f: 许多世俗主义者认为，启蒙运动以来，理性分析已经可以很好的引导统治和决策，良好的社会还有法制保障其实施。
T_s: Since the Enlightenment, rational analysis has been a good guide to governance and decision-making, and good society and the rule of law ensure its implementation.
T_f: Many secularists argue that rational analysis has been a good guide to governance and decision-making since the Enlightenment, and that good society and the rule of law ensure its implementation.

S_s: 虽然欧洲获利较少，但如果长期利率回涨到25年来的平均水平，那么欧洲的经济状况就会恶化。
S_f: 虽然欧洲获利较少，但如果长期利率回涨到25年来的平均水平，那么欧洲的经济状况就会大大恶化。
T_s: Although Europe is less profitable, its economic situation could worsen if long-term interest rates rise back to their 25-year average.
T_f: Although Europe is less profitable, it would be much worse off if long-term interest rates rose back to their 25-year average.

S_s: 虽然承认现实非常痛苦，但西方、尤其是美国，对创造伊斯兰国蓬勃发展的条件负有责任。
S_f: 虽然承认现实非常痛苦，但西方、尤其是美国，对创造伊斯兰国蓬勃发展的条件负有重大责任。
T_s: Painful as it is to acknowledge, the West, and the US in particular, bears responsibility for creating the conditions in which IS thrives.
T_f: Painful as it is to acknowledge, the West, and the US in particular, bear a heavy responsibility for creating the conditions in which IS thrives.

S_s: 虽然基金无法实际运行，但欧盟成员国已经上报了多个项目提请欧洲委员会审议。
S_f: 虽然基金到2015年年中之前都无法实际运行，但欧盟成员国已经上报了多个项目提请欧洲委员会审议。
T_s: Although the fund is not operational, EU member states have submitted a number of projects to the European Commission for consideration.
T_f: Although the fund will not be operational until mid-2015, EU member states have submitted a number of projects for consideration by the European Commission.

S_s: 至于风险价值模型，我们现在有过硬的证据表明它们非常有用，但在相关问题上却毫无价值。
S_f: 至于风险价值模型，我们现在有过硬的证据表明它们在无关问题上非常有用，但在相关问题上却毫无价值。
T_s: As for value-at-risk models, we now have solid evidence that they are very useful, but worthless when it comes to related issues.
T_f: As for value-at-risk models, we now have good evidence that they are very useful for unrelated problems, but worthless for related problems.

S_s: 特朗普政府就一直保持着亲商的态度，承诺放松管制，使得投资者对美国和全球经济的提振重树信心。
S_f: 自上任伊始，特朗普政府就一直保持着亲商的态度，承诺放松管制，使得投资者对美国和全球经济的提振重树信心。
T_s: The Trump administration, for its part, has maintained a pro-business attitude and promised deregulation, reassuring investors that the U.S. and global economy will lift.
T_f: Since taking office, the Trump administration has maintained a pro-business attitude and promised deregulation, reassuring investors about a boost to the US and global economy.

S_s: 联合国还拥有独一无二的责任，那就是领导各国在重要的长期环境和经济挑战问题上达成全球性的共识。
S_f: 联合国还拥有独一无二的责任和机遇，那就是领导各国在重要的长期环境和经济挑战问题上达成全球性的共识。
T_s: The United Nations also has a unique responsibility to lead nations in forging a global consensus on important long-term environmental and economic challenges.
T_f: The United Nations also has a unique responsibility and opportunity to lead nations in forging a global consensus on important long-term environmental and economic challenges.
